â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setFormData({
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ...formData,
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       [e.target.name]: e.target.value,
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     e.preventDefault();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setStatus('loading');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setMessage('');
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const response = await fetch('/api/contact', {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         method: 'POST',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           'Content-Type': 'application/json',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         },
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         body: JSON.stringify(formData),
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       });
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const result = await response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (response.ok) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setStatus('success');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setMessage(result.message || 'Message sent successfully! I will be in touch soon.');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setFormData({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); // Clear form
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setStatus('error');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setMessage(result.message || 'Failed to send message. Please check your inputs.');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       console.error('Submission error:', error);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setStatus('error');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setMessage('A network error occurred. Please try again.');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const getStatusMessage = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (status === 'loading') return 'Sending...';
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (status === 'success') return message;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (status === 'error') return message;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return '';
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="max-w-xl mx-auto py-10">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {/* Form Status Message */}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {status !== 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className={`p-4 mb-6 rounded-lg font-medium transition-opacity ${
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             status === 'success' ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800 dark:bg-green-900 dark:text-green-200' :
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             status === 'error' ? 'bg-red-100 text-red-800 dark:bg-red-900 dark:text-red-200' :
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             'bg-neutral-100 text-neutral-800 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-neutral-200'
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           }`}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {getStatusMessage()}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="space-y-6">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Name Input */}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <label htmlFor="name" className="block text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Name
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </label>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <input
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             type="text"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             id="name"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             name="name"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             value={formData.name}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             required
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow disabled:opacity-70"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Email Input */}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <label htmlFor="email" className="block text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Email
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </label>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <input
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             type="email"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             id="email"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             name="email"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             value={formData.email}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             required
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow disabled:opacity-70"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Message Textarea */}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <label htmlFor="message" className="block text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Message
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </label>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <textarea
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             id="message"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             name="message"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             rows={5}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             value={formData.message}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             required
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow resize-none disabled:opacity-70"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Submit Button */}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           type="submit"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className="w-full flex justify-center items-center py-3 px-6 border border-transparent rounded-xl shadow-sm text-lg font-medium text-white bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500 transition-colors duration-200 disabled:bg-blue-400 dark:disabled:bg-blue-800"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {status === 'loading' ? (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <svg className="animate-spin -ml-1 mr-3 h-5 w-5 text-white" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <circle className="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="4"></circle>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <path className="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </svg>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             'Send Message'
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </form>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ MusicPuzzle.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { sendGTMEvent } from '@next/third-parties/google'; 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | import MusicCTA from './MusicCTA'; 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   FaPlay, FaPause, FaUndo, FaSearch, FaYoutube, 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   FaMusic, FaExchangeAlt, FaTrophy, FaExclamationTriangle, FaSpinner 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | } from 'react-icons/fa'; 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const CORRECT_ORDER = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const SEGMENT_DURATION = 5; 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const DEMO_VIDEO = {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   id: '-DHuW1h1wHw',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   name: 'Dave Brubeck - Take Five',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   artist: 'The Dave Brubeck Quartet',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   image: 'https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-DHuW1h1wHw/mqdefault.jpg'
â”‚   â”‚   |       | };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | interface PuzzlePiece {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   id: number;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   localAudioUrl?: string;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function MusicPuzzle() {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [sourceMode, setSourceMode] = useState<'offline' | 'youtube' | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [searchResults, setSearchResults] = useState<any[]>([]);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isSearching, setIsSearching] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [hasSearched, setHasSearched] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [trackInfo, setTrackInfo] = useState({ name: '', artist: '', image: '', url: '' });
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [pieces, setPieces] = useState<PuzzlePiece[]>([]);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isSolved, setIsSolved] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [playingId, setPlayingId] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isBuffering, setIsBuffering] = useState(false); 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [seconds, setSeconds] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [selectedIdx, setSelectedIdx] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [lastMovedIdx, setLastMovedIdx] = useState<number | null>(null); // NEW: For landing highlight
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isPlayerReady, setIsPlayerReady] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [bestTime, setBestTime] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [listenedPieces, setListenedPieces] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [warning, setWarning] = useState<string | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const ytPlayerRef = useRef<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const localAudioRef = useRef<HTMLAudioElement | null>(null); 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const timerRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const ytTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const searchCache = useRef<Record<string, any[]>>({});
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const lastSearchTime = useRef<number>(0);
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const savedBest = localStorage.getItem('puzzle_best_time');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (savedBest) setBestTime(parseInt(savedBest));
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const timer = setTimeout(() => { loadOfflinePuzzle(); }, 300);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return () => clearTimeout(timer);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const onPlayerStateChange = (event: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (event.data === 3) setIsBuffering(true);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       else setIsBuffering(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const initYT = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (window.YT && window.YT.Player) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ytPlayerRef.current = new window.YT.Player('yt-hidden-player', {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           height: '0', width: '0', videoId: '',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           playerVars: { 'controls': 0, 'disablekb': 1, 'enablejsapi': 1 },
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           events: { 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             'onReady': () => setIsPlayerReady(true),
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             'onStateChange': onPlayerStateChange 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         });
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (!window.YT) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const tag = document.createElement('script');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       tag.src = "https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api";
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       firstScriptTag.parentNode?.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = initYT;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else { initYT(); }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleSearch = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     e.preventDefault();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const query = searchQuery.trim().toLowerCase();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (!query) return;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const now = Date.now();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (now - lastSearchTime.current < 1500) return;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     lastSearchTime.current = now;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (searchCache.current[query]) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSearchResults(searchCache.current[query]);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       return;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsSearching(true);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setHasSearched(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const res = await fetch(`/api/youtube/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const results = Array.isArray(data) ? data : [];
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       searchCache.current[query] = results;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSearchResults(results);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } catch (err) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSearchResults([]);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } finally { setIsSearching(false); }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const selectYouTubeTrack = (video: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (!isPlayerReady && sourceMode !== 'offline') return;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setHasSearched(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSearchResults([]);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSearchQuery('');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSourceMode('youtube');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setTrackInfo({ name: video.name, artist: video.artist, image: video.image, url: `https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=${video.id}` });
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.loadVideoById === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytPlayerRef.current.loadVideoById(video.id);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const initial = CORRECT_ORDER.map(id => ({ id }));
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     shuffleAndStart(initial);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const loadOfflinePuzzle = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSourceMode('offline');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setTrackInfo({
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       name: "Girl from Italy", artist: "Arman Ayva",
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       image: "https://res.cloudinary.com/dpmkshcky/image/upload/v1763230260/Cowboy_a3mnzs.png",
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       url: "https://armanayva.bandcamp.com"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const initial = CORRECT_ORDER.map(id => ({ id, localAudioUrl: `/audio/segment-${id + 1}.mp3` }));
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     shuffleAndStart(initial);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const shuffleAndStart = (basePieces: PuzzlePiece[]) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsSolved(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSeconds(0);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLastMovedIdx(null); // Reset highlight
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setListenedPieces(new Set()); 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setWarning(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // âœ… GUARANTEED SCRAMBLE LOGIC
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     let shuffled = [...basePieces];
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     let isCorrectAtStart = true;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     while (isCorrectAtStart) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       shuffled = [...shuffled].sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // Check if current permutation matches the solution
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       isCorrectAtStart = JSON.stringify(shuffled.map(p => p.id)) === JSON.stringify(CORRECT_ORDER);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setPieces(shuffled);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (timerRef.current) clearInterval(timerRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     timerRef.current = setInterval(() => setSeconds(s => s + 1), 1000);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const stopAudio = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (ytTimeoutRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       clearTimeout(ytTimeoutRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytTimeoutRef.current = null;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       try { ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo(); } catch (e) {}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (localAudioRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       localAudioRef.current.pause();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       localAudioRef.current.currentTime = 0;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       localAudioRef.current = null;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setPlayingId(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsBuffering(false);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const playSegment = (piece: PuzzlePiece) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setListenedPieces(prev => new Set(prev).add(piece.id));
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setWarning(null); 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (playingId === piece.id) { stopAudio(); return; }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (sourceMode === 'youtube' && ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.seekTo === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const startTime = piece.id * SEGMENT_DURATION;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (ytTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(ytTimeoutRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytPlayerRef.current.seekTo(startTime, true);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytPlayerRef.current.playVideo();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setPlayingId(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         stopAudio(); 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }, SEGMENT_DURATION * 1000);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else if (sourceMode === 'offline' && piece.localAudioUrl) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const audio = new Audio(piece.localAudioUrl);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       localAudioRef.current = audio;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setPlayingId(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       audio.play().catch(() => {});
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       audio.onended = () => { setPlayingId(null); localAudioRef.current = null; };
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handlePieceClick = (index: number) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (isSolved) return;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const pieceId = pieces[index].id;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (selectedIdx === null) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (!listenedPieces.has(pieceId)) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setWarning("Dont cheat, play first! ğŸ·");
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setTimeout(() => setWarning(null), 2000);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         return;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSelectedIdx(index);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else if (selectedIdx === index) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // âœ… SWAP LOGIC WITH HIGHLIGHT
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const updated = [...pieces];
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const temp = updated[selectedIdx];
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       updated[selectedIdx] = updated[index];
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       updated[index] = temp;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setPieces(updated);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // âœ… TRIGGER TEMPORARY HIGHLIGHT
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setLastMovedIdx(index);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setTimeout(() => setLastMovedIdx(null), 800);
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (JSON.stringify(updated.map(p => p.id)) === JSON.stringify(CORRECT_ORDER)) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setIsSolved(true);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         if (timerRef.current) clearInterval(timerRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         const savedBest = localStorage.getItem('puzzle_best_time');
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         if (!savedBest || seconds < parseInt(savedBest)) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           localStorage.setItem('puzzle_best_time', seconds.toString());
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           setBestTime(seconds);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         sendGTMEvent({ event: 'puzzle_complete', action: 'music_puzzle_success', value: seconds });
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <section className="my-8 p-4 sm:p-8 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-2xl shadow-xl relative">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div id="yt-hidden-player" className="hidden"></div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {warning && (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="absolute top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-[100] bg-red-600 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded-full font-bold shadow-2xl animate-bounce flex items-center gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <FaExclamationTriangle /> {warning}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <h2 className="text-xl sm:text-2xl font-serif font-bold flex items-center gap-3 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {sourceMode === 'youtube' ? <FaYoutube className="text-red-600" /> : <FaMusic className="text-blue-500" />}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           Music Puzzle
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button onClick={() => shuffleAndStart(pieces)} className="text-[10px] font-bold uppercase text-neutral-500 bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 px-2 py-1 rounded hover:text-blue-500 transition-colors">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           Reshuffle Game
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="mb-8 space-y-4">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <form onSubmit={handleSearch} className="relative z-50">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <input 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               type="text" value={searchQuery} onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               placeholder="Search YouTube Song..."
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 text-sm rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-red-500"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <button type="submit" className="px-4 bg-red-600 text-white rounded-xl hover:bg-red-700 transition-all shadow-md">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {isSearching ? <FaSpinner className="animate-spin" /> : <FaSearch />}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </button>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {hasSearched && searchQuery !== '' && (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="absolute left-0 right-0 top-full mt-2 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl shadow-2xl z-50 max-h-60 overflow-y-auto">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {searchResults.length > 0 ? searchResults.map((video: any) => (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <button key={video.id} onClick={() => selectYouTubeTrack(video)} className="w-full flex items-center gap-3 p-3 hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 text-left border-b last:border-none dark:border-neutral-700">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <img src={video.image} className="w-12 h-8 object-cover rounded shadow-sm" alt="" />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <div className="truncate text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <p className="font-bold text-xs truncate">{video.name}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <p className="text-[10px] text-neutral-500">{video.artist}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </button>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               )) : <div className="p-4 text-center text-xs text-neutral-500">No videos found.</div>}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </form>
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {!isSolved && (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <button onClick={loadOfflinePuzzle} className="py-3 px-4 flex items-center justify-center gap-3 bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-xl hover:border-blue-500 transition-all text-sm font-bold text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <FaMusic className="text-blue-500" /> Play Offline Demo
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </button>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <button onClick={() => selectYouTubeTrack(DEMO_VIDEO)} disabled={!isPlayerReady} className={`py-3 px-4 flex items-center justify-center gap-3 bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-xl transition-all text-sm font-bold text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 ${!isPlayerReady ? 'opacity-50 cursor-wait' : 'hover:border-red-500'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <FaYoutube className="text-red-500" /> {isPlayerReady ? 'Play "Take Five"' : 'Loading YT...'}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </button>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {pieces.length > 0 && (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="animate-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-black p-3 rounded-xl border border-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="flex items-center gap-3 truncate">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <img src={trackInfo.image} className="w-10 h-10 rounded-lg object-cover" alt="" />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="truncate">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <p className="text-[9px] font-bold text-red-600 uppercase tracking-widest leading-none mb-1">Now Playing</p>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <p className="text-sm font-bold truncate max-w-[120px] sm:max-w-none text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50">{trackInfo.name}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="flex items-center gap-3 shrink-0">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                <div className="text-right">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <p className="text-[8px] uppercase font-black text-neutral-400 leading-none mb-1">Time</p>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <span className="font-mono text-xs text-blue-500 font-bold">{seconds}s</span>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                {bestTime && (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  <div className="text-right border-l pl-3 border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <p className="text-[8px] uppercase font-black text-green-500 flex items-center gap-1 justify-end leading-none mb-1">Best <FaTrophy size={8}/></p>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <span className="font-mono text-xs text-green-500 font-bold">{bestTime}s</span>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                <button onClick={() => shuffleAndStart(pieces)} className="p-2 text-neutral-400 hover:text-blue-500"><FaUndo size={14} /></button>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-3 sm:gap-4">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {pieces.map((piece, index) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isCorrect = piece.id === index;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isSelected = selectedIdx === index;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isHighlight = lastMovedIdx === index; // NEW: Feedback check
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const hasListened = listenedPieces.has(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isCurrentlyBuffering = playingId === piece.id && isBuffering;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               return (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <div 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   key={piece.id} 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   onClick={() => handlePieceClick(index)} 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   className={`relative p-3 sm:p-5 border-2 rounded-xl transition-all duration-300 flex flex-col items-center gap-3 cursor-pointer ${
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     isSelected ? 'border-blue-500 bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/30 scale-95 shadow-inner' : 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     isHighlight ? 'border-yellow-400 bg-yellow-50 dark:bg-yellow-900/40 ring-4 ring-yellow-400/20' : // HIGHLIGHT STYLE
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     isCorrect ? 'border-green-500 bg-green-50/50 dark:bg-green-900/20' : 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     'bg-white dark:bg-black border-dashed border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700'
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   } ${!hasListened && !isSolved ? 'opacity-70 grayscale-[0.5]' : ''}`}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 >
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   {isCurrentlyBuffering && (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <div className="absolute inset-0 z-10 flex items-center justify-center bg-white/60 dark:bg-black/60 rounded-xl">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       <FaSpinner className="animate-spin text-blue-500" size={24} />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <div className="w-full flex flex-col items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     {isSelected ? <FaExchangeAlt className="text-blue-500 mb-2 animate-pulse" /> : 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                      <span className="text-2xl mb-1">{isCorrect ? 'âœ…' : hasListened ? 'ğŸ§©' : 'â“'}</span>}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <span className="text-[9px] font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       {isCorrect ? `Part ${piece.id + 1}` : hasListened ? `Piece ${index + 1}` : 'Play to Unlock'}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     </span>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <button 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     onClick={(e) => { e.stopPropagation(); playSegment(piece); }} 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     className={`w-10 h-10 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center shadow-md transition-all ${
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       playingId === piece.id ? 'bg-red-600 text-white animate-pulse' : 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       hasListened ? 'bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-600' : 'bg-neutral-800 text-white'
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     }`}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   >
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     {playingId === piece.id ? <FaPause size={14} /> : <FaPlay size={14} className="ml-0.5" />}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   </button>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |               );
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             })}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {isSolved && (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="text-center mt-8 animate-in fade-in zoom-in duration-700 pt-6 border-t border-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <p className="p-3 text-green-700 dark:text-green-400 font-bold text-sm mb-4 uppercase tracking-tighter font-serif">âœ¨ Solved in {seconds}s! âœ¨</p>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <MusicCTA label={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "Watch Full on YouTube" : "Listen on Bandcamp"} albumUrl={trackInfo.url} baseColor={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "#FF0000" : "#00bfff"} hoverColor={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "#CC0000" : "#0080ff"} />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </section>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     [DIR] lib/
â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ spotify.ts
â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const client_id = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const client_secret = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const basic = Buffer.from(`${client_id}:${client_secret}`).toString('base64');
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const TOKEN_ENDPOINT = `https://accounts.spotify.com/api/token`;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | export async function getAccessToken() {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // 1. Debug: Check if keys exist (Do not log the actual secret!)
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   console.log("ğŸ”‘ [Spotify] Checking credentials...");
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!client_id) console.error("âŒ [Spotify] Missing SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID");
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!client_secret) console.error("âŒ [Spotify] Missing SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET");
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const response = await fetch(TOKEN_ENDPOINT, {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     method: 'POST',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       Authorization: `Basic ${basic}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     },
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     body: 'grant_type=client_credentials',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     cache: 'no-store', // Disable cache while debugging
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   });
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // 2. Debug: Check if token request worked
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!response.ok) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     console.error(`âŒ [Spotify] Token Error: ${response.status} ${response.statusText}`);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const text = await response.text();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     console.error("   Details:", text);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return {};
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const data = await response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   console.log("âœ… [Spotify] Access Token received");
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return data;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | export async function getPlaylist(playlistId: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const { access_token } = await getAccessToken();
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!access_token) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     console.error("âŒ [Spotify] No access token available. Cannot fetch playlist.");
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return { error: { message: "No access token" } };
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   console.log(`ğŸµ [Spotify] Fetching playlist: ${playlistId}...`);
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const response = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${playlistId}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     },
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     cache: 'no-store', // Disable cache while debugging
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   });
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // 3. Debug: Check if playlist request worked
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!response.ok) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     console.error(`âŒ [Spotify] Playlist Fetch Failed: ${response.status}`);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const text = await response.text();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     console.error("   Details:", text);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // Return a structured error so the UI handles it gracefully
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return { error: { message: `Failed to fetch: ${response.statusText}` } };
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const data = await response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   console.log(`âœ… [Spotify] Successfully fetched playlist: "${data.name}"`);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return data;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     [DIR] api/
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       [DIR] contact/
â”‚   â”‚   |         â”œâ”€â”€ .DS_Store
â”‚   â”‚   |         â”œâ”€â”€ route.ts
â”‚   â”‚   |         | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   |         | // This Next.js API route handles the form submission securely.
â”‚   â”‚   |         | // In a production environment, this is where you would integrate a service 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | // like SendGrid, Resend, or Nodemailer to send the actual email.
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | // NOTE: You must install 'nodemailer' to run this code locally, if you use it.
â”‚   â”‚   |         | // e.g., npm install nodemailer @types/nodemailer
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | export async function POST(req: Request) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     const { name, email, message } = await req.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // 1. Basic Validation
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     if (!name || !email || !message) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       return new Response(JSON.stringify({ message: 'Missing required fields: name, email, and message are needed.' }), {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         status: 400,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       });
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // 2. Email Sending Logic (Simulated/Placeholder)
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // !!! IMPORTANT: PRODUCTION IMPLEMENTATION !!!
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // The code below is a placeholder. You must replace it with actual email sending 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // code using a service and your private API key/credentials (stored in environment variables).
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     console.log(`--- New Contact Form Submission ---
â”‚   â”‚   |         | Name: ${name}
â”‚   â”‚   |         | Email: ${email}
â”‚   â”‚   |         | Message: ${message}
â”‚   â”‚   |         | ---------------------------------`);
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // Example using a fictional external email sender:
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // await sendEmail({
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     //   to: 'your-google-inbox@gmail.com',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     //   from: 'contact-form@armanayva.com',

â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // });
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // If the email sending logic succeeds:
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return new Response(JSON.stringify({ message: 'Success! Your message has been sent.' }), {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       status: 200,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   } catch (error) {

â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return new Response(JSON.stringify({ message: 'Internal Server Error. Please try again later.' }), {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       status: 500,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }

â”‚   â”‚   |           â”œâ”€â”€ route.ts
â”‚   â”‚   |           | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   |           | import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           | async function getSpotifyAccessToken() {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const client_id = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID;
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const client_secret = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET;
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const response = await fetch('https://accounts.spotify.com/api/token', {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     method: 'POST',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       Authorization: 'Basic ' + Buffer.from(client_id + ':' + client_secret).toString('base64'),
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     },
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     body: 'grant_type=client_credentials',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   });
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const data = await response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   return data.access_token;
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           | export async function GET(request: Request) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const id = searchParams.get('id');
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   if (!id) return NextResponse.json({ error: 'ID is required' }, { status: 400 });
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const token = await getSpotifyAccessToken();
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const response = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/tracks/${id}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` },
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const track = await response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json(track);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to fetch track' }, { status: 500 });
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         [DIR] search/
â”‚   â”‚   |           â”œâ”€â”€ route.ts
â”‚   â”‚   |           | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   |           | import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           | export async function GET(request: Request) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const query = searchParams.get('q');
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const API_KEY = process.env.YOUTUBE_API_KEY;
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   if (!query) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json([]);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     // 1. Try to extract Video ID from URL (handles watch, shorts, youtu.be)
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const videoIdMatch = query.match(/(?:v=|shorts\/|youtu\.be\/|embed\/)([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{11})/);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     if (videoIdMatch && videoIdMatch[1]) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       const videoId = videoIdMatch[1];
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       const res = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         `https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/videos?part=snippet&id=${videoId}&key=${API_KEY}`
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       );
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       if (data.items && data.items.length > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         const item = data.items[0];
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         return NextResponse.json([{
â”‚   â”‚   |           |           id: item.id,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |           name: item.snippet.title,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |           artist: item.snippet.channelTitle,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |           image: item.snippet.thumbnails.medium?.url || item.snippet.thumbnails.default?.url,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         }]);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     // 2. If no URL match, perform a Broad Search
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const searchRes = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       `https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/search?part=snippet&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}&type=video&maxResults=5&key=${API_KEY}`
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     );
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const searchData = await searchRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     // Log for debugging if search returns nothing
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     if (!searchData.items) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       console.log("YouTube API returned no items:", searchData);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       return NextResponse.json([]);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const results = searchData.items.map((item: any) => ({
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       id: item.id.videoId,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       name: item.snippet.title,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       artist: item.snippet.channelTitle,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       image: item.snippet.thumbnails.medium?.url,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     }));
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json(results);
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     console.error("YT API Error:", error);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'YouTube search failed' }, { status: 500 });
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     [DIR] og/
â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ route.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { ImageResponse } from 'next/og'
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | // IMPORTANT: Define the runtime as 'edge' for this API to work correctly.
â”‚   â”‚   |       | export const runtime = 'edge'
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | // The URL for the Cloudinary background image
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const HERO_IMAGE_URL = 'https://res.cloudinary.com/dpmkshcky/image/upload/c_fill,g_auto,h_250,w_970/b_rgb:000000,e_gradient_fade,y_-0.50/c_scale,co_rgb:ffffff,fl_relative,l_text:montserrat_25_style_light_align_center:Your%20Funky%20Jazz,w_0.2,y_0.3/v1570237649/17160429878_68460aeb25_o-1_udg7bx.jpg'
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | // The GET function MUST be async to use fetch
â”‚   â”‚   |       | export async function GET(request: Request) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let url = new URL(request.url)
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let title = url.searchParams.get('title') || 'My Musical Journey, Jazz is everywhere'
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // --- 1. Fetch the External Image ---
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let imageBuffer: ArrayBuffer | undefined;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // Use fetch to get the image data
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const response = await fetch(HERO_IMAGE_URL);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (response.ok) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           imageBuffer = await response.arrayBuffer();
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           console.error(`Failed to fetch background image: ${response.status}`);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       console.error('Error fetching image:', error);
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // --- 2. Render the ImageResponse with the image data ---
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return new ImageResponse(
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         tw="flex flex-col w-full h-full items-center justify-center text-white"
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         style={{
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           // Fallback background color if image fails to load
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           backgroundColor: '#000', 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         }}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       >
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Render the Image element using the fetched URL */}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {imageBuffer ? (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             // Use the <img> tag and the full URL
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <img 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 src={HERO_IMAGE_URL} 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 alt="Arman Ayva Background" 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 width={1200}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 height={630}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 tw="absolute inset-0 w-full h-full object-cover" 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |              // Simple fallback text if the image fails to load
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div tw="text-4xl">Image Failed to Load</div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         )}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Black Overlay for Readability */}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div tw="absolute inset-0 bg-black opacity-60" />
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Content container - place it on top of the overlay */}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div tw="relative flex flex-col w-full p-16 justify-center items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <h1 tw="text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight text-center max-w-4xl">
â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {title}
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </h1>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <p tw="text-2xl mt-4">Arman Ayva | Composer & Musician</p>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     ),
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       width: 1200,
â”‚   â”‚   |       |       height: 630,
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   )
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     [DIR] [lang]/

â”‚   â”‚   |       |   dictionaries[locale]?.() ?? dictionaries.en();

â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ layout.tsx

â”‚   â”‚   |       | // --- ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES / CONSTANTS ---
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const fullImageUrl = new URL('/og?title=Arman+Ayva+Music', baseUrl).toString();
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const GA_MEASUREMENT_ID = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_GA_ID || ''
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const YOUR_APP_ID = process.env.YOUR_FACEBOOK_APP_ID; 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const TIKTOK_PIXEL_ID = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_TIKTOK_ID || 'YOUR_TIKTOK_PIXEL_ID'; 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | export const metadata: Metadata = {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   metadataBase: new URL(baseUrl),
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   title: {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     default: 'Arman Ayva Personal Website',
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     template: '%s | Arman Ayva', 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   },
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   description: 'Arman Ayva | Montreal Jazz Composer Blending Armenian Folk & Funk',
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | const cx = (...classes: any[]) => classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ')
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       | export default async function RootLayout({
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   children,
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   params,
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }: {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   children: React.ReactNode;
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // ğŸ‘‡ FIXED: params must be a Promise in Next.js 15
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   params: Promise<{ lang: string }>;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | }) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // ğŸ‘‡ FIXED: Await the params before using them
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const { lang } = await params;
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Determine text direction (Right-to-Left for Arabic)
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const isRTL = lang === 'ar';
â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <html

â”‚   â”‚   |         |       {/* PHASE 2: REVERSED GAME */}

â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <span className="inline-block px-3 py-1 rounded-full bg-purple-100 dark:bg-purple-900/30 text-purple-600 dark:text-purple-400 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest mb-4">
â”‚   â”‚   |         |             {dict.puzzle.phase} 02
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           </span>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <h2 className="font-bold text-5xl md:text-7xl font-serif mb-6 tracking-tighter">

â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           Before I began composing jazz, my world was framed through a camera lens. As a 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <strong> photographer and amateur filmmaker</strong>, I spent years capturing visual 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           stories. Today, I use those same visual instincts to storyboard with sound. I view 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           my compositions as "invisible films," where every funky bass groove or mysterious 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           piano line serves as a camera shot, and every melody develops a cinematic plot.

â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           Based in the creative crossroads of Montreal, my music is a deeply personal exploration 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           of heritage and rhythm. I bridge the warmth of <strong>Armenian folk motifs</strong> with 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           the high-energy freedom of 1970s fusion and analog synth textures. Drawing inspiration 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           from luminaries like <strong>Marcus Miller, US3, and Dave Brubeck</strong>, I craft 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           compositions that feel both timeless and contemporary.

â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           I am not a performing artist; I am a studio-focused hobbyist dedicated to the 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           architecture of sound. By focusing exclusively on production within 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <strong> Apple Logic Pro</strong>, I prioritize the intricate layering of live bass 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           and global percussion. Whether it is the narrative-driven tracks of 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <em> Criminal Case N68</em> or the soulful improvisations of <em>Happy Bundle</em>, 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           my music is an invitation to traverse new sound realms together.
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>

â”‚   â”‚   |         | // --- HELPER FUNCTIONS (Must be defined before usage) ---
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function Table({ data }: { data: { headers: string[]; rows: string[][] } }) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let headers = data.headers.map((header, index) => (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     <th key={index}>{header}</th>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   ))
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let rows = data.rows.map((row, index) => (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     <tr key={index}>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       {row.map((cell, cellIndex) => (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <td key={cellIndex}>{cell}</td>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       ))}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     </tr>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   ))
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     <table>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       <thead>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <tr>{headers}</tr>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       </thead>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       <tbody>{rows}</tbody>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     </table>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   )
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function CustomLink(props: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let href = props.href
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (href.startsWith('/')) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       <Link href={href} {...props}>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         {props.children}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     )
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (href.startsWith('#')) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return <a {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function RoundedImage(props: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return <Image alt={props.alt} className="rounded-lg" {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function Code({ children, ...props }: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let codeHTML = highlight(children)
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return <code dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: codeHTML }} {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function slugify(str: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return str
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .toString()
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .toLowerCase()
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .trim()
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .replace(/\s+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .replace(/&/g, '-and-')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .replace(/[^\w\-]+/g, '')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .replace(/\-\-+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function createHeading(level: number) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const Heading = ({ children }: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     let slug = slugify(children)
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return React.createElement(
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       `h${level}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       { id: slug },
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       [
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         React.createElement('a', {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           href: `#${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           key: `link-${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           className: 'anchor',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         }),
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       ],
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       children
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     )
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   Heading.displayName = `Heading${level}`
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return Heading
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         |

â”‚   â”‚   |         |   h1: createHeading(1),

â”‚   â”‚   |         | export function CustomMDX(props: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     <MDXRemote
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       {...props}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       components={{ ...components, ...(props.components || {}) }}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     />

â”‚   â”‚   |         | }

â”‚   â”‚   |         â”œâ”€â”€ utils.ts
â”‚   â”‚   |         | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   |         | import fs from 'fs'
â”‚   â”‚   |         | import path from 'path'
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | type Metadata = {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   title: string
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   publishedAt: string
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   summary: string
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   image?: string
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   headerImage?: string
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function parseFrontmatter(fileContent: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let frontmatterRegex = /---\s*([\s\S]*?)\s*---/
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let match = frontmatterRegex.exec(fileContent)
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!match) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return { metadata: {} as Metadata, content: fileContent }
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let frontMatterBlock = match[1]
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let content = fileContent.replace(frontmatterRegex, '').trim()
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let frontMatterLines = frontMatterBlock.trim().split('\n')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let metadata: Partial<Metadata> = {}
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   frontMatterLines.forEach((line) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // Improved split to handle values containing colons (like URLs)
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     let firstColonIndex = line.indexOf(':')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     if (firstColonIndex > -1) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       let key = line.slice(0, firstColonIndex).trim()
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       let value = line.slice(firstColonIndex + 1).trim()
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       value = value.replace(/^['"](.*)['"]$/, '$1') // Remove quotes
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       metadata[key as keyof Metadata] = value
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   })
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return { metadata: metadata as Metadata, content }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function getMDXFiles(dir: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     console.warn(`Directory not found: ${dir}`);
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return [];
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return fs.readdirSync(dir).filter((file) => path.extname(file) === '.mdx')
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function readMDXFile(filePath: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let rawContent = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf-8')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return parseFrontmatter(rawContent)
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | function getMDXData(dir: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let mdxFiles = getMDXFiles(dir)
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return mdxFiles.map((file) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     let { metadata, content } = readMDXFile(path.join(dir, file))
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // Use the filename as the slug
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     const slug = path.parse(file).name 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       .toLowerCase()
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       .replace(/\s+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       .replace(/_/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       .replace(/[^\w\-]+/g, '')
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       metadata,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       slug,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       content,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   })
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | export function formatDate(date: string | null | undefined, includeRelative = false) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!date) return 'Date TBD' 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let currentDate = new Date()
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // Ensure ISO format for parsing
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let dateString = date.includes('T') ? date : `${date}T00:00:00`
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let targetDate = new Date(dateString)
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // Calculate differences
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let fullDate = targetDate.toLocaleString('en-us', {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     month: 'long',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     day: 'numeric',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     year: 'numeric',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   })
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!includeRelative) return fullDate
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const diffInMs = currentDate.getTime() - targetDate.getTime();
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const diffInDays = Math.floor(diffInMs / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let relative = '';
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (diffInDays < 1) relative = 'Today';
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   else if (diffInDays < 30) relative = `${diffInDays}d ago`;
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   else if (diffInDays < 365) relative = `${Math.floor(diffInDays / 30)}mo ago`;
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   else relative = `${Math.floor(diffInDays / 365)}y ago`;
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return `${fullDate} (${relative})`
â”‚   â”‚   |         | } 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | export function getBlogPosts(lang: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const targetLang = lang || 'en';
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // FIX: Based on your log, 'posts' is INSIDE 'blog'.
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // We need to look into: app/[lang]/blog/posts
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // Then we find the specific language folder inside 'posts'.
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const postsPath = path.join(
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     process.cwd(),
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     'app',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     '[lang]',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     'blog',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     'posts',
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     targetLang
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   );
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!fs.existsSync(postsPath)) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // FALLBACK: If you didn't create subfolders for each language yet,
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // and your .mdx files are just sitting inside 'posts' directly:
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     const flatPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'app', '[lang]', 'blog', 'posts');
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     if (fs.existsSync(flatPath)) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       console.log(`Found posts in flat structure: ${flatPath}`);
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       return getMDXData(flatPath);
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     console.error(`âŒ MDX directory not found at: ${postsPath}`);
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return [];
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return getMDXData(postsPath);
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   |         â”œâ”€â”€ page.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   |         | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   |         | import Link from 'next/link'
â”‚   â”‚   |         | import { formatDate, getBlogPosts } from 'app/[lang]/blog/utils'
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         | // 1. Make the function async
â”‚   â”‚   |         | import { BlogPosts as BlogPostsList } from 'app/components/posts';
â”‚   â”‚   |         | // 1. Make the function async
â”‚   â”‚   |         | // 2. The Page Component (Renamed to avoid conflict)
â”‚   â”‚   |         | export default async function BlogPage({ params }: { params: Promise<{ lang: string }> }) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const { lang } = await params;
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     <section>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       <h1 className="font-semibold text-2xl mb-8 tracking-tighter">Blog</h1>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       {/* 3. Use the imported component */}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       <BlogPostsList lang={lang} />
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     </section>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   );
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   |         | export function BlogPosts({ lang }: { lang: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // Fetch posts specifically for this language
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let allBlogs = getBlogPosts(lang)
â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     <div>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |       {allBlogs
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         .sort((a, b) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           if (new Date(a.metadata.publishedAt) > new Date(b.metadata.publishedAt)) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         |             return -1
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           }
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           return 1
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         })
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         .map((post) => (
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <Link
â”‚   â”‚   |         |             key={post.slug}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |             className="flex flex-col space-y-1 mb-4"
â”‚   â”‚   |         |             href={`/${lang}/blog/${post.slug}`} // Added lang to the URL
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           >
â”‚   â”‚   |         |             <div className="w-full flex flex-col md:flex-row space-x-0 md:space-x-2">
â”‚   â”‚   |         |               <p className="text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 w-[100px] tabular-nums">
â”‚   â”‚   |         |                 {formatDate(post.metadata.publishedAt, false)}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |               <p className="text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 tracking-tight">
â”‚   â”‚   |         |                 {post.metadata.title}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |           </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |         ))}
â”‚   â”‚   |         |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |         |   )
â”‚   â”‚   |         | }

â”‚   â”‚   |           | import { baseUrl } from 'app/sitemap'

â”‚   â”‚   |           | // 1. FIX: generateStaticParams must now handle the language and slug
â”‚   â”‚   |           | export async function generateStaticParams() {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const locales = ['en', 'fr', 'es', 'it', 'de', 'hy', 'ru', 'ar'];
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   // We need to return an array of { lang, slug } for every combination
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   // to ensure all pages are pre-rendered correctly.
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const params: { lang: string; slug: string }[] = [];
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   locales.forEach((lang) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const posts = getBlogPosts(lang);
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     posts.forEach((post) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       params.push({ lang, slug: post.slug });
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   });
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   return params;
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           | // 2. FIX: generateMetadata needs to await params
â”‚   â”‚   |           | export async function generateMetadata({
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   params,
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }: {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   params: Promise<{ slug: string; lang: string }>
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }): Promise<Metadata | undefined> {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const { slug, lang } = await params; // â¬…ï¸ Await the promise
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const post = getBlogPosts(lang).find((post) => post.slug === slug)
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   if (!post) return;
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   let { title, publishedAt: publishedTime, summary: description, image } = post.metadata
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   let ogImage = image ? image : `${baseUrl}/og?title=${encodeURIComponent(title)}`
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   return {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     title,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     description,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     openGraph: {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       title,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       description,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       type: 'article',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       publishedTime,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       url: `${baseUrl}/${lang}/blog/${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       images: [{ url: ogImage, width: 1200, height: 630 }],
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     },
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     twitter: {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       card: 'summary_large_image',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       title,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       description,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       images: [ogImage],
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     },
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           | // 3. FIX: Main Blog Page component
â”‚   â”‚   |           | export default async function Blog({ 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   params: paramsPromise 
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }: { 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   params: Promise<{ slug: string; lang: string }> 
â”‚   â”‚   |           | }) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const { slug, lang } = await paramsPromise; // â¬…ï¸ Await the promise
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   // Pass 'lang' to getBlogPosts to fetch from the correct folder
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const post = getBlogPosts(lang).find((post) => post.slug === slug);
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   if (!post) {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     notFound();
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   }
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const { title, publishedAt, headerImage, summary } = post.metadata;
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   |           |     <section>
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       <script
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         type="application/ld+json"
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         suppressHydrationWarning
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
â”‚   â”‚   |           |           __html: JSON.stringify({
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             '@context': 'https://schema.org',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             '@type': 'BlogPosting',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             headline: title,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             datePublished: publishedAt,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             description: summary,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             image: post.metadata.image
â”‚   â”‚   |           |               ? `${baseUrl}${post.metadata.image}`
â”‚   â”‚   |           |               : `${baseUrl}/og?title=${encodeURIComponent(title)}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             url: `${baseUrl}/${lang}/blog/${post.slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             author: {
â”‚   â”‚   |           |               '@type': 'Person',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |               name: 'Arman Ayva',
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             },
â”‚   â”‚   |           |           }),
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         }}
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       />
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       <h1 className="title font-semibold text-2xl tracking-tighter text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-50 mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         {title}
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       </h1>        
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       {headerImage && (
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         <div className="relative w-full overflow-hidden mb-8 rounded-lg" style={{ height: '250px' }}>
â”‚   â”‚   |           |           <Image
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             src={headerImage}
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             alt={title} 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             fill
â”‚   â”‚   |           |             sizes="100vw"

â”‚   â”‚   |           |         </div>

â”‚   â”‚   |           |       
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mt-2 mb-8 text-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         <p className="text-sm text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-50">
â”‚   â”‚   |           |           {formatDate(publishedAt)}
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   |           |       <article className="prose prose-neutral dark:prose-invert max-w-none">
â”‚   â”‚   |           |         <CustomMDX source={post.content} />

â”‚   â”‚   |     return [
â”‚   â”‚   |       // FIX: Redirects the base /project path to /blog
â”‚   â”‚   |       {
â”‚   â”‚   |         source: '/project',
â”‚   â”‚   |         destination: '/blog',
â”‚   â”‚   |         permanent: true, // 301 Permanent Redirect
â”‚   â”‚   |       },

â”‚   â”‚   |       {
â”‚   â”‚   |         source: '/f',

â”‚   â”‚   |         permanent: true, // 301 Permanent Redirect
