â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ core.py
â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (core.py) ---
â”‚   â”‚   | import os
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | # Configuration: What to skip and what to read
â”‚   â”‚   | EXCLUDE = {'.git', 'node_modules', '__pycache__', '.next', '.env', 'package-lock.json'}
â”‚   â”‚   | EXTENSIONS = ('.js', '.ts', '.tsx', '.py', '.json', '.md', '.css')
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | def extract_project(path, output_file="core_code_structure.txt"):
â”‚   â”‚   |     with open(output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as out:
â”‚   â”‚   |         for root, dirs, files in os.walk(path):
â”‚   â”‚   |             # Filter directories and files
â”‚   â”‚   |             dirs[:] = [d for d in dirs if d not in EXCLUDE]
â”‚   â”‚   |             files = [f for f in files if f not in EXCLUDE]
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |             # Calculate indentation and print directory
â”‚   â”‚   |             rel_path = os.path.relpath(root, path)
â”‚   â”‚   |             indent = "  " * (0 if rel_path == "." else rel_path.count(os.sep) + 1)
â”‚   â”‚   |             out.write(f"\n{indent}[DIR] {os.path.basename(root)}/\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |             for file in files:
â”‚   â”‚   |                 out.write(f"{indent}  â”œâ”€â”€ {file}\n")
â”‚   â”‚   |                 
â”‚   â”‚   |                 # Only extract content if it matches extensions
â”‚   â”‚   |                 if file.lower().endswith(EXTENSIONS):
â”‚   â”‚   |                     file_path = os.path.join(root, file)
â”‚   â”‚   |                     try:
â”‚   â”‚   |                         with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
â”‚   â”‚   |                             content = f.read()
â”‚   â”‚   |                             # Indent file content for readability
â”‚   â”‚   |                             prefix = f"{indent}  | "
â”‚   â”‚   |                             out.write(f"{prefix}--- START ---\n")
â”‚   â”‚   |                             out.write("".join([f"{prefix}{line}\n" for line in content.splitlines()]))
â”‚   â”‚   |                             out.write(f"{prefix}--- END ---\n")
â”‚   â”‚   |                     except Exception as e:
â”‚   â”‚   |                         out.write(f"{indent}  | [ERROR: {e}]\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | if __name__ == "__main__":
â”‚   â”‚   |     import sys
â”‚   â”‚   |     target = sys.argv[1] if len(sys.argv) > 1 else "."
â”‚   â”‚   |     extract_project(target)
â”‚   â”‚   |     print(f"Extraction complete for: {target}")
â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ .npmrc

â”‚   â”‚   |   const value: any;
â”‚   â”‚   |   export default value;

â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ README.md
â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (README.md) ---
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | pnpm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade" && git push -u origin main    
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | # Portfolio Blog Starter
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | This is a porfolio site template complete with a blog. Includes:
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | - MDX and Markdown support
â”‚   â”‚   | - Optimized for SEO (sitemap, robots, JSON-LD schema)
â”‚   â”‚   | - RSS Feed
â”‚   â”‚   | - Dynamic OG images
â”‚   â”‚   | - Syntax highlighting
â”‚   â”‚   | - Tailwind v4
â”‚   â”‚   | - Vercel Speed Insights / Web Analytics
â”‚   â”‚   | - Geist font
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | ## Demo
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | https://portfolio-blog-starter.vercel.app
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | ## How to Use
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | You can choose from one of the following two methods to use this repository:
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | ### One-Click Deploy
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | Deploy the example using [Vercel](https://vercel.com?utm_source=github&utm_medium=readme&utm_campaign=vercel-examples):
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | [![Deploy with Vercel](https://vercel.com/button)](https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/vercel/examples/tree/main/solutions/blog&project-name=blog&repository-name=blog)
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | ### Clone and Deploy
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | Execute [`create-next-app`](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/tree/canary/packages/create-next-app) with [pnpm](https://pnpm.io/installation) to bootstrap the example:
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | ```bash
â”‚   â”‚   | pnpm create next-app --example https://github.com/vercel/examples/tree/main/solutions/blog blog
â”‚   â”‚   | ```
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | Then, run Next.js in development mode:
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | ```bash
â”‚   â”‚   | pnpm dev
â”‚   â”‚   | ```
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | Deploy it to the cloud with [Vercel](https://vercel.com/templates) ([Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/deploying)).
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ code_structure.txt

â”‚   â”‚   | ============================================================
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | blog/
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ middleware.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (middleware.ts) ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | import type { NextRequest } from 'next/server';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | const locales = ['en', 'fr', 'es', 'it', 'de', 'hy', 'ru', 'ar'];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | export function middleware(req: NextRequest) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   const { pathname } = req.nextUrl;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   // Skip if the path already has a locale
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   const pathnameIsMissingLocale = locales.every(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     (locale) => !pathname.startsWith(`/${locale}/`) && pathname !== `/${locale}`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   if (pathnameIsMissingLocale) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     // 1. Get Country Code from Vercel Header (or default to US)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     const country = req.headers.get('x-vercel-ip-country') || 'US';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     // 2. Map Country to Language
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     const countryMap: Record<string, string> = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       AM: 'hy', // Armenia
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       RU: 'ru', // Russia
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       FR: 'fr', // France
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       IT: 'it', // Italy
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       DE: 'de', // Germany
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       ES: 'es', // Spain
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       SA: 'ar', // Saudi Arabia
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       EG: 'ar', // Egypt
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     const locale = countryMap[country] || 'en';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     // 3. Redirect
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     return NextResponse.redirect(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       new URL(`/${locale}${pathname}`, req.url)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | export const config = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   matcher: [
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     // Skip all internal paths (_next, static, etc.)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     // Skip all files with extensions (svg, png, json, etc.)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     // ğŸ‘‡ ADDED: Skip the .well-known directory
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     '/((?!api|_next/static|_next/image|favicon.ico|logo.gif|.well-known|.*\\..*).*)',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   ],
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | };

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |   async redirects() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     return [
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |       // FIX: Redirects the base /project path to /blog
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |       {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         source: '/project',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         destination: '/blog',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         permanent: true, // 301 Permanent Redirect
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |       },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |       {

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |       },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |       {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         source: '/f/:slug',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         destination: '/blog/:slug',

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   â”œâ”€â”€ core.py
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | import os
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | # Configuration: What to skip and what to read
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | EXCLUDE = {'.git', 'node_modules', '__pycache__', '.next', '.env', 'package-lock.json'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | EXTENSIONS = ('.js', '.ts', '.tsx', '.py', '.json', '.md', '.css')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | def extract_project(path, output_file="core_code_structure.txt"):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     with open(output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as out:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         for root, dirs, files in os.walk(path):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             # Filter directories and files
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             dirs[:] = [d for d in dirs if d not in EXCLUDE]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             files = [f for f in files if f not in EXCLUDE]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             # Calculate indentation and print directory
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             rel_path = os.path.relpath(root, path)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             indent = "  " * (0 if rel_path == "." else rel_path.count(os.sep) + 1)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             out.write(f"\n{indent}[DIR] {os.path.basename(root)}/\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             for file in files:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 out.write(f"{indent}  â”œâ”€â”€ {file}\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 # Only extract content if it matches extensions
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 if file.lower().endswith(EXTENSIONS):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     file_path = os.path.join(root, file)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     try:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             content = f.read()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             # Indent file content for readability
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             prefix = f"{indent}  | "
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             out.write(f"{prefix}--- START ---\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             out.write("".join([f"{prefix}{line}\n" for line in content.splitlines()]))
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             out.write(f"{prefix}--- END ---\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     except Exception as e:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         out.write(f"{indent}  | [ERROR: {e}]\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | if __name__ == "__main__":
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     import sys
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     target = sys.argv[1] if len(sys.argv) > 1 else "."
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     extract_project(target)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     print(f"Extraction complete for: {target}")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   â”œâ”€â”€ .npmrc
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   â”œâ”€â”€ next-env.d.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | /// <reference types="next" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | /// <reference types="next/image-types/global" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | import "./.next/dev/types/routes.d.ts";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | // NOTE: This file should not be edited
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | // see https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/config/typescript for more information.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   â”œâ”€â”€ README.md
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | pnpm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade" && git push -u origin main    
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | # Portfolio Blog Starter
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | This is a porfolio site template complete with a blog. Includes:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | - MDX and Markdown support
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | - Optimized for SEO (sitemap, robots, JSON-LD schema)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | - RSS Feed
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | - Dynamic OG images
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | - Syntax highlighting
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | - Tailwind v4
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | - Vercel Speed Insights / Web Analytics
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | - Geist font
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | ## Demo
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | https://portfolio-blog-starter.vercel.app
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | ## How to Use
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | You can choose from one of the following two methods to use this repository:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | ### One-Click Deploy
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | Deploy the example using [Vercel](https://vercel.com?utm_source=github&utm_medium=readme&utm_campaign=vercel-examples):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | [![Deploy with Vercel](https://vercel.com/button)](https://vercel.com/new/clone?repository-url=https://github.com/vercel/examples/tree/main/solutions/blog&project-name=blog&repository-name=blog)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | ### Clone and Deploy
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | Execute [`create-next-app`](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/tree/canary/packages/create-next-app) with [pnpm](https://pnpm.io/installation) to bootstrap the example:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | ```bash
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | pnpm create next-app --example https://github.com/vercel/examples/tree/main/solutions/blog blog
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | ```
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | Then, run Next.js in development mode:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | ```bash
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | pnpm dev
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | ```
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | Deploy it to the cloud with [Vercel](https://vercel.com/templates) ([Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/deploying)).
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   â”œâ”€â”€ code_structure.txt

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   â”œâ”€â”€ postcss.config.js
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | module.exports = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |   plugins: {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     '@tailwindcss/postcss': {},
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |   },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   â”œâ”€â”€ extract.py
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | import os
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | import sys
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | from pathlib import Path
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | # --- Configuration Constants ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | # Directories to ignore during extraction (e.g., binaries, caches, dependencies)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | EXCLUDE_DIRS = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     'node_modules', '.next', '.git',  
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     '__pycache__', '.pytest_cache', 'venv', 'dist', 'build', '.vscode', 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     '.idea', 'tmp', 'temp', 'logs'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | # Files to ignore (e.g., secrets, lock files, system configuration)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | EXCLUDE_FILES = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     '.env', '.env.local', '.gitignore', 'package-lock.json', 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     'yarn.lock', 'pnpm-lock.yaml', 'Thumbs.db', '.DS_Store'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | # Extensions of files whose content should be extracted
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | CODE_EXTENSIONS = (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     '.js', '.jsx', '.ts', '.tsx', '.css', '.scss', '.less', 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     '.json', '.html', '.htm', '.py', '.md', '.java', '.go', 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     '.c', '.cpp', '.h', '.txt', '.xml', '.yaml', '.yml', 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     '.sh', '.toml', '.lock'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | # --- Main Logic ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | def print_directory_structure(startpath, output_file=None):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     """
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     Recursively prints directory structure with file contents.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     Args:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         startpath (str): Root directory to scan
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         output_file (str, optional): File to write output to. Defaults to None (prints to console).
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     """
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     output_stream = None
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     if output_file:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         try:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             # Open file with UTF-8 encoding for broad compatibility
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             output_stream = open(output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         except IOError as e:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             print(f"Error opening output file '{output_file}': {e}")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             return
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     def write_output(text):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         if output_stream:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             output_stream.write(text + '\n')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         else:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             print(text)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     # Normalize startpath for clean relative path calculations
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     startpath = os.path.abspath(startpath)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     write_output(f"Project Structure and Content for: {os.path.basename(startpath)}")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     write_output("=" * 60 + "\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     for root, dirs, files in os.walk(startpath):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         # Exclude directories in-place
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         dirs[:] = [d for d in dirs if d not in EXCLUDE_DIRS]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         # Calculate depth level relative to the startpath
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         relative_root = os.path.relpath(root, startpath)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         level = relative_root.count(os.sep) if relative_root != '.' else 0
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         # Indentation for the directory name
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         dir_indent = 'â”‚   ' * level + ('â”œâ”€â”€ ' if level > 0 else '')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         # Print directory name
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         write_output(f"{dir_indent}{os.path.basename(root)}/")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         # Indentation for file names within this directory
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         file_indent = 'â”‚   ' * (level + 1) + 'â”œâ”€â”€ '
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         for file in files:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |             if file not in EXCLUDE_FILES:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 file_path = os.path.join(root, file)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 # Print file name
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 write_output(f"{file_indent}{file}")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 # Check if file content should be extracted
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                 if file_path.lower().endswith(CODE_EXTENSIONS):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     # Consistent indentation prefix for content lines
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     CONTENT_PREFIX = 'â”‚   ' * (level + 2) + '| ' 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     try:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         write_output(f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}--- FILE CONTENT START ({file}) ---")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         # Use universal read 'r' with specified encoding
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as content_file:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             content = content_file.read()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             # Prepend the content prefix to every line
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             content_lines = content.split('\n')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             formatted_content = '\n'.join([f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}{line}" for line in content_lines])
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             write_output(formatted_content)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                             
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         write_output(f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}--- FILE CONTENT END ---")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         write_output('')  # Empty line after content block
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     except UnicodeDecodeError:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                          write_output(f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}[ERROR READING FILE: Skipping due to non-UTF-8 binary content or encoding issues]")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                          write_output('')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                     except Exception as e:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         # Handle other errors like permission denied
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         write_output(f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}[ERROR READING FILE: {str(e)}]")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |                         write_output('')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     if output_stream:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         output_stream.close()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | if __name__ == "__main__":
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     if len(sys.argv) < 2:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         print("Usage: python project_code_extractor.py <project_directory> [output_file]")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         sys.exit(1)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     project_dir = sys.argv[1]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     output_file = sys.argv[2] if len(sys.argv) > 2 else "code_structure.txt"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     if not os.path.isdir(project_dir):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         print(f"Error: Directory '{project_dir}' does not exist.")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         sys.exit(1)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     print(f"Starting extraction from: {project_dir}")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     print_directory_structure(project_dir, output_file)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     if os.path.exists(output_file):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         print(f"Extraction complete. Structure saved to: {output_file}")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |     else:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   |         print("Extraction failed or output file could not be created.")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   [DIR] app/
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     â”œâ”€â”€ robots.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | import { baseUrl } from 'app/sitemap'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | export default function robots() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   return {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     rules: [
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         userAgent: '*',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     ],
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     sitemap: `${baseUrl}/sitemap.xml`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     â”œâ”€â”€ favicon.ico

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     â”œâ”€â”€ .DS_Store
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     â”œâ”€â”€ ClientContentWrapper.tsx

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | // This component provides the necessary client context (Providers) and wraps the main content.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | export function ClientContentWrapper({
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   children,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }: {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   children: React.ReactNode;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     <Providers> 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       <main className="flex-auto min-w-0 mt-6 flex flex-col px-2 md:px-0">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         <Navbar />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         {children}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         <Footer />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         <Analytics />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         <SpeedInsights />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       </main>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     </Providers>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | --- END ---

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .dark .prose h4 {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   @apply text-neutral-50;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | /* 3. Strong Text (Bolding) */
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .prose strong {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   @apply font-medium text-neutral-900;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .dark .prose strong {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   @apply text-neutral-50;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | /* 4. Lists (ul, ol) */
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .prose ul,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .prose ol {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   @apply pl-6 text-neutral-800;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .dark .prose ul,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .dark .prose ol {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   @apply text-neutral-200;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .prose ul {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   @apply list-disc;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .prose ol {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   @apply list-decimal;

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | /* --- LAYOUT & SCROLLBARS --- */

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | .prose > :first-child {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   margin-top: 1.25em !important;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   margin-bottom: 1.25em !important;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | pre::-webkit-scrollbar {

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   scrollbar-width: none;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | /* Remove Safari input shadow on mobile */
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | input[type='text'],
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | input[type='email'] {

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     â”œâ”€â”€ actions.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | // app/actions.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 'use server';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | // --- 1. Internal Helper: Get Spotify Token ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | export async function getAccessToken() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const refresh_token = process.env.SPOTIFY_REFRESH_TOKEN;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const client_id = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const client_secret = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   if (!refresh_token || !client_id || !client_secret) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     return { error: "Missing Spotify environment variables" };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const basic = Buffer.from(`${client_id}:${client_secret}`).toString('base64');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const response = await fetch('https://accounts.spotify.com/api/token', {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     method: 'POST',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       Authorization: `Basic ${basic}`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     body: new URLSearchParams({
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       grant_type: 'refresh_token',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       refresh_token,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     }),
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   return response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | // --- 2. Playlist Feature: Fetch Metadata & Vibe Stats ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | export async function fetchPlaylistMetadata(url: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const { access_token } = await getAccessToken();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   if (!access_token) return { error: "No access token" };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     // Parse Playlist ID from URL
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const match = url.match(/playlist\/([a-zA-Z0-9]+)/);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (!match) return { error: "Invalid Spotify URL" };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const playlistId = match[1];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     // Fetch Playlist Details
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const res = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/$${playlistId}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}` },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (!res.ok) return { error: "Failed to fetch playlist" };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     // Extract Artists
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const artists = data.tracks.items
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       .map((item: any) => item.track?.artists[0]?.name)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       .filter(Boolean);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     // Fetch Audio Features for "Vibe Stats" (Limit 20)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const trackIds = data.tracks.items
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |        .slice(0, 20)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |        .map((t: any) => t.track?.id)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |        .filter(Boolean)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |        .join(',');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     let tempo = 0, energy = 0, mood = "Neutral";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (trackIds) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       const featuresRes = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/audio-features?ids=$${trackIds}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |          headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}` },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       const featuresData = await featuresRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       if (featuresData.audio_features) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |          const validFeatures = featuresData.audio_features.filter((f: any) => f);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |          if (validFeatures.length > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             const totalTempo = validFeatures.reduce((acc: number, curr: any) => acc + curr.tempo, 0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             const totalEnergy = validFeatures.reduce((acc: number, curr: any) => acc + curr.energy, 0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             const totalValence = validFeatures.reduce((acc: number, curr: any) => acc + curr.valence, 0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             tempo = Math.round(totalTempo / validFeatures.length);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             energy = Math.round((totalEnergy / validFeatures.length) * 100);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             const avgValence = totalValence / validFeatures.length;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             if (avgValence > 0.6 && energy > 70) mood = "Party ğŸ‰";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             else if (avgValence > 0.6) mood = "Happy â˜€ï¸";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             else if (avgValence < 0.4 && energy < 40) mood = "Melancholy ğŸŒ§ï¸";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             else if (energy > 80) mood = "High Voltage âš¡";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |             else mood = "Chill â˜•";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |          }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       id: data.id,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       name: data.name,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | artists: Array.from(new Set(artists)),
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       tempo,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       energy,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       mood
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     console.error(e);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     return { error: "Failed to load playlist" };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | // --- 3. Playlist Feature: Analyze Discovery Score ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | export async function analyzePlaylistDiscovery(playlistId: string, playlistName: string, artists: string[]) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const { access_token } = await getAccessToken();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   if (!access_token) return { error: "No access token" };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const sampleArtists = artists.slice(0, 10);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   let discoveryCount = 0;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const checks = await Promise.all(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     sampleArtists.map(async (artist) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         const query = `${artist} ${playlistName}`;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         const res = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |           `https://api.spotify.com/v1/search?q=$${encodeURIComponent(query)}&type=playlist&limit=50`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |           { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}` } }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         return data.playlists?.items || [];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         return [];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   checks.forEach((searchResults) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (!Array.isArray(searchResults)) return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const validResults = searchResults.filter(item => item !== null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const isFound = validResults.some((pl: any) => 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         pl.id === playlistId || 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         (pl.name && pl.name.toLowerCase() === playlistName.toLowerCase())
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (isFound) discoveryCount++;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   const percentage = Math.round((discoveryCount / sampleArtists.length) * 100);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   let score = percentage > 70 ? 100 : percentage;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   let rating = "Bad ğŸ”»";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   if (score >= 70) rating = "Amazing ğŸš€";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   else if (score >= 40) rating = "Good ğŸŒŸ";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   else if (score >= 10) rating = "Okay ğŸ˜";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   return {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     score,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     percentage,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     rating,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     analyzed_count: sampleArtists.length
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | // --- 4. Reverse Game Feature: Get Mystery Track (Deezer) ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | export async function getMysteryTrack(artistName: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const searchRes = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       `https://api.deezer.com/search/artist?q=${encodeURIComponent(artistName)}`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const searchData = await searchRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (!searchData.data || searchData.data.length === 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       return { error: "Artist not found" };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const normalize = (str: string) => str.toLowerCase().trim();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const targetName = normalize(artistName);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     let artist = searchData.data.find((a: any) => normalize(a.name) === targetName);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (!artist) artist = searchData.data.find((a: any) => normalize(a.name).includes(targetName));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (!artist) artist = searchData.data[0];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const tracksData = await tracksRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const validTracks = tracksData.data.filter((t: any) => t.preview);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     if (!validTracks || validTracks.length < 3) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         return { error: "Not enough songs found for this artist." };

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const correctIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * validTracks.length);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const correctTrack = validTracks[correctIndex];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const distractors: any[] = [];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const usedIndices = new Set([correctIndex]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     while (distractors.length < 2) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       const idx = Math.floor(Math.random() * validTracks.length);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       if (!usedIndices.has(idx)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         distractors.push(validTracks[idx]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |         usedIndices.add(idx);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     const options = [correctTrack, ...distractors].map(t => ({
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       id: t.id,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       title: t.title,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       isCorrect: t.id === correctTrack.id
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     }));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     options.sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       artistName: artist.name,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       trackName: correctTrack.title,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       albumArt: correctTrack.album.cover_xl,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       previewUrl: correctTrack.preview,

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |       options: options
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   } catch (e) {

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | export default async function sitemap() {

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |   // Generate blog paths for all languages

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const itemsXml = allBlogs
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .sort((a, b) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (new Date(a.metadata.publishedAt) > new Date(b.metadata.publishedAt)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         return -1
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       return 1
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .map(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       (post) =>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         `<item>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <title>${post.metadata.title}</title>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <link>${baseUrl}/blog/${post.slug}</link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <description>${post.metadata.summary || ''}</description>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <pubDate>${new Date(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             post.metadata.publishedAt
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           ).toUTCString()}</pubDate>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </item>`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .join('\n')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const rssFeed = `<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   <rss version="2.0">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <channel>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <title>My Portfolio</title>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <link>${baseUrl}</link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <description>This is my portfolio RSS feed</description>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ${itemsXml}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </channel>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   </rss>`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return new Response(rssFeed, {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       'Content-Type': 'text/xml',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | function LanguageSwitcher({ currentLang }: { currentLang: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const pathname = usePathname();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const locales = [
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { code: 'en', label: 'EN' },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { code: 'fr', label: 'FR' },

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { code: 'ar', label: 'Ø¹Ø±Ø¨' },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { code: 'ru', label: 'Ğ Ğ£' },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { code: 'es', label: 'ES' },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { code: 'it', label: 'IT' },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { code: 'de', label: 'DE' }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   ];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const getRedirectedPath = (locale: string) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (!pathname) return `/${locale}`;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const segments = pathname.split('/');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // Fix: Ensure we don't end up with double slashes or missing segments
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     segments[1] = locale;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return segments.join('/') || `/${locale}`;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     function handleClickOutside(event: MouseEvent) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (containerRef.current && !containerRef.current.contains(event.target as Node)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setIsOpen(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (isOpen) document.addEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return () => document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, [isOpen]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="relative flex items-center" ref={containerRef}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         className="flex items-center gap-1 text-xs font-bold text-neutral-500 hover:text-neutral-900 dark:hover:text-neutral-100 transition-colors uppercase"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <FaGlobe className="text-sm" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {currentLang}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {isOpen && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="absolute right-0 top-[calc(100%+12px)] grid grid-cols-2 gap-1 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 p-2 rounded-xl shadow-2xl z-[100] min-w-[140px]">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {locales.map((loc) => (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <Link
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               key={loc.code}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               href={getRedirectedPath(loc.code)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               prefetch={false} // Prevent heavy background loading of all languages
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               className={`px-2 py-2 text-[10px] text-center rounded-md transition-colors ${
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 currentLang === loc.code 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   ? 'bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 text-blue-500 font-bold' 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   : 'hover:bg-neutral-50 dark:hover:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               }`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {loc.label}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           ))}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function Navbar({ lang }: { lang: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [dict, setDict] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const pathname = usePathname() || '/';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // FIX 1: Better dictionary loading with fallback to 'en'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     let isMounted = true;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const loadDict = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         const m = await import(`../../dictionaries/${lang}.json`);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         if (isMounted) setDict(m.default.nav);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       } catch {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         const fallback = await import(`../../dictionaries/en.json`);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         if (isMounted) setDict(fallback.default.nav);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     loadDict();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return () => { isMounted = false; };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, [lang]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!dict) return <aside className="h-16" />; // Return placeholder to prevent layout shift
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const navItems = [
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { path: `/${lang}`, name: dict.home },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { path: `/${lang}/blog`, name: dict.blog },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { path: `/${lang}/radio`, name: dict.radio },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { path: `/${lang}/videos`, name: dict.videos },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { path: `/${lang}/about`, name: dict.about },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { path: `/${lang}/puzzle`, name: dict.puzzle },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     { path: `/${lang}/contact`, name: dict.contact },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   ];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const renderLinks = (isMobile: boolean) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return navItems.map(({ path, name }) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const isActive = pathname === path || (path.includes('/blog') && pathname.startsWith(path));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const baseClasses = `
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         transition-all py-1 px-3 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ${isActive ? 'font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100' : 'font-normal text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         hover:text-neutral-800 dark:hover:text-neutral-200
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ${isMobile ? 'block w-full text-lg py-3' : 'inline-block text-sm'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       `;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <Link key={path} href={path} className={baseClasses} onClick={() => isMobile && setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {name}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <aside className="mb-16 tracking-tight">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="lg:sticky lg:top-20 z-40">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <nav className="flex flex-col relative" id="nav">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex justify-between items-center w-full py-1">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <Link href={`/${lang}`}><Logo /></Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="hidden md:flex flex-row items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {renderLinks(false)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <LanguageSwitcher currentLang={lang} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <ThemeToggle />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <button
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 aria-label="Toggle Menu"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onClick={() => setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 className="md:hidden p-2 text-2xl text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {isMobileMenuOpen ? <FaTimes /> : <FaBars />}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className={`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               md:hidden w-full transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               ${isMobileMenuOpen ? 'max-h-screen opacity-100 py-4' : 'max-h-0 opacity-0 overflow-hidden'} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               flex flex-col space-y-2 border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             `}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {renderLinks(true)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </nav>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </aside>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | function CustomLink(props: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let href = props.href
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (href.startsWith('/')) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <Link href={href} {...props}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {props.children}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (href.startsWith('#')) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return <a {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | function Code({ children, ...props }: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let codeHTML = highlight(children)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return <code dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: codeHTML }} {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | function slugify(str: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return str
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .toString()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .toLowerCase()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .trim()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .replace(/\s+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .replace(/&/g, '-and-')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .replace(/[^\w\-]+/g, '')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     .replace(/\-\-+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | function createHeading(level: number) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const Heading = ({ children }: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     let slug = slugify(children)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return React.createElement(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       `h${level}`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       { id: slug },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       [
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         React.createElement('a', {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           href: `#${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           key: `link-${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className: 'anchor',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         }),
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ],
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       children
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   Heading.displayName = `Heading${level}`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return Heading
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // --- COMPONENT REGISTRATION ---

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | let components = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   h1: createHeading(1),

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export async function PlaylistStats({ id }: { id: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let playlist;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     playlist = await getPlaylist(id);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (playlist.error) throw new Error(playlist.error.message);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     console.error("Spotify Error:", e);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="p-4 my-8 border border-red-200 rounded-lg bg-red-50 text-red-600 dark:bg-red-900/20 dark:border-red-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <p className="font-bold">Spotify Data Unavailable</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <p className="text-sm">Could not fetch playlist stats. Check API credentials.</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const artistNames = playlist.tracks.items.map((item: any) => item.track?.artists[0]?.name);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // 1. Get Followers
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const followers = playlist.followers.total;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // 2. Calculate "Discoverability" (Avg Track Popularity 0-100)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const tracks = playlist.tracks.items;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const avgPopularity = Math.round(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     tracks.reduce((acc: number, item: any) => acc + (item.track?.popularity || 0), 0) / 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     (tracks.length || 1)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="my-10 p-6 rounded-2xl bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 shadow-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-6 items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         Cover Image

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-2 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">{playlist.name}</h3>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Metric: Followers

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ MusicCTA.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | "use client"; // â¬…ï¸ Must stay at the top!
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import React from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // Make the component accept label, background color, and URL as props
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export default function MusicCTA({ 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     albumUrl, 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     label, 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     baseColor, 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     hoverColor 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }: { 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     albumUrl: string; 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     label: string; 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     baseColor: string; 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     hoverColor: string; 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const baseStyle: React.CSSProperties = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     display: 'inline-block',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     padding: '12px 24px',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     fontSize: '1.1rem',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     fontWeight: 'bold',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     color: '#fff',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     backgroundColor: baseColor, 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     borderRadius: '6px',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     textDecoration: 'none',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     transition: 'background-color 0.3s',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div style={{ textAlign: 'center', marginTop: '2rem', marginBottom: '2rem' }}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <a 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         href={albumUrl} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         target="_blank" 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         rel="noopener noreferrer"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         style={baseStyle}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         // Event handlers now work
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         onMouseOver={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = hoverColor}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = baseColor}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {label}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </a>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ DelayedSubscribePopup.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // src/components/DelayedSubscribePopup.jsx (or wherever you keep your components)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import Link from 'next/link';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { sendGTMEvent } from '@next/third-parties/google';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // Your original SubscribeCTA content, slightly modified to be the *content*
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // of the popup rather than the popup itself.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | function SubscribeCTAContent() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <section className="bg-neutral-900 text-white text-center py-12 px-4 rounded-lg shadow-2xl relative">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <h2 className="text-3xl sm:text-4xl font-bold mb-4 tracking-tight">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         Stay Updated on Arman Ayva Projects
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <p className="text-lg mb-6 max-w-lg mx-auto text-neutral-300">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         Subscribe to receive the latest news, releases, and collaboration opportunities from 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <strong className="text-white"> Arman Ayva â€“ Montreal Jazz Composer</strong>. Discover new tracks and upcoming projects first!
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <Link
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         href="/other/subscribe"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         target="_blank"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         rel="noopener noreferrer"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         className="inline-block bg-sky-500 hover:bg-sky-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-8 rounded-lg text-lg transition-colors duration-300 shadow-xl"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         onClick={() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         sendGTMEvent({ event: 'conversion_click', action: 'subscribe_cta' })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |          }}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <p className="text-sm mt-3 text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         Your email will only be used for Arman Ayva project updates.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </section>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // The main component that implements the delayed popup logic
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function DelayedSubscribePopup() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const DELAY_TIME_MS = 30000; // 10 seconds
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // 1. Set a timer to show the popup
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const timer = setTimeout(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setIsVisible(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }, DELAY_TIME_MS);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // 2. Clear the timeout if the component unmounts (cleanup)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return () => clearTimeout(timer);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, []); // Empty dependency array means this runs only once on mount
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Optional: Function to close the popup manually
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const closePopup = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsVisible(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!isVisible) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return null; // Don't render anything if it's not visible
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // Backdrop for the modal
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black bg-opacity-75 p-4" onClick={closePopup}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {/* Container for the content, stopping propagation prevents closing when clicking the content */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         className="relative max-w-xl w-full transform transition-all duration-300 scale-100 opacity-100" 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <SubscribeCTAContent />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Close button */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           onClick={closePopup}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className="absolute top-2 right-2 text-white hover:text-gray-300 text-2xl font-bold p-1 leading-none transition-colors"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           aria-label="Close subscription popup"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           &times;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // Example usage in a page component:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // export default function HomePage() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | //   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | //     <>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | //       <main>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | //         {/* Other page content */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | //       </main>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | //       <DelayedSubscribePopup /> {/* This will appear after 10 seconds */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | //     </>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | //   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ footer.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import Link from 'next/link';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { FaSpotify, FaInstagram, FaFacebook, FaYoutube, FaTiktok } from 'react-icons/fa';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { SiLinktree, SiX } from 'react-icons/si';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | interface FooterProps {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   lang: string;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export  function Footer({ lang }: FooterProps) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <footer className="mt-24 border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 pt-10 pb-16 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-700">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="mx-auto max-w-2xl px-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
