â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | "use client"; // â¬…ï¸ THIS IS CRUCIAL
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import React from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // Use Tailwind classes here for a clean separation from MDX
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export default function BandcampCTA({ albumUrl }: { albumUrl: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Define the base and hover styles using standard React state/hooks if necessary, 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // but for simple hover effects, Tailwind classes are much easier.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Using inline styles for direct color manipulation like your original request:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const baseStyle: React.CSSProperties = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     display: 'inline-block',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     padding: '12px 24px',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     fontSize: '1.1rem',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     fontWeight: 'bold',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     color: '#fff',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     backgroundColor: '#262626', // Base color
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     borderRadius: '6px',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     textDecoration: 'none',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     transition: 'background-color 0.3s',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div style={{ textAlign: 'center', marginTop: '2rem', marginBottom: '2rem' }}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <a 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         href={albumUrl} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         target="_blank" 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         rel="noopener noreferrer"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         style={baseStyle}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         // The event handlers now work because this component is marked "use client"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         onMouseOver={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = '#1a1a1a'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = '#262626'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ğŸ§ Listen & Buy on Bandcamp
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </a>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ BpmDetective.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // app/components/BpmDetective.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client'; // [cite: 214]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { getBpmGameTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { FaPlay, FaSearch, FaTrophy } from 'react-icons/fa';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function BpmDetective() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [mounted, setMounted] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [track, setTrack] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [guess, setGuess] = useState(120);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [gameState, setGameState] = useState<'idle' | 'playing' | 'result'>('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const audioRef = useRef<HTMLAudioElement | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => { setMounted(true); }, []); // [cite: 1957]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!mounted) return null;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const startNewGame = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLoading(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const data = await getBpmGameTrack();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (data.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       alert(data.error);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setTrack(data);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setGameState('playing');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLoading(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const checkGuess = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGameState('result');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (audioRef.current) audioRef.current.pause();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const diff = track ? Math.abs(guess - track.bpm) : 0;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const isCorrect = diff <= 5;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="p-8 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-3xl shadow-lg">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {gameState === 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="text-center py-10">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onClick={startNewGame}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={loading}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="px-10 py-4 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-2xl font-bold hover:bg-blue-700 transition-all active:scale-95 disabled:opacity-50"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {loading ? 'Analyzing Vibe...' : 'Start BPM Challenge'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {track && gameState !== 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="space-y-8 animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex flex-col items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <img src={track.albumArt} alt="Album" className="w-48 h-48 rounded-xl shadow-2xl mb-4 object-cover" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <p className="font-bold text-lg">{track.name}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <p className="text-neutral-500 text-sm">{track.artist}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <audio ref={audioRef} src={track.previewUrl} autoPlay loop />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {gameState === 'playing' ? (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="space-y-6">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <input 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 type="range" min="60" max="180" value={guess} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onChange={(e) => setGuess(parseInt(e.target.value))}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 className="w-full h-3 bg-neutral-200 dark:bg-neutral-800 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer accent-blue-600"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="text-5xl font-mono font-bold text-center">{guess} <span className="text-sm">BPM</span></div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <button onClick={checkGuess} className="w-full py-4 bg-neutral-900 dark:bg-white text-white dark:text-black rounded-xl font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 Submit Guess
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="text-center space-y-4 pt-4 border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className={`text-4xl font-bold ${isCorrect ? 'text-green-500' : 'text-red-500'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {isCorrect ? 'ğŸ¯ Bullseye!' : 'ğŸ“‰ Off Beat'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <p className="text-xl">Actual: <span className="font-mono font-bold">{track.bpm} BPM</span></p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <button onClick={startNewGame} className="mt-4 text-blue-500 font-bold hover:underline flex items-center gap-2 mx-auto">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <FaSearch /> Play Next Track
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ ThemeToggle.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useTheme } from 'next-themes';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { FaSun, FaMoon } from 'react-icons/fa'; 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function ThemeToggle() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [mounted, setMounted] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const { theme, setTheme } = useTheme();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // useEffect runs only on the client side, ensuring correct hydration
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => setMounted(true), []);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!mounted) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // Return an empty div or placeholder to prevent layout shift during hydration
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return <div className="w-6 h-6" />; 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const isDark = theme === 'dark';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <button
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       aria-label="Toggle Dark Mode"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       type="button"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       className="w-6 h-6 flex items-center justify-center text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 hover:text-neutral-900 dark:hover:text-neutral-100 transition-colors"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       onClick={() => setTheme(isDark ? 'light' : 'dark')}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {isDark ? <FaSun className="w-5 h-5" /> : <FaMoon className="w-5 h-5" />}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ ReverseGame.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import Image from 'next/image';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { getMysteryTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { FaXmark } from 'react-icons/fa6';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function ReverseGame() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [artistInput, setArtistInput] = useState('');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [trackData, setTrackData] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [gameState, setGameState] = useState<'idle' | 'loading' | 'playing' | 'won' | 'lost' | 'timeout'>('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [selectedOptionId, setSelectedOptionId] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [error, setError] = useState('');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [timeLeft, setTimeLeft] = useState(15);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const audioContextRef = useRef<AudioContext | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const sourceNodeRef = useRef<AudioBufferSourceNode | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const originalBufferRef = useRef<AudioBuffer | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const reversedBufferRef = useRef<AudioBuffer | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Initialize Audio Context on first user interaction or mount
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const initAudio = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (!audioContextRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         const AudioCtx = window.AudioContext || (window as any).webkitAudioContext;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         audioContextRef.current = new AudioCtx();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     window.addEventListener('mousedown', initAudio, { once: true });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       audioContextRef.current?.close();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     let timer: NodeJS.Timeout;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (gameState === 'playing' && timeLeft > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       timer = setInterval(() => setTimeLeft((prev) => prev - 1), 1000);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else if (timeLeft === 0 && gameState === 'playing') {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setGameState('timeout');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       playAudio('normal');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return () => clearInterval(timer);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, [gameState, timeLeft]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const resetGame = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setTrackData(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSelectedOptionId(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setError('');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setTimeLeft(15);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleSearch = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGameState('loading');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setError('');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setTrackData(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSelectedOptionId(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const data = await getMysteryTrack(artistInput);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (data.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setError(data.error);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setTrackData(data);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // Ensure absolute URL or proxy handling for the previewUrl
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       await loadAndReverseAudio(data.previewUrl);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setTimeLeft(15); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setGameState('playing');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       playAudio('reversed'); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } catch (err) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setError("Failed to fetch track. Try another artist.");
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const loadAndReverseAudio = async (url: string) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const response = await fetch(url);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const arrayBuffer = await response.arrayBuffer();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (!audioContextRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |          const AudioCtx = window.AudioContext || (window as any).webkitAudioContext;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |          audioContextRef.current = new AudioCtx();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // Resume context if suspended (browser security)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (audioContextRef.current.state === 'suspended') {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         await audioContextRef.current.resume();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const audioBuffer = await audioContextRef.current.decodeAudioData(arrayBuffer);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       originalBufferRef.current = audioBuffer;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const reversedBuffer = audioContextRef.current.createBuffer(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         audioBuffer.numberOfChannels,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         audioBuffer.length,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         audioBuffer.sampleRate
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       for (let i = 0; i < audioBuffer.numberOfChannels; i++) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         const channelData = audioBuffer.getChannelData(i);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         const reversedData = reversedBuffer.getChannelData(i);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         for (let j = 0; j < channelData.length; j++) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           reversedData[j] = channelData[channelData.length - 1 - j];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       reversedBufferRef.current = reversedBuffer;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } catch (err) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setError("Could not process audio.");
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       throw err;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const playAudio = (type: 'reversed' | 'normal') => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (!audioContextRef.current || !reversedBufferRef.current || !originalBufferRef.current) return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const source = audioContextRef.current.createBufferSource();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     source.buffer = type === 'reversed' ? reversedBufferRef.current : originalBufferRef.current;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     source.connect(audioContextRef.current.destination);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     source.start();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     sourceNodeRef.current = source;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const stopAudio = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (sourceNodeRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         sourceNodeRef.current.stop();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         sourceNodeRef.current.disconnect();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       } catch (e) {}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       sourceNodeRef.current = null;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleGuess = (option: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (gameState !== 'playing') return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSelectedOptionId(option.id);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (option.isCorrect) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setGameState('won');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       playAudio('normal'); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setGameState('lost');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="relative max-w-xl mx-auto p-6 bg-neutral-900 text-white rounded-2xl shadow-2xl border border-neutral-800 overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {gameState !== 'idle' && gameState !== 'loading' && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           onClick={resetGame}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className="absolute top-4 right-4 p-2 rounded-full bg-neutral-800 hover:bg-red-900/40 text-neutral-400 hover:text-red-500 transition-all z-20"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <FaXmark size={18} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="text-center mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-400 to-pink-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           âª Reverse Audio Challenge
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="flex flex-col gap-4 mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <input 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           type="text"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           value={artistInput}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           onChange={(e) => setArtistInput(e.target.value)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           onKeyDown={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleSearch()}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           placeholder="e.g. Nirvana..."
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className="w-full bg-black/50 border border-neutral-700 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 focus:outline-none focus:border-purple-500"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           onClick={handleSearch}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           disabled={gameState === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className="w-full bg-purple-600 hover:bg-purple-700 font-bold px-6 py-3 rounded-lg transition-all active:scale-95 disabled:opacity-50"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {gameState === 'loading' ? 'Loading Track...' : 'Start Game'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {error && <div className="text-red-400 text-center mb-4">{error}</div>}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {trackData && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {gameState === 'playing' && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="flex justify-between text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-400 mb-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  <span>Time Remaining</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  <span className={timeLeft < 5 ? "text-red-500 animate-pulse" : "text-white"}>{timeLeft}s</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="w-full h-2 bg-neutral-800 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <div 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   className={`h-full transition-all duration-1000 ease-linear ${timeLeft < 5 ? 'bg-red-500' : 'bg-purple-500'}`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   style={{ width: `${(timeLeft / 15) * 100}%` }}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex justify-center mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               className="relative w-40 h-40 bg-black rounded-xl border border-neutral-700 overflow-hidden cursor-pointer hover:border-purple-500 transition-colors group"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               onClick={() => playAudio('reversed')}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {['won', 'lost', 'timeout'].includes(gameState) ? (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <Image src={trackData.albumArt} alt="Album" fill className="object-cover" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-full text-4xl">â“</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                {!['won', 'lost', 'timeout'].includes(gameState) && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-black/40 group-hover:bg-black/10 transition-colors">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    <span className="text-2xl">ğŸ”Š</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 gap-3">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {trackData.options.map((option: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               let btnClass = "p-4 rounded-xl font-semibold transition-all border border-neutral-700 bg-neutral-800 hover:bg-neutral-700 text-left px-6";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               if (['won', 'lost', 'timeout'].includes(gameState)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 if (option.isCorrect) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   btnClass = "p-4 rounded-xl font-bold bg-green-600/20 border-green-500 text-green-400 px-6";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 } else if (selectedOptionId === option.id) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   btnClass = "p-4 rounded-xl bg-red-900/20 border-red-800 text-red-400 opacity-50 px-6";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   btnClass = "p-4 rounded-xl bg-neutral-900 border-neutral-800 text-neutral-600 opacity-30 px-6";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <button
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   key={option.id}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   onClick={() => handleGuess(option)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   disabled={['won', 'lost', 'timeout'].includes(gameState)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   className={btnClass}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   {option.title}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             })}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {(gameState === 'won' || gameState === 'lost' || gameState === 'timeout') && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="mt-8 pt-6 border-t border-neutral-800 text-center animate-in slide-in-from-top-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  onClick={handleSearch} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  className="bg-white text-black font-bold px-8 py-3 rounded-full hover:bg-neutral-200 transition-colors"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  Play Next Round
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ Logo.tsx
