â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ posts.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import Link from 'next/link'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { formatDate } from 'app/[lang]/blog/utils'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // app/components/posts.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { getBlogPosts } from 'app/[lang]/blog/utils'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function BlogPosts({ lang }: { lang: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Ensure lang exists before calling the function
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!lang) return null; 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let allBlogs = getBlogPosts(lang);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // app/components/posts.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {allBlogs
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         .sort((a, b) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           if (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             new Date(a.metadata.publishedAt) > new Date(b.metadata.publishedAt)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           ) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             return -1
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           return 1
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         .map((post) => (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <Link
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             key={post.slug}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="flex flex-col space-y-1 mb-4"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             href={`/blog/${post.slug}`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="w-full flex flex-col md:flex-row space-x-0 md:space-x-2 text-neutral-400" >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {/* FIX 1: Changed dark:text-neutral-400 to dark:text-neutral-50 for white date text */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <p className="text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-50 w-[150px] tabular-nums">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {formatDate(post.metadata.publishedAt, false)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {/* FIX 2: Changed dark:text-neutral-100 to dark:text-neutral-50 for white title text */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <p className="tracking-tight text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {post.metadata.title}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ))}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ SmartLink.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import Link from 'next/link';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import React, { ReactNode } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // Define the props for our smart link component
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | interface SmartLinkProps {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   href: string;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   children: ReactNode;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   className?: string;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   onClick?: () => void; // Optional click handler (for things like closing a menu)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | /**
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |  * A reusable component that intelligently renders either:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |  * 1. An internal Next.js <Link> component (for internal navigation).
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |  * 2. A standard <a> tag with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer" 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |  * (for external URLs, preventing popup/security issues).
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |  */
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function SmartLink({ href, children, className, onClick }: SmartLinkProps) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Check if the link starts with 'http://', 'https://', or 'mailto:'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const isExternal = 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     href.startsWith('http://') || 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     href.startsWith('https://') || 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     href.startsWith('mailto:');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (isExternal) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // Render a standard <a> tag for external links
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <a
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         href={href}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         className={className}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         target="_blank" // Opens in a new tab
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         rel="noopener noreferrer" // Essential security attributes
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         onClick={onClick} // Pass through the click handler (optional)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {children}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </a>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Render the Next.js Link component for internal links
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <Link href={href} className={className} onClick={onClick}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {children}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ PuzzleCTA.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import Link from 'next/link';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { FaYoutube, FaPlay } from 'react-icons/fa';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export default function PuzzleCTA() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto my-16 p-1 bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 via-blue-500 to-purple-600 rounded-3xl shadow-2xl transition-transform hover:scale-[1.01]">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 rounded-[calc(1.5rem-1px)] p-8 sm:p-12 flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center gap-8">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="flex-1 space-y-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1 rounded-full bg-red-100 dark:bg-red-900/30 text-red-600 dark:text-red-400 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <span className="relative flex h-2 w-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <span className="animate-ping absolute inline-flex h-full w-full rounded-full bg-red-400 opacity-75"></span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <span className="relative inline-flex rounded-full h-2 w-2 bg-red-500"></span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             New Interactive Experience
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <h2 className="text-4xl font-serif font-bold tracking-tight text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             The YouTube Rhythm Puzzle
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <p className="text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 text-lg leading-relaxed">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             I built a custom tool that turns any YouTube video into a musical jigsaw. 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Can you reassemble your favorite tracks by ear?
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <Link 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   href="/puzzle" // Remove the # here
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   className="inline-flex items-center gap-3 px-8 py-4 bg-red-600 text-white rounded-xl font-bold hover:bg-red-700 transition-all shadow-xl active:translate-y-1"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   <FaPlay size={14} /> Start Playing
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="w-full md:w-64 h-48 bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 rounded-2xl border-4 border-white dark:border-neutral-700 shadow-inner flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden group">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |            <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-2 p-4 w-full opacity-40 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {[1,2,3,4].map(i => (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <div key={i} className="h-12 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 rounded-lg shadow-sm" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               ))}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |            </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |            <FaYoutube className="absolute text-5xl text-red-600 drop-shadow-lg group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ KeyGame.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { getMusicalJazzTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { FaRotateRight, FaPlay, FaStop, FaYoutube, FaMusic, FaTrophy, FaFire, FaCircleInfo } from 'react-icons/fa6';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | const KEYS = ['C Major', 'G Major', 'F Major', 'D Minor', 'A Minor', 'Bb Major'];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | const KEY_MAP: Record<string, string> = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   'ycXxiJdXSbw': 'C Major',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   '09BB1pP9Vvg': 'Bb Major',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   '8S5S5A7K_y8': 'G Major',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function KeyGame() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [video, setVideo] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [guess, setGuess] = useState<string | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isCorrect, setIsCorrect] = useState<boolean | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [actualKey, setActualKey] = useState<string>('');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [score, setScore] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [streak, setStreak] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Core function to load and start music
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const fetchAndPlay = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLoading(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGuess(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsCorrect(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // 1. Reset playing state to force a fresh iframe load
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsPlaying(false); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const data = await getMusicalJazzTrack();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (data && !data.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setVideo(data);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const key = KEY_MAP[data.videoId] || KEYS[Math.floor(Math.random() * KEYS.length)];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setActualKey(key);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // 2. Automatically start playback
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setIsPlaying(true); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLoading(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // Optional: Load first track on component mount
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // Note: Most browsers require one initial click on the page 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // before autoplay works, so the very first load might need a "Start" click.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleGuess = (selectedKey: string) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (guess) return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const correct = selectedKey === actualKey;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGuess(selectedKey);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsCorrect(correct);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (correct) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setScore(s => s + 100);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setStreak(s => s + 1);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setStreak(0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="p-8 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-3xl shadow-xl max-w-2xl mx-auto my-12">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {/* Scoreboard */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-black p-4 rounded-2xl border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 shadow-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-amber-500 font-bold">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <FaTrophy /> <span>Score: {score}</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-orange-500 font-bold">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <FaFire className={streak > 0 ? "animate-bounce" : ""} /> 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <span>Streak: {streak}</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold font-serif text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50 flex items-center gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <FaYoutube className="text-red-600" /> Key Detective
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           onClick={fetchAndPlay} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           disabled={loading}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className="p-2 hover:bg-neutral-200 dark:hover:bg-neutral-800 rounded-full transition-colors"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <FaRotateRight className={loading ? "animate-spin" : ""} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {!video ? (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button onClick={fetchAndPlay} className="w-full py-20 border-2 border-dashed border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-2xl flex flex-col items-center gap-4 hover:border-blue-500 transition-colors">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="p-4 bg-blue-500 text-white rounded-full shadow-lg"><FaPlay className="ml-1" /></div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <span className="font-bold text-neutral-500">Start the Music Arcade</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="space-y-6">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="relative aspect-video bg-black rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl border border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {isPlaying ? (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <iframe
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 width="100%" height="100%"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 src={`https://www.youtube.com/embed/${video.videoId}?autoplay=1&controls=0&start=45&enablejsapi=1`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 allow="autoplay" className="opacity-40 pointer-events-none"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-600">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <FaMusic className="text-4xl" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <button onClick={() => setIsPlaying(!isPlaying)} className="px-6 py-2 bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 text-white rounded-full font-bold flex items-center gap-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-all">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {isPlaying ? <><FaStop /> Stop</> : <><FaPlay /> Listen</>}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-3 gap-3">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {/* ... Key buttons remain the same ... */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {KEYS.map((key) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isUserChoice = guess === key;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isTheCorrectAnswer = actualKey === key && guess !== null;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <button
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   key={key}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   disabled={guess !== null}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   onClick={() => handleGuess(key)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   className={`py-4 rounded-xl font-bold border-2 transition-all ${
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     isTheCorrectAnswer 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       ? 'bg-green-500 border-green-600 text-white scale-105 z-10' 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       : isUserChoice && !isCorrect
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                         ? 'bg-red-500 border-red-600 text-white opacity-90' 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                         : 'bg-white dark:bg-black border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 text-neutral-400 hover:border-blue-500 disabled:opacity-40'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   }`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   {key}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             })}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {guess && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className={`p-6 rounded-2xl text-center animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-top-4 border ${isCorrect ? 'bg-green-50 border-green-200 text-green-800' : 'bg-red-50 border-red-200 text-red-800'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <h4 className="text-2xl font-black mb-1">{isCorrect ? "BRILLIANT! ğŸ¯" : "NOT QUITE ğŸ“‰"}</h4>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {!isCorrect && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <p className="font-bold mb-3 flex items-center justify-center gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    <FaCircleInfo /> The correct answer was {actualKey}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onClick={fetchAndPlay} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 className="px-8 py-2 bg-neutral-900 text-white dark:bg-white dark:text-neutral-900 rounded-full font-bold text-sm hover:scale-105 transition-transform"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 Next Track â†’
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ PlaylistDiscovery.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useState } from 'react'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { analyzePlaylistDiscovery } from '../actions'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | interface PlaylistDiscoveryProps {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   id: string
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   name: string
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   artists: string[]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function PlaylistDiscovery({ id, name, artists }: PlaylistDiscoveryProps) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [data, setData] = useState<any>(null)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null) // New Error State
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleAnalyze = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLoading(true)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setError(null)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const result = await analyzePlaylistDiscovery(id, name, artists)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // Check if the server returned an error
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (result.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setError("Spotify API Error: " + result.error)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setData(result)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setError("Failed to connect to analysis server.")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       console.error(e)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLoading(false)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="my-8 border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 pt-8">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between items-start sm:items-center gap-4 mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <h3 className="font-semibold text-lg text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Discovered On Analysis
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </h3>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <p className="text-neutral-500 text-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Analyze the impact of this playlist on artist discovery
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {!data && !error && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <button
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onClick={handleAnalyze}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={loading}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="px-4 py-2 bg-neutral-900 dark:bg-neutral-100 text-white dark:text-black text-sm font-medium rounded-full hover:opacity-80 disabled:opacity-50 transition-all"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {loading ? 'Analyzing...' : 'Analyze'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {/* ERROR MESSAGE DISPLAY */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {error && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="p-4 rounded-xl bg-red-50 dark:bg-red-900/20 border border-red-200 dark:border-red-800 text-red-600 dark:text-red-400 text-sm mb-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <strong>Error:</strong> {error} <br/>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <span className="text-xs opacity-80">Check your server logs or environment variables.</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {/* SUCCESS DATA DISPLAY */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {data && !error && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-2 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-4 text-xs text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <span className="w-2 h-2 rounded-full bg-green-500 animate-pulse"/>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Last analyzed less than a minute ago
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {/* Metric 1: Percentage */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="p-4 rounded-xl bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="text-sm font-medium text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 Artists in Discovered On
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {data.percentage}%
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="mt-2 text-xs text-neutral-500 leading-relaxed">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 The percentage of artists in this playlist who have this playlist in their 'Discovered On' section.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {/* Metric 2: Score */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="p-4 rounded-xl bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="flex justify-between items-start">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  <div className="text-sm font-medium text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     Discovery Score
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  <div className={`text-xs font-bold px-2 py-1 rounded-full border 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     ${data.score >= 70 ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-700 border-green-200' : 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       data.score >= 40 ? 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 border-blue-200' : 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       'bg-orange-100 text-orange-700 border-orange-200'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     {data.rating}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {data.score}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="mt-2 text-xs text-neutral-500 leading-relaxed">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 A score from 0-100 that indicates the playlist's effectiveness at breaking new artists.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {/* Score Bar */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="mt-3 h-1.5 w-full bg-neutral-200 dark:bg-neutral-800 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <div 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   className={`h-full rounded-full transition-all duration-1000 ${
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     data.score >= 70 ? 'bg-green-500' : 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     data.score >= 40 ? 'bg-blue-500' : 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     'bg-orange-500'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   }`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   style={{ width: `${data.score}%` }}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ PlaylistUrlInput.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useState } from 'react'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // This import will now work because we added the function above
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { fetchPlaylistMetadata } from '../actions'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { PlaylistDiscovery } from './PlaylistDiscovery'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export default function PlaylistUrlInput() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |    const [url, setUrl] = useState('')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |    const [data, setData] = useState<any>(null)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |    const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |    const handleLoad = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (!url) return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setLoading(true)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setError(null)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setData(null)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const result = await fetchPlaylistMetadata(url);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (result.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |          setError(result.error)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |          setData(result)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setLoading(false)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |    }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |    return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="w-full max-w-2xl mx-auto my-12">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {/* Header */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="text-center mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                Playlist Analyzer
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <p className="text-neutral-500 mt-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                Paste a Spotify link to calculate its discovery score.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {/* Input Field */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-3">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              <input 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 className="flex-1 p-3 rounded-xl border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black dark:focus:ring-white outline-none transition-all"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 placeholder="https://open.spotify.com/playlist/..."
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 value={url}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onChange={(e) => setUrl(e.target.value)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onKeyDown={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleLoad()}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onClick={handleLoad}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 disabled={loading || !url}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 className="px-6 py-3 bg-black dark:bg-white text-white dark:text-black font-bold rounded-xl hover:opacity-80 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-all"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {loading ? 'Loading...' : 'Load Playlist'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {/* Error Message */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {error && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              <div className="mt-4 p-4 bg-red-50 text-red-600 rounded-xl border border-red-100 text-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 ğŸš¨ {error}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {/* Success Result */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {data && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              <div className="mt-8 animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <div className="p-4 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 rounded-t-2xl border-x border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 flex justify-between items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    <div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       <span className="text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-neutral-500 font-semibold">Analyzed Playlist</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       <div className="font-bold text-lg text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">{data.name}</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       onClick={() => setData(null)} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       className="text-xs text-neutral-400 hover:text-red-500"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       Clear
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {/* Vibe Stats Bar */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <div className="grid grid-cols-3 divide-x divide-neutral-200 dark:divide-neutral-800 bg-white dark:bg-black border-x border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <div className="p-4 text-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                         <div className="text-xs text-neutral-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold mb-1">Avg Tempo</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                         <div className="text-xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">{data.tempo} BPM</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <div className="p-4 text-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                         <div className="text-xs text-neutral-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold mb-1">Mood</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                         <div className="text-xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 whitespace-nowrap">{data.mood}</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <div className="p-4 text-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                         <div className="text-xs text-neutral-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold mb-1">Energy</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                         <div className="text-xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">{data.energy}%</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {/* Embed the Existing Analyzer */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <div className="bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-b-2xl p-6 shadow-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    <PlaylistDiscovery 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       id={data.id} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       name={data.name} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       artists={data.artists} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                    />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |    )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ YoutubeBpmGame.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { useState } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { getYoutubeGameTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { FaCheck, FaRotateRight, FaXmark } from 'react-icons/fa6'; // Using FaXmark for the cancel icon
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function YoutubeBpmGame() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [video, setVideo] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [guess, setGuess] = useState(120);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [gameState, setGameState] = useState<'idle' | 'playing' | 'result'>('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [targetBpm, setTargetBpm] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const startNext = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLoading(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const data = await getYoutubeGameTrack();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (data) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setVideo(data);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // Pseudo-random BPM for demo; in production, this should come from your database
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setTargetBpm(Math.floor(Math.random() * (160 - 70 + 1)) + 70); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setGameState('playing');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLoading(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // --- NEW: Stop Music / Cancel Function ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const stopGame = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setVideo(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGuess(120);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleSubmit = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setGameState('result');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const diff = Math.abs(guess - targetBpm);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const isClose = diff <= 5;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="relative p-8 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-3xl bg-white dark:bg-black text-black dark:text-white text-center shadow-xl overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {/* --- CANCEL ICON (Only shows when music/video is active) --- */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {video && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           onClick={stopGame}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className="absolute top-4 right-4 p-2 rounded-full bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-900 hover:bg-red-100 dark:hover:bg-red-900/30 text-neutral-500 hover:text-red-600 transition-colors z-10"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           title="Stop Music"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <FaXmark size={20} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {gameState === 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="py-10">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onClick={startNext} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={loading}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white px-10 py-4 rounded-2xl font-bold transition-all active:scale-95 disabled:opacity-50"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {loading ? "Initializing..." : "Start YouTube BPM Challenge ğŸ“º"}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {video && gameState !== 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="space-y-6 animate-in fade-in zoom-in duration-300">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="aspect-video w-full rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl border border-neutral-800 bg-neutral-900">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {/* The iframe automatically stops when the "video" state is set to null */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <iframe
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               width="100%"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               height="100%"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               src={`https://www.youtube.com/embed/${video.videoId}?autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               allow="autoplay"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               className="pointer-events-none"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <h3 className="text-lg font-medium text-neutral-500 pr-8">{video.title}</h3>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {gameState === 'playing' ? (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 p-6 rounded-2xl border border-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="flex justify-between text-xs font-bold text-neutral-400 mb-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <span>60 BPM</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <span>180 BPM</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <input 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 type="range" min="60" max="180" value={guess} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onChange={(e) => setGuess(parseInt(e.target.value))}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 className="w-full h-3 bg-neutral-200 dark:bg-neutral-800 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer accent-red-600 mb-4" 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <p className="text-6xl font-black font-mono text-red-600 mb-6">{guess}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onClick={handleSubmit}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 className="w-full bg-black dark:bg-white text-white dark:text-black py-4 rounded-xl font-bold flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <FaCheck /> Submit Guess
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="py-6 space-y-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className={`text-5xl font-black ${isClose ? 'text-green-500' : 'text-red-500'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 {isClose ? 'PERFECT!' : 'NOT QUITE'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <p className="text-xl">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 Actual: <span className="font-bold">{targetBpm} BPM</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 onClick={startNext} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 className="flex items-center gap-2 mx-auto text-blue-500 font-bold hover:underline pt-4"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <FaRotateRight /> Play Another Track
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       â”œâ”€â”€ contact-form.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import React, { useState } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // Define the shape of the form data
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | interface FormData {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   name: string;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   email: string;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   message: string;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export function ContactForm() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [formData, setFormData] = useState<FormData>({
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     name: '',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     email: '',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     message: '',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [status, setStatus] = useState<'idle' | 'loading' | 'success' | 'error'>('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [message, setMessage] = useState<string>('');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement>) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setFormData({
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ...formData,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       [e.target.name]: e.target.value,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     e.preventDefault();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setStatus('loading');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setMessage('');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const response = await fetch('/api/contact', {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         method: 'POST',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           'Content-Type': 'application/json',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         body: JSON.stringify(formData),
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const result = await response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (response.ok) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setStatus('success');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setMessage(result.message || 'Message sent successfully! I will be in touch soon.');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setFormData({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); // Clear form
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setStatus('error');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setMessage(result.message || 'Failed to send message. Please check your inputs.');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       console.error('Submission error:', error);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setStatus('error');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setMessage('A network error occurred. Please try again.');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const getStatusMessage = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (status === 'loading') return 'Sending...';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (status === 'success') return message;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (status === 'error') return message;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return '';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <div className="max-w-xl mx-auto py-10">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {/* Form Status Message */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {status !== 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className={`p-4 mb-6 rounded-lg font-medium transition-opacity ${
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             status === 'success' ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800 dark:bg-green-900 dark:text-green-200' :
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             status === 'error' ? 'bg-red-100 text-red-800 dark:bg-red-900 dark:text-red-200' :
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             'bg-neutral-100 text-neutral-800 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-neutral-200'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           }`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {getStatusMessage()}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="space-y-6">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Name Input */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <label htmlFor="name" className="block text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Name
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </label>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <input
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             type="text"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             id="name"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             name="name"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             value={formData.name}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             required
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow disabled:opacity-70"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Email Input */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <label htmlFor="email" className="block text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Email
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </label>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <input
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             type="email"

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             name="email"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             value={formData.email}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             required
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow disabled:opacity-70"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Message Textarea */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <label htmlFor="message" className="block text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             Message
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </label>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <textarea
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             id="message"

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             value={formData.message}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             required
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow resize-none disabled:opacity-70"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Submit Button */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           type="submit"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           className="w-full flex justify-center items-center py-3 px-6 border border-transparent rounded-xl shadow-sm text-lg font-medium text-white bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500 transition-colors duration-200 disabled:bg-blue-400 dark:disabled:bg-blue-800"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {status === 'loading' ? (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <svg className="animate-spin -ml-1 mr-3 h-5 w-5 text-white" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <circle className="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="4"></circle>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <path className="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </svg>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             'Send Message'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </form>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---
