â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [playingId, setPlayingId] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isBuffering, setIsBuffering] = useState(false); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [seconds, setSeconds] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [selectedIdx, setSelectedIdx] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [lastMovedIdx, setLastMovedIdx] = useState<number | null>(null); // NEW: For landing highlight
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [isPlayerReady, setIsPlayerReady] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [bestTime, setBestTime] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [listenedPieces, setListenedPieces] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const [warning, setWarning] = useState<string | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const ytPlayerRef = useRef<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const localAudioRef = useRef<HTMLAudioElement | null>(null); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const timerRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const ytTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const searchCache = useRef<Record<string, any[]>>({});
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const lastSearchTime = useRef<number>(0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const savedBest = localStorage.getItem('puzzle_best_time');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (savedBest) setBestTime(parseInt(savedBest));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const timer = setTimeout(() => { loadOfflinePuzzle(); }, 300);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return () => clearTimeout(timer);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const onPlayerStateChange = (event: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (event.data === 3) setIsBuffering(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       else setIsBuffering(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const initYT = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (window.YT && window.YT.Player) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ytPlayerRef.current = new window.YT.Player('yt-hidden-player', {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           height: '0', width: '0', videoId: '',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           playerVars: { 'controls': 0, 'disablekb': 1, 'enablejsapi': 1 },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           events: { 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             'onReady': () => setIsPlayerReady(true),
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             'onStateChange': onPlayerStateChange 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (!window.YT) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const tag = document.createElement('script');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       tag.src = "https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api";
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       firstScriptTag.parentNode?.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = initYT;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else { initYT(); }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handleSearch = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     e.preventDefault();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const query = searchQuery.trim().toLowerCase();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (!query) return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const now = Date.now();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (now - lastSearchTime.current < 1500) return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     lastSearchTime.current = now;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (searchCache.current[query]) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSearchResults(searchCache.current[query]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsSearching(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setHasSearched(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const res = await fetch(`/api/youtube/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const results = Array.isArray(data) ? data : [];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       searchCache.current[query] = results;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSearchResults(results);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } catch (err) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSearchResults([]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } finally { setIsSearching(false); }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const selectYouTubeTrack = (video: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (!isPlayerReady && sourceMode !== 'offline') return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setHasSearched(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSearchResults([]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSearchQuery('');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSourceMode('youtube');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setTrackInfo({ name: video.name, artist: video.artist, image: video.image, url: `https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=${video.id}` });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.loadVideoById === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytPlayerRef.current.loadVideoById(video.id);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const initial = CORRECT_ORDER.map(id => ({ id }));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     shuffleAndStart(initial);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const loadOfflinePuzzle = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSourceMode('offline');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setTrackInfo({
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       name: "Girl from Italy", artist: "Arman Ayva",
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       image: "https://res.cloudinary.com/dpmkshcky/image/upload/v1763230260/Cowboy_a3mnzs.png",
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       url: "https://armanayva.bandcamp.com"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const initial = CORRECT_ORDER.map(id => ({ id, localAudioUrl: `/audio/segment-${id + 1}.mp3` }));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     shuffleAndStart(initial);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const shuffleAndStart = (basePieces: PuzzlePiece[]) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsSolved(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSeconds(0);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setLastMovedIdx(null); // Reset highlight
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setListenedPieces(new Set()); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setWarning(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     // âœ… GUARANTEED SCRAMBLE LOGIC
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     let shuffled = [...basePieces];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     let isCorrectAtStart = true;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     while (isCorrectAtStart) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       shuffled = [...shuffled].sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // Check if current permutation matches the solution
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       isCorrectAtStart = JSON.stringify(shuffled.map(p => p.id)) === JSON.stringify(CORRECT_ORDER);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setPieces(shuffled);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (timerRef.current) clearInterval(timerRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     timerRef.current = setInterval(() => setSeconds(s => s + 1), 1000);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const stopAudio = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (ytTimeoutRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       clearTimeout(ytTimeoutRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytTimeoutRef.current = null;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       try { ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo(); } catch (e) {}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (localAudioRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       localAudioRef.current.pause();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       localAudioRef.current.currentTime = 0;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       localAudioRef.current = null;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setPlayingId(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setIsBuffering(false);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const playSegment = (piece: PuzzlePiece) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setListenedPieces(prev => new Set(prev).add(piece.id));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     setWarning(null); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (playingId === piece.id) { stopAudio(); return; }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (sourceMode === 'youtube' && ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.seekTo === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const startTime = piece.id * SEGMENT_DURATION;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (ytTimeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(ytTimeoutRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytPlayerRef.current.seekTo(startTime, true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytPlayerRef.current.playVideo();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setPlayingId(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       ytTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         stopAudio(); 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }, SEGMENT_DURATION * 1000);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else if (sourceMode === 'offline' && piece.localAudioUrl) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const audio = new Audio(piece.localAudioUrl);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       localAudioRef.current = audio;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setPlayingId(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       audio.play().catch(() => {});
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       audio.onended = () => { setPlayingId(null); localAudioRef.current = null; };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   const handlePieceClick = (index: number) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (isSolved) return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const pieceId = pieces[index].id;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     if (selectedIdx === null) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (!listenedPieces.has(pieceId)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setWarning("Dont cheat, play first! ğŸ·");
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setTimeout(() => setWarning(null), 2000);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         return;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSelectedIdx(index);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else if (selectedIdx === index) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // âœ… SWAP LOGIC WITH HIGHLIGHT
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const updated = [...pieces];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const temp = updated[selectedIdx];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       updated[selectedIdx] = updated[index];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       updated[index] = temp;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setPieces(updated);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // âœ… TRIGGER TEMPORARY HIGHLIGHT
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setLastMovedIdx(index);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       setTimeout(() => setLastMovedIdx(null), 800);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (JSON.stringify(updated.map(p => p.id)) === JSON.stringify(CORRECT_ORDER)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         setIsSolved(true);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         if (timerRef.current) clearInterval(timerRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         const savedBest = localStorage.getItem('puzzle_best_time');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         if (!savedBest || seconds < parseInt(savedBest)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           localStorage.setItem('puzzle_best_time', seconds.toString());
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           setBestTime(seconds);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         sendGTMEvent({ event: 'puzzle_complete', action: 'music_puzzle_success', value: seconds });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     <section className="my-8 p-4 sm:p-8 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-2xl shadow-xl relative">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div id="yt-hidden-player" className="hidden"></div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {warning && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="absolute top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-[100] bg-red-600 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded-full font-bold shadow-2xl animate-bounce flex items-center gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <FaExclamationTriangle /> {warning}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <h2 className="text-xl sm:text-2xl font-serif font-bold flex items-center gap-3 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {sourceMode === 'youtube' ? <FaYoutube className="text-red-600" /> : <FaMusic className="text-blue-500" />}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           Music Puzzle
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <button onClick={() => shuffleAndStart(pieces)} className="text-[10px] font-bold uppercase text-neutral-500 bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 px-2 py-1 rounded hover:text-blue-500 transition-colors">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           Reshuffle Game
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div className="mb-8 space-y-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <form onSubmit={handleSearch} className="relative z-50">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <input 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               type="text" value={searchQuery} onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               placeholder="Search YouTube Song..."
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 text-sm rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-red-500"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <button type="submit" className="px-4 bg-red-600 text-white rounded-xl hover:bg-red-700 transition-all shadow-md">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {isSearching ? <FaSpinner className="animate-spin" /> : <FaSearch />}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           {hasSearched && searchQuery !== '' && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="absolute left-0 right-0 top-full mt-2 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl shadow-2xl z-50 max-h-60 overflow-y-auto">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               {searchResults.length > 0 ? searchResults.map((video: any) => (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <button key={video.id} onClick={() => selectYouTubeTrack(video)} className="w-full flex items-center gap-3 p-3 hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 text-left border-b last:border-none dark:border-neutral-700">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <img src={video.image} className="w-12 h-8 object-cover rounded shadow-sm" alt="" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <div className="truncate text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <p className="font-bold text-xs truncate">{video.name}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <p className="text-[10px] text-neutral-500">{video.artist}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               )) : <div className="p-4 text-center text-xs text-neutral-500">No videos found.</div>}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </form>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {!isSolved && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <button onClick={loadOfflinePuzzle} className="py-3 px-4 flex items-center justify-center gap-3 bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-xl hover:border-blue-500 transition-all text-sm font-bold text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <FaMusic className="text-blue-500" /> Play Offline Demo
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <button onClick={() => selectYouTubeTrack(DEMO_VIDEO)} disabled={!isPlayerReady} className={`py-3 px-4 flex items-center justify-center gap-3 bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-xl transition-all text-sm font-bold text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 ${!isPlayerReady ? 'opacity-50 cursor-wait' : 'hover:border-red-500'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <FaYoutube className="text-red-500" /> {isPlayerReady ? 'Play "Take Five"' : 'Loading YT...'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {pieces.length > 0 && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="animate-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-black p-3 rounded-xl border border-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="flex items-center gap-3 truncate">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <img src={trackInfo.image} className="w-10 h-10 rounded-lg object-cover" alt="" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               <div className="truncate">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <p className="text-[9px] font-bold text-red-600 uppercase tracking-widest leading-none mb-1">Now Playing</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <p className="text-sm font-bold truncate max-w-[120px] sm:max-w-none text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50">{trackInfo.name}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div className="flex items-center gap-3 shrink-0">

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <p className="text-[8px] uppercase font-black text-neutral-400 leading-none mb-1">Time</p>

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                {bestTime && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  <div className="text-right border-l pl-3 border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <p className="text-[8px] uppercase font-black text-green-500 flex items-center gap-1 justify-end leading-none mb-1">Best <FaTrophy size={8}/></p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <span className="font-mono text-xs text-green-500 font-bold">{bestTime}s</span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                <button onClick={() => shuffleAndStart(pieces)} className="p-2 text-neutral-400 hover:text-blue-500"><FaUndo size={14} /></button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-3 sm:gap-4">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             {pieces.map((piece, index) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isCorrect = piece.id === index;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isSelected = selectedIdx === index;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isHighlight = lastMovedIdx === index; // NEW: Feedback check
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const hasListened = listenedPieces.has(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               const isCurrentlyBuffering = playingId === piece.id && isBuffering;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 <div 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   key={piece.id} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   onClick={() => handlePieceClick(index)} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   className={`relative p-3 sm:p-5 border-2 rounded-xl transition-all duration-300 flex flex-col items-center gap-3 cursor-pointer ${
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     isSelected ? 'border-blue-500 bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/30 scale-95 shadow-inner' : 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     isHighlight ? 'border-yellow-400 bg-yellow-50 dark:bg-yellow-900/40 ring-4 ring-yellow-400/20' : // HIGHLIGHT STYLE
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     isCorrect ? 'border-green-500 bg-green-50/50 dark:bg-green-900/20' : 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     'bg-white dark:bg-black border-dashed border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   } ${!hasListened && !isSolved ? 'opacity-70 grayscale-[0.5]' : ''}`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   {isCurrentlyBuffering && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <div className="absolute inset-0 z-10 flex items-center justify-center bg-white/60 dark:bg-black/60 rounded-xl">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       <FaSpinner className="animate-spin text-blue-500" size={24} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <div className="w-full flex flex-col items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     {isSelected ? <FaExchangeAlt className="text-blue-500 mb-2 animate-pulse" /> : 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                      <span className="text-2xl mb-1">{isCorrect ? 'âœ…' : hasListened ? 'ğŸ§©' : 'â“'}</span>}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     <span className="text-[9px] font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       {isCorrect ? `Part ${piece.id + 1}` : hasListened ? `Piece ${index + 1}` : 'Play to Unlock'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     </span>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   <button 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     onClick={(e) => { e.stopPropagation(); playSegment(piece); }} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     className={`w-10 h-10 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center shadow-md transition-all ${
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       playingId === piece.id ? 'bg-red-600 text-white animate-pulse' : 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                       hasListened ? 'bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-600' : 'bg-neutral-800 text-white'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     }`}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                     {playingId === piece.id ? <FaPause size={14} /> : <FaPlay size={14} className="ml-0.5" />}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                   </button>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |               );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             })}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       {isSolved && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div className="text-center mt-8 animate-in fade-in zoom-in duration-700 pt-6 border-t border-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <p className="p-3 text-green-700 dark:text-green-400 font-bold text-sm mb-4 uppercase tracking-tighter font-serif">âœ¨ Solved in {seconds}s! âœ¨</p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <MusicCTA label={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "Watch Full on YouTube" : "Listen on Bandcamp"} albumUrl={trackInfo.url} baseColor={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "#FF0000" : "#00bfff"} hoverColor={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "#CC0000" : "#0080ff"} />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     </section>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- END ---

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | const client_id = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID;

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   console.log("ğŸ”‘ [Spotify] Checking credentials...");
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!client_id) console.error("âŒ [Spotify] Missing SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID");
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   if (!client_secret) console.error("âŒ [Spotify] Missing SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET");
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     method: 'POST',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     headers: {

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // 2. Debug: Check if token request worked

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return {};

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return data;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return { error: { message: "No access token" } };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     cache: 'no-store', // Disable cache while debugging

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // 3. Debug: Check if playlist request worked

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     const text = await response.text();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     console.error("   Details:", text);

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     return { error: { message: `Failed to fetch: ${response.statusText}` } };
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return data;

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const client_secret = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET;

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   return data.access_token;

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | export async function GET(request: Request) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const id = searchParams.get('id');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   if (!id) return NextResponse.json({ error: 'ID is required' }, { status: 400 });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const token = await getSpotifyAccessToken();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const response = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/tracks/${id}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const track = await response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json(track);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to fetch track' }, { status: 500 });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | export async function GET(request: Request) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const query = searchParams.get('q');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const API_KEY = process.env.YOUTUBE_API_KEY;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   if (!query) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json([]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     // 1. Try to extract Video ID from URL (handles watch, shorts, youtu.be)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const videoIdMatch = query.match(/(?:v=|shorts\/|youtu\.be\/|embed\/)([a-zA-Z0-9_-]{11})/);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     if (videoIdMatch && videoIdMatch[1]) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       const videoId = videoIdMatch[1];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       const res = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |         `https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/videos?part=snippet&id=${videoId}&key=${API_KEY}`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       if (data.items && data.items.length > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |         const item = data.items[0];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |         return NextResponse.json([{
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |           id: item.id,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |           name: item.snippet.title,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |           artist: item.snippet.channelTitle,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |           image: item.snippet.thumbnails.medium?.url || item.snippet.thumbnails.default?.url,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |         }]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     // 2. If no URL match, perform a Broad Search
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const searchRes = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       `https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/search?part=snippet&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}&type=video&maxResults=5&key=${API_KEY}`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const searchData = await searchRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     // Log for debugging if search returns nothing
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     if (!searchData.items) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       console.log("YouTube API returned no items:", searchData);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       return NextResponse.json([]);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     const results = searchData.items.map((item: any) => ({
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       id: item.id.videoId,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       name: item.snippet.title,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       artist: item.snippet.channelTitle,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       image: item.snippet.thumbnails.medium?.url,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     }));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json(results);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     console.error("YT API Error:", error);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |     return NextResponse.json({ error: 'YouTube search failed' }, { status: 500 });
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | --- END ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | --- START ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | import { ImageResponse } from 'next/og'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // IMPORTANT: Define the runtime as 'edge' for this API to work correctly.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export const runtime = 'edge'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // The URL for the Cloudinary background image
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | const HERO_IMAGE_URL = 'https://res.cloudinary.com/dpmkshcky/image/upload/c_fill,g_auto,h_250,w_970/b_rgb:000000,e_gradient_fade,y_-0.50/c_scale,co_rgb:ffffff,fl_relative,l_text:montserrat_25_style_light_align_center:Your%20Funky%20Jazz,w_0.2,y_0.3/v1570237649/17160429878_68460aeb25_o-1_udg7bx.jpg'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | // The GET function MUST be async to use fetch
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | export async function GET(request: Request) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let url = new URL(request.url)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let title = url.searchParams.get('title') || 'My Musical Journey, Jazz is everywhere'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // --- 1. Fetch the External Image ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   let imageBuffer: ArrayBuffer | undefined;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       // Use fetch to get the image data
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       const response = await fetch(HERO_IMAGE_URL);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       if (response.ok) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           imageBuffer = await response.arrayBuffer();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           console.error(`Failed to fetch background image: ${response.status}`);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       console.error('Error fetching image:', error);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   // --- 2. Render the ImageResponse with the image data ---
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |   return new ImageResponse(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       <div 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         tw="flex flex-col w-full h-full items-center justify-center text-white"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         style={{
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           // Fallback background color if image fails to load
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           backgroundColor: '#000', 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         }}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |       >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Render the Image element using the fetched URL */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {imageBuffer ? (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             // Use the <img> tag and the full URL
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <img 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 src={HERO_IMAGE_URL} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 alt="Arman Ayva Background" 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |                 width={1200}

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |              // Simple fallback text if the image fails to load
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |             <div tw="text-4xl">Image Failed to Load</div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         )}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Black Overlay for Readability */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div tw="absolute inset-0 bg-black opacity-60" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {/* Content container - place it on top of the overlay */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         <div tw="relative flex flex-col w-full p-16 justify-center items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |           <h1 tw="text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight text-center max-w-4xl">

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |     }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       |         {TIKTOK_PIXEL_ID && TIKTOK_PIXEL_ID !== 'YOUR_TIKTOK_PIXEL_ID' && (

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         Arman Ayva â€“ Montreal Jazz Composer & Hobbyist ğŸ·
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       </h1>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       <div className="prose prose-neutral dark:prose-invert max-w-none">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p className="lead text-xl">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           Where modern jazz meets cinematic storytelling. Arman Ayva is a Montreal-based 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           composer whose sound merges the soul of classic jazz with the 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           freedom of funk and the mysticism of world music. 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <hr className="my-8 border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800" />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         {/* From Lens to Loops */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <h2>From Lens to Loops: A Storyboard of Sound</h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           Before I began composing jazz, my world was framed through a camera lens. As a 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <strong> photographer and amateur filmmaker</strong>, I spent years capturing visual 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           stories. Today, I use those same visual instincts to storyboard with sound. I view 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           my compositions as "invisible films," where every funky bass groove or mysterious 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           piano line serves as a camera shot, and every melody develops a cinematic plot.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         {/* The Montreal Fusion */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <h2>The Montreal Fusion: Armenian Soul meets Jazz-Funk</h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           Based in the creative crossroads of Montreal, my music is a deeply personal exploration 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           of heritage and rhythm. I bridge the warmth of <strong>Armenian folk motifs</strong> with 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           the high-energy freedom of 1970s fusion and analog synth textures. Drawing inspiration 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           from luminaries like <strong>Marcus Miller, US3, and Dave Brubeck</strong>, I craft 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           compositions that feel both timeless and contemporary.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         {/* A Studio-First Hobbyist */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <h3>A Studio-First Philosophy</h3>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           I am not a performing artist; I am a studio-focused hobbyist dedicated to the 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           architecture of sound. By focusing exclusively on production within 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <strong> Apple Logic Pro</strong>, I prioritize the intricate layering of live bass 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           and global percussion. Whether it is the narrative-driven tracks of 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <em> Criminal Case N68</em> or the soulful improvisations of <em>Happy Bundle</em>, 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           my music is an invitation to traverse new sound realms together.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         {/* Tastemaker Section */}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <h2>Beyond Composing: Curating the Vibe</h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           Creation is only half the journey. As the curator of the 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <strong> "Funky Jazz Mood Lifter"</strong> playlist on Spotify, I connect with 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           over hundreds of followers who share a passion for bass-heavy, mood-lifting instrumental 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           grooves. It is a space where I celebrate the legends of the genre alongside 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           the best new independent jazz-funk voices.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |          Funky-Jazz-Mood-Lifter â†’
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <div className="rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <iframe 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |               style={{ borderRadius: '12px' }} 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |               src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/playlist/0kQ3ZMgLoc9UoFtJz96qYa?utm_source=generator"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |               width="100%"

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | function slugify(str: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return str
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .toString()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .toLowerCase()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .trim()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .replace(/\s+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .replace(/&/g, '-and-')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .replace(/[^\w\-]+/g, '')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     .replace(/\-\-+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | function createHeading(level: number) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const Heading = ({ children }: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     let slug = slugify(children)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return React.createElement(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       `h${level}`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       { id: slug },
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       [
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         React.createElement('a', {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           href: `#${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           key: `link-${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           className: 'anchor',

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       ],
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       children
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   Heading.displayName = `Heading${level}`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return Heading
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | import fs from 'fs'
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | import path from 'path'

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | type Metadata = {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   title: string
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   publishedAt: string

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | function parseFrontmatter(fileContent: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let frontmatterRegex = /---\s*([\s\S]*?)\s*---/
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let match = frontmatterRegex.exec(fileContent)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!match) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return { metadata: {} as Metadata, content: fileContent }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let frontMatterBlock = match[1]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let content = fileContent.replace(frontmatterRegex, '').trim()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let frontMatterLines = frontMatterBlock.trim().split('\n')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let metadata: Partial<Metadata> = {}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   frontMatterLines.forEach((line) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // Improved split to handle values containing colons (like URLs)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     let firstColonIndex = line.indexOf(':')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     if (firstColonIndex > -1) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       let key = line.slice(0, firstColonIndex).trim()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       let value = line.slice(firstColonIndex + 1).trim()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       value = value.replace(/^['"](.*)['"]$/, '$1') // Remove quotes
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       metadata[key as keyof Metadata] = value
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return { metadata: metadata as Metadata, content }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | function getMDXFiles(dir: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     console.warn(`Directory not found: ${dir}`);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return [];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return fs.readdirSync(dir).filter((file) => path.extname(file) === '.mdx')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | function readMDXFile(filePath: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let rawContent = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf-8')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return parseFrontmatter(rawContent)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | function getMDXData(dir: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let mdxFiles = getMDXFiles(dir)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return mdxFiles.map((file) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     let { metadata, content } = readMDXFile(path.join(dir, file))
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // Use the filename as the slug
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     const slug = path.parse(file).name 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       .toLowerCase()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       .replace(/\s+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       .replace(/_/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       .replace(/[^\w\-]+/g, '')
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       metadata,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       slug,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       content,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | export function formatDate(date: string | null | undefined, includeRelative = false) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!date) return 'Date TBD' 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let currentDate = new Date()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // Ensure ISO format for parsing
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let dateString = date.includes('T') ? date : `${date}T00:00:00`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let targetDate = new Date(dateString)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // Calculate differences
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let fullDate = targetDate.toLocaleString('en-us', {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     month: 'long',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     day: 'numeric',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     year: 'numeric',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!includeRelative) return fullDate
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const diffInMs = currentDate.getTime() - targetDate.getTime();
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const diffInDays = Math.floor(diffInMs / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let relative = '';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (diffInDays < 1) relative = 'Today';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   else if (diffInDays < 30) relative = `${diffInDays}d ago`;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   else if (diffInDays < 365) relative = `${Math.floor(diffInDays / 30)}mo ago`;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   else relative = `${Math.floor(diffInDays / 365)}y ago`;
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return `${fullDate} (${relative})`
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | } 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | export function getBlogPosts(lang: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const targetLang = lang || 'en';
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // FIX: Based on your log, 'posts' is INSIDE 'blog'.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // We need to look into: app/[lang]/blog/posts
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // Then we find the specific language folder inside 'posts'.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   const postsPath = path.join(
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     process.cwd(),
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     'app',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     '[lang]',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     'blog',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     'posts',
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     targetLang
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   if (!fs.existsSync(postsPath)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // FALLBACK: If you didn't create subfolders for each language yet,
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     // and your .mdx files are just sitting inside 'posts' directly:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     const flatPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'app', '[lang]', 'blog', 'posts');
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     if (fs.existsSync(flatPath)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       console.log(`Found posts in flat structure: ${flatPath}`);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       return getMDXData(flatPath);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     console.error(`âŒ MDX directory not found at: ${postsPath}`);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     return [];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return getMDXData(postsPath);
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | --- END ---

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | export function BlogPosts({ lang }: { lang: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   // Fetch posts specifically for this language
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   let allBlogs = getBlogPosts(lang)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     <div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |       {allBlogs
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         .sort((a, b) => {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           if (new Date(a.metadata.publishedAt) > new Date(b.metadata.publishedAt)) {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |             return -1
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           }
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           return 1
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         })
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         .map((post) => (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           <Link
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |             key={post.slug}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |             className="flex flex-col space-y-1 mb-4"
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |             href={`/${lang}/blog/${post.slug}`} // Added lang to the URL
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           >
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |             <div className="w-full flex flex-col md:flex-row space-x-0 md:space-x-2">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |               <p className="text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 w-[100px] tabular-nums">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |                 {formatDate(post.metadata.publishedAt, false)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |               <p className="text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 tracking-tight">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |                 {post.metadata.title}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         ))}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |   )
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         | }

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   // We need to return an array of { lang, slug } for every combination
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   // to ensure all pages are pre-rendered correctly.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const params: { lang: string; slug: string }[] = [];
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const { slug, lang } = await params; // â¬…ï¸ Await the promise
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |   const post = getBlogPosts(lang).find((post) => post.slug === slug)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |             '@context': 'https://schema.org',

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |             description: summary,

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |             },

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |         }}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       />
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       <h1 className="title font-semibold text-2xl tracking-tighter text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-50 mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |         {title}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       </h1>        
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       {headerImage && (
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |         <div className="relative w-full overflow-hidden mb-8 rounded-lg" style={{ height: '250px' }}>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |           <Image

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mt-2 mb-8 text-sm">

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |           {formatDate(publishedAt)}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |           |         </p>

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           digital audio tools. 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           software library.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <h2>Royalty-Free Usage (Apple Logic Pro)</h2>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           According to **Apple Inc.â€™s Logic Pro Software License Agreement (Section C â€“ Sample Content)**, 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           all Apple-provided loops and samples are **royalty-free** for use in original compositions and 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           can be **distributed, broadcast, and monetized** as part of a complete musical or audiovisual work.
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |             â€œAll Sample Content included in the Apple Software may be used on a royalty-free basis to create your own original soundtracks for your film, video and audio projects. â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         |           </p>

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       },

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   // Define redirects for old URLs
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |   async redirects() {
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     return [
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       // FIX: Redirects the base /project path to /blog
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |       {

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | import os
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | # Configuration: What to skip and what to read
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | EXCLUDE = {'.git', 'node_modules', '__pycache__', '.next', '.env', 'package-lock.json'}
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | EXTENSIONS = ('.js', '.ts', '.tsx', '.py', '.json', '.md', '.css')

â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | def extract_project(path, output_file="core_code_structure.txt"):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     with open(output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as out:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |         for root, dirs, files in os.walk(path):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |             # Filter directories and files
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |             dirs[:] = [d for d in dirs if d not in EXCLUDE]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |             files = [f for f in files if f not in EXCLUDE]
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |             # Calculate indentation and print directory
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |             rel_path = os.path.relpath(root, path)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |             indent = "  " * (0 if rel_path == "." else rel_path.count(os.sep) + 1)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |             out.write(f"\n{indent}[DIR] {os.path.basename(root)}/\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |             for file in files:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                 out.write(f"{indent}  â”œâ”€â”€ {file}\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                 # Only extract content if it matches extensions
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                 if file.lower().endswith(EXTENSIONS):
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                     file_path = os.path.join(root, file)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                     try:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                         with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                             content = f.read()
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                             # Indent file content for readability
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                             prefix = f"{indent}  | "
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                             out.write(f"{prefix}--- START ---\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                             out.write("".join([f"{prefix}{line}\n" for line in content.splitlines()]))
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                             out.write(f"{prefix}--- END ---\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                     except Exception as e:
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |                         out.write(f"{indent}  | [ERROR: {e}]\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   | if __name__ == "__main__":
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     import sys
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     target = sys.argv[1] if len(sys.argv) > 1 else "."
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     extract_project(target)
â”‚   â”‚   | â”‚   â”‚   |     print(f"Extraction complete for: {target}")

â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (extract.py) ---
â”‚   â”‚   | import os
â”‚   â”‚   | import sys
â”‚   â”‚   | from pathlib import Path
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | # --- Configuration Constants ---
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | # Directories to ignore during extraction (e.g., binaries, caches, dependencies)
â”‚   â”‚   | EXCLUDE_DIRS = {
â”‚   â”‚   |     'node_modules', '.next', '.git',  
â”‚   â”‚   |     '__pycache__', '.pytest_cache', 'venv', 'dist', 'build', '.vscode', 
â”‚   â”‚   |     '.idea', 'tmp', 'temp', 'logs'
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | # Files to ignore (e.g., secrets, lock files, system configuration)
â”‚   â”‚   | EXCLUDE_FILES = {
â”‚   â”‚   |     '.env', '.env.local', '.gitignore', 'package-lock.json', 
â”‚   â”‚   |     'yarn.lock', 'pnpm-lock.yaml', 'Thumbs.db', '.DS_Store'
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | # Extensions of files whose content should be extracted
â”‚   â”‚   | CODE_EXTENSIONS = (
â”‚   â”‚   |     '.js', '.jsx', '.ts', '.tsx', '.css', '.scss', '.less', 
â”‚   â”‚   |     '.json', '.html', '.htm', '.py', '.md', '.java', '.go', 
â”‚   â”‚   |     '.c', '.cpp', '.h', '.txt', '.xml', '.yaml', '.yml', 
â”‚   â”‚   |     '.sh', '.toml', '.lock'
â”‚   â”‚   | )
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | # --- Main Logic ---
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | def print_directory_structure(startpath, output_file=None):
â”‚   â”‚   |     """
â”‚   â”‚   |     Recursively prints directory structure with file contents.
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     Args:
â”‚   â”‚   |         startpath (str): Root directory to scan
â”‚   â”‚   |         output_file (str, optional): File to write output to. Defaults to None (prints to console).
â”‚   â”‚   |     """
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     output_stream = None
â”‚   â”‚   |     if output_file:
â”‚   â”‚   |         try:
â”‚   â”‚   |             # Open file with UTF-8 encoding for broad compatibility
â”‚   â”‚   |             output_stream = open(output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8')
â”‚   â”‚   |         except IOError as e:
â”‚   â”‚   |             print(f"Error opening output file '{output_file}': {e}")
â”‚   â”‚   |             return
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     def write_output(text):
â”‚   â”‚   |         if output_stream:
â”‚   â”‚   |             output_stream.write(text + '\n')
â”‚   â”‚   |         else:
â”‚   â”‚   |             print(text)
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     # Normalize startpath for clean relative path calculations
â”‚   â”‚   |     startpath = os.path.abspath(startpath)
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     write_output(f"Project Structure and Content for: {os.path.basename(startpath)}")
â”‚   â”‚   |     write_output("=" * 60 + "\n")
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     for root, dirs, files in os.walk(startpath):
â”‚   â”‚   |         # Exclude directories in-place
â”‚   â”‚   |         dirs[:] = [d for d in dirs if d not in EXCLUDE_DIRS]
â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   |         # Calculate depth level relative to the startpath
â”‚   â”‚   |         relative_root = os.path.relpath(root, startpath)
â”‚   â”‚   |         level = relative_root.count(os.sep) if relative_root != '.' else 0
â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   |         # Indentation for the directory name
â”‚   â”‚   |         dir_indent = 'â”‚   ' * level + ('â”œâ”€â”€ ' if level > 0 else '')
â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   |         # Print directory name
â”‚   â”‚   |         write_output(f"{dir_indent}{os.path.basename(root)}/")
â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   |         # Indentation for file names within this directory
â”‚   â”‚   |         file_indent = 'â”‚   ' * (level + 1) + 'â”œâ”€â”€ '
â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   |         for file in files:
â”‚   â”‚   |             if file not in EXCLUDE_FILES:
â”‚   â”‚   |                 file_path = os.path.join(root, file)
â”‚   â”‚   |                 
â”‚   â”‚   |                 # Print file name
â”‚   â”‚   |                 write_output(f"{file_indent}{file}")
â”‚   â”‚   |                 
â”‚   â”‚   |                 # Check if file content should be extracted
â”‚   â”‚   |                 if file_path.lower().endswith(CODE_EXTENSIONS):
â”‚   â”‚   |                     
â”‚   â”‚   |                     # Consistent indentation prefix for content lines
â”‚   â”‚   |                     CONTENT_PREFIX = 'â”‚   ' * (level + 2) + '| ' 
â”‚   â”‚   |                     
â”‚   â”‚   |                     try:
â”‚   â”‚   |                         write_output(f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}--- FILE CONTENT START ({file}) ---")
â”‚   â”‚   |                         
â”‚   â”‚   |                         # Use universal read 'r' with specified encoding
â”‚   â”‚   |                         with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as content_file:
â”‚   â”‚   |                             content = content_file.read()
â”‚   â”‚   |                             
â”‚   â”‚   |                             # Prepend the content prefix to every line
â”‚   â”‚   |                             content_lines = content.split('\n')
â”‚   â”‚   |                             formatted_content = '\n'.join([f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}{line}" for line in content_lines])
â”‚   â”‚   |                             
â”‚   â”‚   |                             write_output(formatted_content)
â”‚   â”‚   |                             
â”‚   â”‚   |                         write_output(f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}--- FILE CONTENT END ---")
â”‚   â”‚   |                         write_output('')  # Empty line after content block
â”‚   â”‚   |                         
â”‚   â”‚   |                     except UnicodeDecodeError:
â”‚   â”‚   |                          write_output(f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}[ERROR READING FILE: Skipping due to non-UTF-8 binary content or encoding issues]")
â”‚   â”‚   |                          write_output('')
â”‚   â”‚   |                     except Exception as e:
â”‚   â”‚   |                         # Handle other errors like permission denied
â”‚   â”‚   |                         write_output(f"{CONTENT_PREFIX}[ERROR READING FILE: {str(e)}]")
â”‚   â”‚   |                         write_output('')
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     if output_stream:
â”‚   â”‚   |         output_stream.close()
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | if __name__ == "__main__":
â”‚   â”‚   |     if len(sys.argv) < 2:
â”‚   â”‚   |         print("Usage: python project_code_extractor.py <project_directory> [output_file]")
â”‚   â”‚   |         sys.exit(1)
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     project_dir = sys.argv[1]
â”‚   â”‚   |     output_file = sys.argv[2] if len(sys.argv) > 2 else "code_structure.txt"
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     if not os.path.isdir(project_dir):
â”‚   â”‚   |         print(f"Error: Directory '{project_dir}' does not exist.")
â”‚   â”‚   |         sys.exit(1)
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     print(f"Starting extraction from: {project_dir}")
â”‚   â”‚   |     print_directory_structure(project_dir, output_file)
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     if os.path.exists(output_file):
â”‚   â”‚   |         print(f"Extraction complete. Structure saved to: {output_file}")
â”‚   â”‚   |     else:
â”‚   â”‚   |         print("Extraction failed or output file could not be created.")
â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---
