â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ actions.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (actions.ts) ---
â”‚   â”‚   | // app/actions.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | 'use server';
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | // --- 1. Internal Helper: Get Spotify Token ---
â”‚   â”‚   | export async function getAccessToken() {
â”‚   â”‚   |   const refresh_token = process.env.SPOTIFY_REFRESH_TOKEN;
â”‚   â”‚   |   const client_id = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID;
â”‚   â”‚   |   const client_secret = process.env.SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET;
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!refresh_token || !client_id || !client_secret) {
â”‚   â”‚   |     return { error: "Missing Spotify environment variables" };
â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   const basic = Buffer.from(`${client_id}:${client_secret}`).toString('base64');
â”‚   â”‚   |   const response = await fetch('https://accounts.spotify.com/api/token', {
â”‚   â”‚   |     method: 'POST',
â”‚   â”‚   |     headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   |       Authorization: `Basic ${basic}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |       'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
â”‚   â”‚   |     },
â”‚   â”‚   |     body: new URLSearchParams({
â”‚   â”‚   |       grant_type: 'refresh_token',
â”‚   â”‚   |       refresh_token,
â”‚   â”‚   |     }),
â”‚   â”‚   |   });
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   return response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | // --- 2. Playlist Feature: Fetch Metadata & Vibe Stats ---
â”‚   â”‚   | export async function fetchPlaylistMetadata(url: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |   const { access_token } = await getAccessToken();
â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!access_token) return { error: "No access token" };
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |     // Parse Playlist ID from URL
â”‚   â”‚   |     const match = url.match(/playlist\/([a-zA-Z0-9]+)/);
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!match) return { error: "Invalid Spotify URL" };
â”‚   â”‚   |     const playlistId = match[1];
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     // Fetch Playlist Details
â”‚   â”‚   |     const res = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${playlistId}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   |       headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}` },
â”‚   â”‚   |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!res.ok) return { error: "Failed to fetch playlist" };
â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     // Extract Artists
â”‚   â”‚   |     const artists = data.tracks.items
â”‚   â”‚   |       .map((item: any) => item.track?.artists[0]?.name)
â”‚   â”‚   |       .filter(Boolean);
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     // Fetch Audio Features for "Vibe Stats" (Limit 20)
â”‚   â”‚   |     const trackIds = data.tracks.items
â”‚   â”‚   |        .slice(0, 20)
â”‚   â”‚   |        .map((t: any) => t.track?.id)
â”‚   â”‚   |        .filter(Boolean)
â”‚   â”‚   |        .join(',');
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     let tempo = 0, energy = 0, mood = "Neutral";
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (trackIds) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       const featuresRes = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/audio-features?ids=${trackIds}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   |          headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}` },
â”‚   â”‚   |       });
â”‚   â”‚   |       const featuresData = await featuresRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   |       if (featuresData.audio_features) {
â”‚   â”‚   |          const validFeatures = featuresData.audio_features.filter((f: any) => f);
â”‚   â”‚   |          if (validFeatures.length > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   |             const totalTempo = validFeatures.reduce((acc: number, curr: any) => acc + curr.tempo, 0);
â”‚   â”‚   |             const totalEnergy = validFeatures.reduce((acc: number, curr: any) => acc + curr.energy, 0);
â”‚   â”‚   |             const totalValence = validFeatures.reduce((acc: number, curr: any) => acc + curr.valence, 0);
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |             tempo = Math.round(totalTempo / validFeatures.length);
â”‚   â”‚   |             energy = Math.round((totalEnergy / validFeatures.length) * 100);
â”‚   â”‚   |             const avgValence = totalValence / validFeatures.length;
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |             if (avgValence > 0.6 && energy > 70) mood = "Party ğŸ‰";
â”‚   â”‚   |             else if (avgValence > 0.6) mood = "Happy â˜€ï¸";
â”‚   â”‚   |             else if (avgValence < 0.4 && energy < 40) mood = "Melancholy ğŸŒ§ï¸";
â”‚   â”‚   |             else if (energy > 80) mood = "High Voltage âš¡";
â”‚   â”‚   |             else mood = "Chill â˜•";
â”‚   â”‚   |          }
â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   |       id: data.id,
â”‚   â”‚   |       name: data.name,
â”‚   â”‚   | artists: Array.from(new Set(artists)),
â”‚   â”‚   |       tempo,
â”‚   â”‚   |       energy,
â”‚   â”‚   |       mood
â”‚   â”‚   |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   |     console.error(e);
â”‚   â”‚   |     return { error: "Failed to load playlist" };
â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | // --- 3. Playlist Feature: Analyze Discovery Score ---
â”‚   â”‚   | export async function analyzePlaylistDiscovery(playlistId: string, playlistName: string, artists: string[]) {
â”‚   â”‚   |   const { access_token } = await getAccessToken();
â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!access_token) return { error: "No access token" };
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   const sampleArtists = artists.slice(0, 10);
â”‚   â”‚   |   let discoveryCount = 0;
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   const checks = await Promise.all(
â”‚   â”‚   |     sampleArtists.map(async (artist) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |       try {
â”‚   â”‚   |         const query = `${artist} ${playlistName}`;
â”‚   â”‚   |         const res = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   |           `https://api.spotify.com/v1/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}&type=playlist&limit=50`,
â”‚   â”‚   |           { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}` } }
â”‚   â”‚   |         );
â”‚   â”‚   |         const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |         return data.playlists?.items || [];
â”‚   â”‚   |       } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         return [];
â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |     })
â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   checks.forEach((searchResults) => {
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!Array.isArray(searchResults)) return;
â”‚   â”‚   |     const validResults = searchResults.filter(item => item !== null);
â”‚   â”‚   |     const isFound = validResults.some((pl: any) => 
â”‚   â”‚   |         pl.id === playlistId || 
â”‚   â”‚   |         (pl.name && pl.name.toLowerCase() === playlistName.toLowerCase())
â”‚   â”‚   |     );
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (isFound) discoveryCount++;
â”‚   â”‚   |   });
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   const percentage = Math.round((discoveryCount / sampleArtists.length) * 100);
â”‚   â”‚   |   let score = percentage > 70 ? 100 : percentage;
â”‚   â”‚   |   let rating = "Bad ğŸ”»";
â”‚   â”‚   |   if (score >= 70) rating = "Amazing ğŸš€";
â”‚   â”‚   |   else if (score >= 40) rating = "Good ğŸŒŸ";
â”‚   â”‚   |   else if (score >= 10) rating = "Okay ğŸ˜";
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   return {
â”‚   â”‚   |     score,
â”‚   â”‚   |     percentage,
â”‚   â”‚   |     rating,
â”‚   â”‚   |     analyzed_count: sampleArtists.length
â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | // --- 4. Reverse Game Feature: Get Mystery Track (Deezer) ---
â”‚   â”‚   | export async function getMysteryTrack(artistName: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |     const searchRes = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   |       `https://api.deezer.com/search/artist?q=${encodeURIComponent(artistName)}`
â”‚   â”‚   |     );
â”‚   â”‚   |     const searchData = await searchRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!searchData.data || searchData.data.length === 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       return { error: "Artist not found" };
â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     const normalize = (str: string) => str.toLowerCase().trim();
â”‚   â”‚   |     const targetName = normalize(artistName);
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     let artist = searchData.data.find((a: any) => normalize(a.name) === targetName);
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!artist) artist = searchData.data.find((a: any) => normalize(a.name).includes(targetName));
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!artist) artist = searchData.data[0];
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     const tracksRes = await fetch(artist.tracklist + '&limit=50');
â”‚   â”‚   |     const tracksData = await tracksRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     const validTracks = tracksData.data.filter((t: any) => t.preview);
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!validTracks || validTracks.length < 3) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         return { error: "Not enough songs found for this artist." };
â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     const correctIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * validTracks.length);
â”‚   â”‚   |     const correctTrack = validTracks[correctIndex];
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     const distractors: any[] = [];
â”‚   â”‚   |     const usedIndices = new Set([correctIndex]);
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     while (distractors.length < 2) {
â”‚   â”‚   |       const idx = Math.floor(Math.random() * validTracks.length);
â”‚   â”‚   |       if (!usedIndices.has(idx)) {
â”‚   â”‚   |         distractors.push(validTracks[idx]);
â”‚   â”‚   |         usedIndices.add(idx);
â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     const options = [correctTrack, ...distractors].map(t => ({
â”‚   â”‚   |       id: t.id,
â”‚   â”‚   |       title: t.title,
â”‚   â”‚   |       isCorrect: t.id === correctTrack.id
â”‚   â”‚   |     }));
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     options.sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   |       artistName: artist.name,
â”‚   â”‚   |       trackName: correctTrack.title,
â”‚   â”‚   |       albumArt: correctTrack.album.cover_xl,
â”‚   â”‚   |       previewUrl: correctTrack.preview,
â”‚   â”‚   |       deezerUrl: correctTrack.link,
â”‚   â”‚   |       options: options
â”‚   â”‚   |     };
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   |     console.error(e);
â”‚   â”‚   |     return { error: "Failed to fetch data" };
â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | // getBpmGameTrack
â”‚   â”‚   | // app/actions.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | export async function getBpmGameTrack() {
â”‚   â”‚   |   // 1. Call the helper and extract the actual token string
â”‚   â”‚   |   const tokenData = await getAccessToken();
â”‚   â”‚   |   const access_token = tokenData.access_token;
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   // 2. Check if the token exists before proceeding
â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!access_token) {
â”‚   â”‚   |     console.error("Token Response Error:", tokenData); 
â”‚   â”‚   |     return { error: "Failed to authenticate with Spotify. Check your Env Vars." };
â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |     const playlistId = "0kQ3ZMgLoc9UoFtJz96qYa"; 
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     // 3. Use backticks (`) for template literals to inject variables correctly
â”‚   â”‚   |     const res = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/playlists/${playlistId}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   |       headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}` },
â”‚   â”‚   |       cache: 'no-store'
â”‚   â”‚   |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     // Filter for tracks that have a 30-second preview URL
â”‚   â”‚   |     const validTracks = data.tracks.items.filter((item: any) => item.track?.preview_url);
â”‚   â”‚   |     if (validTracks.length === 0) return { error: "No playable tracks found in this playlist." };
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     const selected = validTracks[Math.floor(Math.random() * validTracks.length)].track;
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     // 4. Fetch the specific Audio Features (Tempo/BPM) for the chosen track
â”‚   â”‚   |     const featuresRes = await fetch(`https://api.spotify.com/v1/audio-features/${selected.id}`, {
â”‚   â”‚   |       headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${access_token}` },
â”‚   â”‚   |     });
â”‚   â”‚   |     const featuresData = await featuresRes.json();
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   |       name: selected.name,
â”‚   â”‚   |       artist: selected.artists[0].name,
â”‚   â”‚   |       previewUrl: selected.preview_url,
â”‚   â”‚   |       albumArt: selected.album.images[0].url,
â”‚   â”‚   |       bpm: Math.round(featuresData.tempo),
â”‚   â”‚   |     };
â”‚   â”‚   |   } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   |     console.error("BPM Game Fetch Error:", e);
â”‚   â”‚   |     return { error: "Failed to connect to Spotify Arcade" };
â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | export async function getYoutubeGameTrack() {
â”‚   â”‚   |   const API_KEY = process.env.YOUTUBE_API_KEY;
â”‚   â”‚   |   // Example: A popular music video playlist ID
â”‚   â”‚   |   const playlistId = 'PLFgquLnL59alCl_2TQvOiD5Vgm1hCaGSI'; 
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |     const res = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   |       `https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/playlistItems?part=snippet&maxResults=50&playlistId=${playlistId}&key=${API_KEY}`
â”‚   â”‚   |     );
â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     const randomVideo = data.items[Math.floor(Math.random() * data.items.length)];
â”‚   â”‚   |     const videoId = randomVideo.snippet.resourceId.videoId;
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   |       title: randomVideo.snippet.title,
â”‚   â”‚   |       videoId: videoId,
â”‚   â”‚   |       thumbnail: randomVideo.snippet.thumbnails.high.url,
â”‚   â”‚   |     };
â”‚   â”‚   |   } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   |     return { error: "Failed to fetch YouTube track" };
â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | ///Harmony game 
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | // app/actions.ts
â”‚   â”‚   | export async function getMusicalJazzTrack() {
â”‚   â”‚   |   const API_KEY = process.env.YOUTUBE_API_KEY;
â”‚   â”‚   |   // Refined query for purely musical content
â”‚   â”‚   |   const query = "Classic Jazz Standard Instrumental Official Audio";
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   |     const res = await fetch(
â”‚   â”‚   |       `https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/search?part=snippet&q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}&type=video&videoEmbeddable=true&maxResults=15&key=${API_KEY}`
â”‚   â”‚   |     );
â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     // Filter out titles that might contain "tutorial" or "lesson"
â”‚   â”‚   |     const musicVideos = data.items.filter((v: any) => 
â”‚   â”‚   |       !v.snippet.title.toLowerCase().includes('lesson') && 
â”‚   â”‚   |       !v.snippet.title.toLowerCase().includes('tutorial')
â”‚   â”‚   |     );
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |     const randomVideo = musicVideos[Math.floor(Math.random() * musicVideos.length)];
â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   |       title: randomVideo.snippet.title,
â”‚   â”‚   |       videoId: randomVideo.id.videoId,
â”‚   â”‚   |     };
â”‚   â”‚   |   } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   |     return { error: "Failed to fetch music" };
â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ sitemap.ts

â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | export const baseUrl = 'https://www.armanayva.com'
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   | export default async function sitemap() {
â”‚   â”‚   |   let blogs = getBlogPosts().map((post) => ({
â”‚   â”‚   |     url: `${baseUrl}/blog/${post.slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |     lastModified: post.metadata.publishedAt,
â”‚   â”‚   |   }))
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   let routes = ['', '/blog'].map((route) => ({
â”‚   â”‚   |     url: `${baseUrl}${route}`,
â”‚   â”‚   |     lastModified: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
â”‚   â”‚   |   }))
â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   |   return [...routes, ...blogs]
â”‚   â”‚   | }

â”‚   â”‚   |             <Script
â”‚   â”‚   |               id="tiktok-pixel-base"
â”‚   â”‚   |               strategy="afterInteractive" 
â”‚   â”‚   |               dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
â”‚   â”‚   |                 __html: `
â”‚   â”‚   |                   !function (w, d, t) {
â”‚   â”‚   |                     w.TiktokAnalyticsObject=t;var ttq=w[t]=w[t]||[];ttq.methods=["page","track","identify","instances","load","ready","trackCustom","trackEvent","subscribe","ttee"];ttq.setAndDefer=function(t,n){t[n]=function(){t.push([n].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments,0)))}};for(var i=0;i<ttq.methods.length;i++)ttq.setAndDefer(ttq,ttq.methods[i]);ttq.instance=function(t){for(var n=ttq.slice(0),i=0;i<ttq.methods.length;i++)ttq.setAndDefer(n,ttq.methods[i]);return n.load(t),n};
â”‚   â”‚   |                     ttq.load('${TIKTOK_PIXEL_ID}');
â”‚   â”‚   |                     ttq.page();
â”‚   â”‚   |                     }(window, document, 'ttq');
â”‚   â”‚   |                 `,
â”‚   â”‚   |               }}
â”‚   â”‚   |             />
â”‚   â”‚   |             <Script

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             Phase 02

â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ rss/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ route.ts
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (route.ts) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { baseUrl } from 'app/sitemap'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { getBlogPosts } from 'app/blog/utils'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export async function GET() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let allBlogs = await getBlogPosts()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const itemsXml = allBlogs
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .sort((a, b) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (new Date(a.metadata.publishedAt) > new Date(b.metadata.publishedAt)) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         return -1
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       return 1
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     })
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .map(
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       (post) =>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         `<item>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <title>${post.metadata.title}</title>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <link>${baseUrl}/blog/${post.slug}</link>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <description>${post.metadata.summary || ''}</description>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <pubDate>${new Date(
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             post.metadata.publishedAt
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           ).toUTCString()}</pubDate>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </item>`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     )
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .join('\n')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const rssFeed = `<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   <rss version="2.0">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <channel>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <title>My Portfolio</title>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <link>${baseUrl}</link>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <description>This is my portfolio RSS feed</description>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         ${itemsXml}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </channel>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   </rss>`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return new Response(rssFeed, {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       'Content-Type': 'text/xml',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     },
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   })
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (page.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Link from 'next/link';

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | const HERO_IMAGE_URL = 'https://res.cloudinary.com/dpmkshcky/image/upload/c_fill,g_auto,h_250,w_970/b_rgb:000000,e_gradient_fade,y_-0.30/c_scale,co_rgb:ffffff,fl_relative,l_text:montserrat_25_style_light_align_center:Jazz%20Now,w_0.2,y_0/v1570237614/img_2437-copy-copy_pzebz7.jpg'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export default function AboutPage() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <section className="py-8">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <Image

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <h1 className="font-bold text-4xl font-serif mb-6 tracking-tighter">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Arman Ayva â€“ Montreal Jazz Composer & Hobbyist ğŸ·
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </h1>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="prose prose-neutral dark:prose-invert max-w-none">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <p className="lead text-xl">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           Where modern jazz meets cinematic storytelling. Arman Ayva is a Montreal-based 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           composer whose sound merges the soul of classic jazz with the 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           freedom of funk and the mysticism of world music. 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <hr className="my-8 border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* From Lens to Loops */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <h2>From Lens to Loops: A Storyboard of Sound</h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           Before I began composing jazz, my world was framed through a camera lens. As a 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <strong> photographer and amateur filmmaker</strong>, I spent years capturing visual 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           stories. Today, I use those same visual instincts to storyboard with sound. I view 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           my compositions as "invisible films," where every funky bass groove or mysterious 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           piano line serves as a camera shot, and every melody develops a cinematic plot.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* The Montreal Fusion */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <h2>The Montreal Fusion: Armenian Soul meets Jazz-Funk</h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           Based in the creative crossroads of Montreal, my music is a deeply personal exploration 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           of heritage and rhythm. I bridge the warmth of <strong>Armenian folk motifs</strong> with 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           the high-energy freedom of 1970s fusion and analog synth textures. Drawing inspiration 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           from luminaries like <strong>Marcus Miller, US3, and Dave Brubeck</strong>, I craft 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           compositions that feel both timeless and contemporary.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* A Studio-First Hobbyist */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <h3>A Studio-First Philosophy</h3>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           I am not a performing artist; I am a studio-focused hobbyist dedicated to the 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           architecture of sound. By focusing exclusively on production within 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <strong> Apple Logic Pro</strong>, I prioritize the intricate layering of live bass 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           and global percussion. Whether it is the narrative-driven tracks of 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <em> Criminal Case N68</em> or the soulful improvisations of <em>Happy Bundle</em>, 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           my music is an invitation to traverse new sound realms together.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* Tastemaker Section */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <h2>Beyond Composing: Curating the Vibe</h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           Creation is only half the journey. As the curator of the 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <strong> "Funky Jazz Mood Lifter"</strong> playlist on Spotify, I connect with 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           over hundreds of followers who share a passion for bass-heavy, mood-lifting instrumental 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           grooves. It is a space where I celebrate the legends of the genre alongside 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           the best new independent jazz-funk voices.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |          Funky-Jazz-Mood-Lifter â†’
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <iframe

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function Table({ data }: { data: { headers: string[]; rows: string[][] } }) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let headers = data.headers.map((header, index) => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <th key={index}>{header}</th>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   ))
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let rows = data.rows.map((row, index) => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <tr key={index}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {row.map((cell, cellIndex) => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <td key={cellIndex}>{cell}</td>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ))}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </tr>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   ))
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <table>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <thead>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <tr>{headers}</tr>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </thead>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <tbody>{rows}</tbody>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </table>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   )
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function CustomLink(props: any) {

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (href.startsWith('/')) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <Link href={href} {...props}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {props.children}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     )
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (href.startsWith('#')) {

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return <code dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: codeHTML }} {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function slugify(str: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return str
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .toString()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .toLowerCase()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .trim()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .replace(/\s+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .replace(/&/g, '-and-')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .replace(/[^\w\-]+/g, '')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .replace(/\-\-+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function createHeading(level: number) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const Heading = ({ children }: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     let slug = slugify(children)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return React.createElement(
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       `h${level}`,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       { id: slug },
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       [
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         React.createElement('a', {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           href: `#${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           key: `link-${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           className: 'anchor',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         }),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ],
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       children
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     )
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   Heading.displayName = `Heading${level}`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return Heading
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | let components = {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h1: createHeading(1),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h2: createHeading(2),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h3: createHeading(3),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h4: createHeading(4),

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import fs from 'fs'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import path from 'path'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | type Metadata = {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   title: string
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   publishedAt: string
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   summary: string

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function parseFrontmatter(fileContent: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let frontmatterRegex = /---\s*([\s\S]*?)\s*---/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let match = frontmatterRegex.exec(fileContent)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let frontMatterBlock = match![1]
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let content = fileContent.replace(frontmatterRegex, '').trim()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let frontMatterLines = frontMatterBlock.trim().split('\n')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let metadata: Partial<Metadata> = {}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   frontMatterLines.forEach((line) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     let [key, ...valueArr] = line.split(': ')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     let value = valueArr.join(': ').trim()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     value = value.replace(/^['"](.*)['"]$/, '$1') // Remove quotes
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     metadata[key.trim() as keyof Metadata] = value
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   })
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return { metadata: metadata as Metadata, content }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function getMDXFiles(dir: string) { // Added type annotation
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return fs.readdirSync(dir).filter((file) => path.extname(file) === '.mdx')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function readMDXFile(filePath: string) { // Added type annotation
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let rawContent = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf-8')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return parseFrontmatter(rawContent)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function getMDXData(dir: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let mdxFiles = getMDXFiles(dir)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return mdxFiles.map((file) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     let { metadata, content } = readMDXFile(path.join(dir, file))
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // Extract the filename without extension
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const fileName = path.basename(file, path.extname(file))
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // FIX: Standardize the slug to be lowercase and hyphenated
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const slug = fileName
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       .toLowerCase()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       .replace(/\s+/g, '-')      // Replace spaces with -
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       .replace(/_/g, '-')        // Replace underscores with -
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       .replace(/[^\w\-]+/g, '')  // Remove non-word characters
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       metadata,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       slug,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       content,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   })
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function getBlogPosts() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return getMDXData(path.join(process.cwd(), 'app', 'blog', 'posts'))
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // MODIFIED FUNCTION SIGNATURE AND ADDED SAFETY CHECK
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function formatDate(date: string | null | undefined, includeRelative = false) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // SAFETY CHECK: If date is missing, return a default string immediately.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!date) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return 'Date TBD' 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let currentDate = new Date()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!date.includes('T')) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     date = `${date}T00:00:00`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let targetDate = new Date(date)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let yearsAgo = currentDate.getFullYear() - targetDate.getFullYear()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let monthsAgo = currentDate.getMonth() - targetDate.getMonth()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let daysAgo = currentDate.getDate() - targetDate.getDate()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let formattedDate = ''
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (yearsAgo > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     formattedDate = `${yearsAgo}y ago`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   } else if (monthsAgo > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     formattedDate = `${monthsAgo}mo ago`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   } else if (daysAgo > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     formattedDate = `${daysAgo}d ago`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     formattedDate = 'Today'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let fullDate = targetDate.toLocaleString('en-us', {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     month: 'long',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     day: 'numeric',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     year: 'numeric',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   })
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!includeRelative) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return fullDate
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return `${fullDate} (${formattedDate})`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ page.tsx

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export const metadata = {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   title: 'Blog',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   description: 'Read my blog.',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export default function Page() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <section>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <h1 className="font-semibold text-2xl mb-8 tracking-tighter text-neutral-400 dark:text-neutral-50">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         My Blog
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </h1>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <BlogPosts />

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {/* Hamburger Button (Only on Mobile) */}

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 aria-label="Toggle Menu"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="md:hidden p-2 text-2xl transition-colors text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 hover:text-neutral-900 dark:hover:text-neutral-100"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {isOpen ? <FaTimes /> : <FaBars />}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {/* 2. Mobile Menu Dropdown (Conditionally Visible below md:) */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             className={`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               md:hidden w-full transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               ${isOpen 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 ? 'max-h-screen opacity-100 py-2'

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               flex flex-col space-y-2 border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             `}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {renderLinks(true)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (mdx.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Link from 'next/link'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Image from 'next/image'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { MDXRemote } from 'next-mdx-remote/rsc'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { highlight } from 'sugar-high'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import React from 'react'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // Custom Components
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import BandcampCTA from 'app/components/BandcampCTA'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import MusicCTA from 'app/components/MusicCTA'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { PlaylistStats } from 'app/components/PlaylistStats'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import PlaylistUrlInput from 'app/components/PlaylistUrlInput' 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // --- HELPER FUNCTIONS (Must be defined before usage) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function Table({ data }: { data: { headers: string[]; rows: string[][] } }) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let headers = data.headers.map((header, index) => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <th key={index}>{header}</th>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   ))
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let rows = data.rows.map((row, index) => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <tr key={index}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {row.map((cell, cellIndex) => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <td key={cellIndex}>{cell}</td>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ))}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </tr>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   ))
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <table>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <thead>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <tr>{headers}</tr>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </thead>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <tbody>{rows}</tbody>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </table>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   )
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function CustomLink(props: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let href = props.href
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (href.startsWith('/')) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <Link href={href} {...props}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {props.children}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     )
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (href.startsWith('#')) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return <a {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function RoundedImage(props: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return <Image alt={props.alt} className="rounded-lg" {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function Code({ children, ...props }: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let codeHTML = highlight(children)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return <code dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: codeHTML }} {...props} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function slugify(str: string) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return str
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .toString()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .toLowerCase()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .trim()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .replace(/\s+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .replace(/&/g, '-and-')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .replace(/[^\w\-]+/g, '')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     .replace(/\-\-+/g, '-')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function createHeading(level: number) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const Heading = ({ children }: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     let slug = slugify(children)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return React.createElement(
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       `h${level}`,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       { id: slug },
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       [
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         React.createElement('a', {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           href: `#${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           key: `link-${slug}`,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           className: 'anchor',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         }),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ],
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       children
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     )
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   Heading.displayName = `Heading${level}`
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return Heading
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // --- COMPONENT REGISTRATION ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | let components = {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h1: createHeading(1),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h2: createHeading(2),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h3: createHeading(3),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h4: createHeading(4),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h5: createHeading(5),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   h6: createHeading(6),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   Image: RoundedImage,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   a: CustomLink,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   code: Code,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   Table,         // Ensure Table is here
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   BandcampCTA,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   MusicCTA,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   PlaylistStats, 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   PlaylistUrlInput,// Ensure PlaylistStats is here
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function CustomMDX(props: any) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <MDXRemote
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {...props}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       components={{ ...components, ...(props.components || {}) }}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   )
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ PlaylistStats.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (PlaylistStats.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { getPlaylist } from '../lib/spotify';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Image from 'next/image';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { PlaylistDiscovery } from './PlaylistDiscovery';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export async function PlaylistStats({ id }: { id: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let playlist;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   try {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     playlist = await getPlaylist(id);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (playlist.error) throw new Error(playlist.error.message);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     console.error("Spotify Error:", e);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="p-4 my-8 border border-red-200 rounded-lg bg-red-50 text-red-600 dark:bg-red-900/20 dark:border-red-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <p className="font-bold">Spotify Data Unavailable</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <p className="text-sm">Could not fetch playlist stats. Check API credentials.</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const artistNames = playlist.tracks.items.map((item: any) => item.track?.artists[0]?.name);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // 1. Get Followers
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const followers = playlist.followers.total;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // 2. Calculate "Discoverability" (Avg Track Popularity 0-100)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const tracks = playlist.tracks.items;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const avgPopularity = Math.round(
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     tracks.reduce((acc: number, item: any) => acc + (item.track?.popularity || 0), 0) / 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     (tracks.length || 1)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="my-10 p-6 rounded-2xl bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 shadow-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-6 items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Cover Image 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {playlist.images?.[0] && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="relative w-40 h-40 flex-shrink-0 shadow-lg rounded-xl overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              <Image 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                src={playlist.images[0].url} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                alt={playlist.name}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                fill
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                className="object-cover"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="flex-1 text-center md:text-left w-full">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-2 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">{playlist.name}</h3>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 mt-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             Metric: Followers 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="p-3 bg-white dark:bg-black rounded-lg border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-green-600">{followers.toLocaleString()}</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-neutral-500">Followers</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |            
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="p-3 bg-white dark:bg-black rounded-lg border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-500">{playlist.tracks.total}</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-neutral-500">Tracks</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |  {/* 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             Metric: Discoverability / Vibe Score 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="p-3 bg-white dark:bg-black rounded-lg border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-purple-500">{avgPopularity}%</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-neutral-500">Trend Score</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    {/*        
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="mt-4 text-xs text-neutral-500">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             *Trend Score based on global track popularity.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* Add this at the bottom */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </p>

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             href="/blog/pizzicata-blues"

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ MusicCTA.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (MusicCTA.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | "use client"; // â¬…ï¸ Must stay at the top!
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import React from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // Make the component accept label, background color, and URL as props
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export default function MusicCTA({ 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     albumUrl, 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     label, 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     baseColor, 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     hoverColor 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }: { 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     albumUrl: string; 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     label: string; 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     baseColor: string; 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     hoverColor: string; 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const baseStyle: React.CSSProperties = {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     display: 'inline-block',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     padding: '12px 24px',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     fontSize: '1.1rem',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     fontWeight: 'bold',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     color: '#fff',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     backgroundColor: baseColor, 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     borderRadius: '6px',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     textDecoration: 'none',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     transition: 'background-color 0.3s',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div style={{ textAlign: 'center', marginTop: '2rem', marginBottom: '2rem' }}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <a 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         href={albumUrl} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         target="_blank" 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         rel="noopener noreferrer"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         style={baseStyle}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         // Event handlers now work
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         onMouseOver={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = hoverColor}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = baseColor}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {label}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </a>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ DelayedSubscribePopup.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (DelayedSubscribePopup.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // src/components/DelayedSubscribePopup.jsx (or wherever you keep your components)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Link from 'next/link';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { sendGTMEvent } from '@next/third-parties/google';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // Your original SubscribeCTA content, slightly modified to be the *content*
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // of the popup rather than the popup itself.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | function SubscribeCTAContent() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <section className="bg-neutral-900 text-white text-center py-12 px-4 rounded-lg shadow-2xl relative">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <h2 className="text-3xl sm:text-4xl font-bold mb-4 tracking-tight">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Stay Updated on Arman Ayva Projects
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <p className="text-lg mb-6 max-w-lg mx-auto text-neutral-300">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Subscribe to receive the latest news, releases, and collaboration opportunities from 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <strong className="text-white"> Arman Ayva â€“ Montreal Jazz Composer</strong>. Discover new tracks and upcoming projects first!
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <Link
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         href="/other/subscribe"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         target="_blank"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         rel="noopener noreferrer"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         className="inline-block bg-sky-500 hover:bg-sky-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-8 rounded-lg text-lg transition-colors duration-300 shadow-xl"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         onClick={() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         sendGTMEvent({ event: 'conversion_click', action: 'subscribe_cta' })
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |          }}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Subscribe Now
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <p className="text-sm mt-3 text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Your email will only be used for Arman Ayva project updates.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </section>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // The main component that implements the delayed popup logic
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function DelayedSubscribePopup() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const DELAY_TIME_MS = 30000; // 10 seconds
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // 1. Set a timer to show the popup
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const timer = setTimeout(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setIsVisible(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }, DELAY_TIME_MS);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // 2. Clear the timeout if the component unmounts (cleanup)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return () => clearTimeout(timer);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }, []); // Empty dependency array means this runs only once on mount
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Optional: Function to close the popup manually
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const closePopup = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsVisible(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!isVisible) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return null; // Don't render anything if it's not visible
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // Backdrop for the modal
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black bg-opacity-75 p-4" onClick={closePopup}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* Container for the content, stopping propagation prevents closing when clicking the content */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         className="relative max-w-xl w-full transform transition-all duration-300 scale-100 opacity-100" 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <SubscribeCTAContent />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* Close button */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <button
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           onClick={closePopup}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           className="absolute top-2 right-2 text-white hover:text-gray-300 text-2xl font-bold p-1 leading-none transition-colors"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           aria-label="Close subscription popup"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           &times;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // Example usage in a page component:
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // export default function HomePage() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | //   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | //     <>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | //       <main>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | //         {/* Other page content */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | //       </main>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | //       <DelayedSubscribePopup /> {/* This will appear after 10 seconds */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | //     </>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | //   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ BandcampCTA.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (BandcampCTA.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | "use client"; // â¬…ï¸ THIS IS CRUCIAL
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import React from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // Use Tailwind classes here for a clean separation from MDX
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export default function BandcampCTA({ albumUrl }: { albumUrl: string }) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Define the base and hover styles using standard React state/hooks if necessary, 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // but for simple hover effects, Tailwind classes are much easier.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Using inline styles for direct color manipulation like your original request:
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const baseStyle: React.CSSProperties = {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     display: 'inline-block',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     padding: '12px 24px',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     fontSize: '1.1rem',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     fontWeight: 'bold',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     color: '#fff',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     backgroundColor: '#262626', // Base color
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     borderRadius: '6px',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     textDecoration: 'none',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     transition: 'background-color 0.3s',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div style={{ textAlign: 'center', marginTop: '2rem', marginBottom: '2rem' }}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <a 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         href={albumUrl} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         target="_blank" 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         rel="noopener noreferrer"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         style={baseStyle}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         // The event handlers now work because this component is marked "use client"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         onMouseOver={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = '#1a1a1a'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = '#262626'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         ğŸ§ Listen & Buy on Bandcamp
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </a>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ BpmDetective.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (BpmDetective.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // app/components/BpmDetective.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client'; // [cite: 214]
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { getBpmGameTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { FaPlay, FaSearch, FaTrophy } from 'react-icons/fa';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function BpmDetective() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [mounted, setMounted] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [track, setTrack] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [guess, setGuess] = useState(120);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [gameState, setGameState] = useState<'idle' | 'playing' | 'result'>('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const audioRef = useRef<HTMLAudioElement | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => { setMounted(true); }, []); // [cite: 1957]
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!mounted) return null;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const startNewGame = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await getBpmGameTrack();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (data.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       alert(data.error);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setTrack(data);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setGameState('playing');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const checkGuess = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGameState('result');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (audioRef.current) audioRef.current.pause();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const diff = track ? Math.abs(guess - track.bpm) : 0;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const isCorrect = diff <= 5;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="p-8 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-3xl shadow-lg">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {gameState === 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="text-center py-10">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             onClick={startNewGame}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             disabled={loading}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             className="px-10 py-4 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-2xl font-bold hover:bg-blue-700 transition-all active:scale-95 disabled:opacity-50"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {loading ? 'Analyzing Vibe...' : 'Start BPM Challenge'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {track && gameState !== 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="space-y-8 animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="flex flex-col items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <img src={track.albumArt} alt="Album" className="w-48 h-48 rounded-xl shadow-2xl mb-4 object-cover" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <p className="font-bold text-lg">{track.name}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <p className="text-neutral-500 text-sm">{track.artist}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <audio ref={audioRef} src={track.previewUrl} autoPlay loop />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {gameState === 'playing' ? (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="space-y-6">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <input 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 type="range" min="60" max="180" value={guess} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onChange={(e) => setGuess(parseInt(e.target.value))}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="w-full h-3 bg-neutral-200 dark:bg-neutral-800 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer accent-blue-600"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-5xl font-mono font-bold text-center">{guess} <span className="text-sm">BPM</span></div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <button onClick={checkGuess} className="w-full py-4 bg-neutral-900 dark:bg-white text-white dark:text-black rounded-xl font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 Submit Guess
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="text-center space-y-4 pt-4 border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className={`text-4xl font-bold ${isCorrect ? 'text-green-500' : 'text-red-500'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {isCorrect ? 'ğŸ¯ Bullseye!' : 'ğŸ“‰ Off Beat'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <p className="text-xl">Actual: <span className="font-mono font-bold">{track.bpm} BPM</span></p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <button onClick={startNewGame} className="mt-4 text-blue-500 font-bold hover:underline flex items-center gap-2 mx-auto">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <FaSearch /> Play Next Track
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* Equivalent to h2 style="font-size:2rem; margin-bottom:20px;" */}

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Stay Updated on Arman Ayva Projects
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Styles are equivalent to: display:inline-block; background-color:#00bfff; color:#fff; 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         font-weight:bold; text-decoration:none; padding:15px 40px; border-radius:8px;

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <Link

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         target="_blank"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         rel="noopener noreferrer"

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       >

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         Your email will only be used for Arman Ayva project updates.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </p>

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ThemeToggle.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (ThemeToggle.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useTheme } from 'next-themes';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { FaSun, FaMoon } from 'react-icons/fa'; 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function ThemeToggle() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [mounted, setMounted] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const { theme, setTheme } = useTheme();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // useEffect runs only on the client side, ensuring correct hydration
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => setMounted(true), []);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (!mounted) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // Return an empty div or placeholder to prevent layout shift during hydration
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return <div className="w-6 h-6" />; 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const isDark = theme === 'dark';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <button
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       aria-label="Toggle Dark Mode"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       type="button"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       className="w-6 h-6 flex items-center justify-center text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 hover:text-neutral-900 dark:hover:text-neutral-100 transition-colors"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       onClick={() => setTheme(isDark ? 'light' : 'dark')}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {isDark ? <FaSun className="w-5 h-5" /> : <FaMoon className="w-5 h-5" />}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ReverseGame.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (ReverseGame.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Image from 'next/image';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { getMysteryTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { FaXmark } from 'react-icons/fa6'; // Import the cancel icon
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function ReverseGame() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [artistInput, setArtistInput] = useState('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [trackData, setTrackData] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [gameState, setGameState] = useState<'idle' | 'loading' | 'playing' | 'won' | 'lost' | 'timeout'>('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [selectedOptionId, setSelectedOptionId] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [error, setError] = useState('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [timeLeft, setTimeLeft] = useState(15);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const audioContextRef = useRef<AudioContext | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const sourceNodeRef = useRef<AudioBufferSourceNode | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const originalBufferRef = useRef<AudioBuffer | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const reversedBufferRef = useRef<AudioBuffer | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const AudioCtx = window.AudioContext || (window as any).webkitAudioContext;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     audioContextRef.current = new AudioCtx();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return () => { audioContextRef.current?.close(); };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     let timer: NodeJS.Timeout;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (gameState === 'playing' && timeLeft > 0) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       timer = setInterval(() => setTimeLeft((prev) => prev - 1), 1000);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else if (timeLeft === 0 && gameState === 'playing') {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setGameState('timeout');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       playAudio('normal');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return () => clearInterval(timer);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }, [gameState, timeLeft]);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // --- NEW: Reset/Cancel Function ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const resetGame = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setTrackData(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSelectedOptionId(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setError('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setTimeLeft(15);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleSearch = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGameState('loading');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setError('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setTrackData(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSelectedOptionId(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await getMysteryTrack(artistInput);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (data.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setError(data.error);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setTrackData(data);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     await loadAndReverseAudio(data.previewUrl);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setTimeLeft(15); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGameState('playing');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     playAudio('reversed'); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const loadAndReverseAudio = async (url: string) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const response = await fetch(url);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const arrayBuffer = await response.arrayBuffer();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (!audioContextRef.current) return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const audioBuffer = await audioContextRef.current.decodeAudioData(arrayBuffer);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       originalBufferRef.current = audioBuffer;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const reversedBuffer = audioContextRef.current.createBuffer(
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         audioBuffer.numberOfChannels, audioBuffer.length, audioBuffer.sampleRate
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       for (let i = 0; i < audioBuffer.numberOfChannels; i++) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         const channelData = audioBuffer.getChannelData(i);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         const reversedData = reversedBuffer.getChannelData(i);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         for (let j = 0; j < channelData.length; j++) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           reversedData[j] = channelData[channelData.length - 1 - j];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       reversedBufferRef.current = reversedBuffer;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } catch (err) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setError("Could not process audio.");
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const playAudio = (type: 'reversed' | 'normal') => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!audioContextRef.current || !reversedBufferRef.current || !originalBufferRef.current) return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const source = audioContextRef.current.createBufferSource();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     source.buffer = type === 'reversed' ? reversedBufferRef.current : originalBufferRef.current;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     source.connect(audioContextRef.current.destination);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     source.start();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     sourceNodeRef.current = source;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const stopAudio = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (sourceNodeRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       try {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         sourceNodeRef.current.stop();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         sourceNodeRef.current.disconnect();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       } catch (e) {}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       sourceNodeRef.current = null;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleGuess = (option: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (gameState !== 'playing') return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSelectedOptionId(option.id);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (option.isCorrect) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setGameState('won');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       playAudio('normal'); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setGameState('lost');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="relative max-w-xl mx-auto p-6 bg-neutral-900 text-white rounded-2xl shadow-2xl border border-neutral-800 overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* --- CANCEL BUTTON (UI) --- */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {gameState !== 'idle' && gameState !== 'loading' && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           onClick={resetGame}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           className="absolute top-4 right-4 p-2 rounded-full bg-neutral-800 hover:bg-red-900/40 text-neutral-400 hover:text-red-500 transition-all z-20"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           title="Cancel Game"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <FaXmark size={18} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="text-center mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-400 to-pink-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           âª Reverse Audio Challenge
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* Updated Search Section */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | <div className="flex flex-col gap-4 mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   <input 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     type="text"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     value={artistInput}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     onChange={(e) => setArtistInput(e.target.value)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     onKeyDown={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleSearch()}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     placeholder="e.g. Nirvana..."
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     className="w-full bg-black/50 border border-neutral-700 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 focus:outline-none focus:border-purple-500"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     onClick={handleSearch}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     disabled={gameState === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     className="w-full bg-purple-600 hover:bg-purple-700 font-bold px-6 py-3 rounded-lg transition-all active:scale-95 disabled:opacity-50"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     {gameState === 'loading' ? 'Searching...' : 'Start Challenge'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {error && <div className="text-red-400 text-center mb-4">{error}</div>}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {trackData && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {gameState === 'playing' && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="flex justify-between text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-400 mb-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  <span>Time Remaining</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  <span className={timeLeft < 5 ? "text-red-500 animate-pulse" : "text-white"}>{timeLeft}s</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="w-full h-2 bg-neutral-800 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <div 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   className={`h-full transition-all duration-1000 ease-linear ${timeLeft < 5 ? 'bg-red-500' : 'bg-purple-500'}`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   style={{ width: `${(timeLeft / 15) * 100}%` }}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="flex justify-center mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               className="relative w-40 h-40 bg-black rounded-xl border border-neutral-700 overflow-hidden cursor-pointer hover:border-purple-500 transition-colors group"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               onClick={() => playAudio('reversed')}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {['won', 'lost', 'timeout'].includes(gameState) ? (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <Image src={trackData.albumArt} alt="Album" fill className="object-cover" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-full text-4xl">â“</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                {!['won', 'lost', 'timeout'].includes(gameState) && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-black/40 group-hover:bg-black/10 transition-colors">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    <span className="text-2xl">ğŸ”Š</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 gap-3">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {trackData.options.map((option: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               let btnClass = "p-4 rounded-xl font-semibold transition-all border border-neutral-700 bg-neutral-800 hover:bg-neutral-700 text-left px-6";
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               if (['won', 'lost', 'timeout'].includes(gameState)) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 if (option.isCorrect) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   btnClass = "p-4 rounded-xl font-bold bg-green-600/20 border-green-500 text-green-400 px-6";
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 } else if (selectedOptionId === option.id) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   btnClass = "p-4 rounded-xl bg-red-900/20 border-red-800 text-red-400 opacity-50 px-6";
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   btnClass = "p-4 rounded-xl bg-neutral-900 border-neutral-800 text-neutral-600 opacity-30 px-6";
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <button
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   key={option.id}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   onClick={() => handleGuess(option)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   disabled={['won', 'lost', 'timeout'].includes(gameState)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   className={btnClass}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   {option.title}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             })}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {(gameState === 'won' || gameState === 'lost' || gameState === 'timeout') && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="mt-8 pt-6 border-t border-neutral-800 text-center animate-in slide-in-from-top-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  onClick={handleSearch} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  className="bg-white text-black font-bold px-8 py-3 rounded-full hover:bg-neutral-200 transition-colors"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  Play Next Round
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ posts.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (posts.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Link from 'next/link'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { formatDate, getBlogPosts } from 'app/blog/utils'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function BlogPosts() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   let allBlogs = getBlogPosts()
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {allBlogs
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         .sort((a, b) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           if (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             new Date(a.metadata.publishedAt) > new Date(b.metadata.publishedAt)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           ) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             return -1
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           return 1
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         })
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         .map((post) => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <Link
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             key={post.slug}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             className="flex flex-col space-y-1 mb-4"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             href={`/blog/${post.slug}`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="w-full flex flex-col md:flex-row space-x-0 md:space-x-2 text-neutral-400" >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {/* FIX 1: Changed dark:text-neutral-400 to dark:text-neutral-50 for white date text */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <p className="text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-50 w-[150px] tabular-nums">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {formatDate(post.metadata.publishedAt, false)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {/* FIX 2: Changed dark:text-neutral-100 to dark:text-neutral-50 for white title text */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <p className="tracking-tight text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {post.metadata.title}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         ))}
