â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ SmartLink.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (SmartLink.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Link from 'next/link';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import React, { ReactNode } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // Define the props for our smart link component
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | interface SmartLinkProps {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   href: string;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   children: ReactNode;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   className?: string;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   onClick?: () => void; // Optional click handler (for things like closing a menu)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | /**
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |  * A reusable component that intelligently renders either:
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |  * 1. An internal Next.js <Link> component (for internal navigation).
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |  * 2. A standard <a> tag with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer" 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |  * (for external URLs, preventing popup/security issues).
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |  */
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function SmartLink({ href, children, className, onClick }: SmartLinkProps) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Check if the link starts with 'http://', 'https://', or 'mailto:'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const isExternal = 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     href.startsWith('http://') || 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     href.startsWith('https://') || 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     href.startsWith('mailto:');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   if (isExternal) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // Render a standard <a> tag for external links
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <a
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         href={href}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         className={className}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         target="_blank" // Opens in a new tab
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         rel="noopener noreferrer" // Essential security attributes
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         onClick={onClick} // Pass through the click handler (optional)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {children}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </a>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Render the Next.js Link component for internal links
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <Link href={href} className={className} onClick={onClick}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {children}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ PuzzleCTA.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (PuzzleCTA.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import Link from 'next/link';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { FaYoutube, FaPlay } from 'react-icons/fa';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export default function PuzzleCTA() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto my-16 p-1 bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 via-blue-500 to-purple-600 rounded-3xl shadow-2xl transition-transform hover:scale-[1.01]">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 rounded-[calc(1.5rem-1px)] p-8 sm:p-12 flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center gap-8">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="flex-1 space-y-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1 rounded-full bg-red-100 dark:bg-red-900/30 text-red-600 dark:text-red-400 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <span className="relative flex h-2 w-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <span className="animate-ping absolute inline-flex h-full w-full rounded-full bg-red-400 opacity-75"></span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <span className="relative inline-flex rounded-full h-2 w-2 bg-red-500"></span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             New Interactive Experience

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <Link

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   className="inline-flex items-center gap-3 px-8 py-4 bg-red-600 text-white rounded-xl font-bold hover:bg-red-700 transition-all shadow-xl active:translate-y-1"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   <FaPlay size={14} /> Start Playing
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | </Link>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="w-full md:w-64 h-48 bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 rounded-2xl border-4 border-white dark:border-neutral-700 shadow-inner flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden group">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |            <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-2 p-4 w-full opacity-40 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {[1,2,3,4].map(i => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <div key={i} className="h-12 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-700 rounded-lg shadow-sm" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               ))}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |            </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |            <FaYoutube className="absolute text-5xl text-red-600 drop-shadow-lg group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ KeyGame.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (KeyGame.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { getMusicalJazzTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { FaRotateRight, FaPlay, FaStop, FaYoutube, FaMusic, FaTrophy, FaFire, FaCircleInfo } from 'react-icons/fa6';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | const KEYS = ['C Major', 'G Major', 'F Major', 'D Minor', 'A Minor', 'Bb Major'];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | const KEY_MAP: Record<string, string> = {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   'ycXxiJdXSbw': 'C Major',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   '09BB1pP9Vvg': 'Bb Major',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   '8S5S5A7K_y8': 'G Major',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function KeyGame() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [video, setVideo] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [guess, setGuess] = useState<string | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [isCorrect, setIsCorrect] = useState<boolean | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [actualKey, setActualKey] = useState<string>('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [score, setScore] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [streak, setStreak] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Core function to load and start music
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const fetchAndPlay = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGuess(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsCorrect(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // 1. Reset playing state to force a fresh iframe load
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsPlaying(false); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await getMusicalJazzTrack();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (data && !data.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setVideo(data);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const key = KEY_MAP[data.videoId] || KEYS[Math.floor(Math.random() * KEYS.length)];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setActualKey(key);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       // 2. Automatically start playback
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setIsPlaying(true); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Optional: Load first track on component mount
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // Note: Most browsers require one initial click on the page 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // before autoplay works, so the very first load might need a "Start" click.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleGuess = (selectedKey: string) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (guess) return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const correct = selectedKey === actualKey;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGuess(selectedKey);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsCorrect(correct);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (correct) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setScore(s => s + 100);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setStreak(s => s + 1);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setStreak(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="p-8 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-3xl shadow-xl max-w-2xl mx-auto my-12">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* Scoreboard */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-black p-4 rounded-2xl border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 shadow-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-amber-500 font-bold">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <FaTrophy /> <span>Score: {score}</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-orange-500 font-bold">

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <button

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           disabled={loading}

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </button>

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="space-y-6">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="relative aspect-video bg-black rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl border border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {isPlaying ? (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <iframe
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 width="100%" height="100%"

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-600">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <FaMusic className="text-4xl" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <button onClick={() => setIsPlaying(!isPlaying)} className="px-6 py-2 bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 text-white rounded-full font-bold flex items-center gap-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-all">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {isPlaying ? <><FaStop /> Stop</> : <><FaPlay /> Listen</>}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-3 gap-3">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {/* ... Key buttons remain the same ... */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {KEYS.map((key) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const isUserChoice = guess === key;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const isTheCorrectAnswer = actualKey === key && guess !== null;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <button
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   key={key}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   disabled={guess !== null}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   onClick={() => handleGuess(key)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   className={`py-4 rounded-xl font-bold border-2 transition-all ${
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     isTheCorrectAnswer 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       ? 'bg-green-500 border-green-600 text-white scale-105 z-10' 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       : isUserChoice && !isCorrect
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         ? 'bg-red-500 border-red-600 text-white opacity-90' 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         : 'bg-white dark:bg-black border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 text-neutral-400 hover:border-blue-500 disabled:opacity-40'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   }`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   {key}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             })}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {guess && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className={`p-6 rounded-2xl text-center animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-top-4 border ${isCorrect ? 'bg-green-50 border-green-200 text-green-800' : 'bg-red-50 border-red-200 text-red-800'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <h4 className="text-2xl font-black mb-1">{isCorrect ? "BRILLIANT! ğŸ¯" : "NOT QUITE ğŸ“‰"}</h4>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {!isCorrect && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <p className="font-bold mb-3 flex items-center justify-center gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    <FaCircleInfo /> The correct answer was {actualKey}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onClick={fetchAndPlay} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="px-8 py-2 bg-neutral-900 text-white dark:bg-white dark:text-neutral-900 rounded-full font-bold text-sm hover:scale-105 transition-transform"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 Next Track â†’
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ PlaylistDiscovery.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (PlaylistDiscovery.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useState } from 'react'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { analyzePlaylistDiscovery } from '../actions'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | interface PlaylistDiscoveryProps {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   id: string
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   name: string
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   artists: string[]
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function PlaylistDiscovery({ id, name, artists }: PlaylistDiscoveryProps) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [data, setData] = useState<any>(null)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null) // New Error State
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleAnalyze = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(true)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setError(null)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const result = await analyzePlaylistDiscovery(id, name, artists)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       // Check if the server returned an error
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (result.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setError("Spotify API Error: " + result.error)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setData(result)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } catch (e) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setError("Failed to connect to analysis server.")
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       console.error(e)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(false)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="my-8 border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 pt-8">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between items-start sm:items-center gap-4 mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <h3 className="font-semibold text-lg text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             Discovered On Analysis
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </h3>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <p className="text-neutral-500 text-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             Analyze the impact of this playlist on artist discovery
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {!data && !error && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <button
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             onClick={handleAnalyze}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             disabled={loading}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             className="px-4 py-2 bg-neutral-900 dark:bg-neutral-100 text-white dark:text-black text-sm font-medium rounded-full hover:opacity-80 disabled:opacity-50 transition-all"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {loading ? 'Analyzing...' : 'Analyze'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* ERROR MESSAGE DISPLAY */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {error && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="p-4 rounded-xl bg-red-50 dark:bg-red-900/20 border border-red-200 dark:border-red-800 text-red-600 dark:text-red-400 text-sm mb-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <strong>Error:</strong> {error} <br/>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <span className="text-xs opacity-80">Check your server logs or environment variables.</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* SUCCESS DATA DISPLAY */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {data && !error && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-2 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-4 text-xs text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <span className="w-2 h-2 rounded-full bg-green-500 animate-pulse"/>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             Last analyzed less than a minute ago
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {/* Metric 1: Percentage */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="p-4 rounded-xl bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-sm font-medium text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 Artists in Discovered On
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {data.percentage}%
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="mt-2 text-xs text-neutral-500 leading-relaxed">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 The percentage of artists in this playlist who have this playlist in their 'Discovered On' section.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {/* Metric 2: Score */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="p-4 rounded-xl bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="flex justify-between items-start">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  <div className="text-sm font-medium text-neutral-600 dark:text-neutral-400 mb-1">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     Discovery Score
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  <div className={`text-xs font-bold px-2 py-1 rounded-full border 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     ${data.score >= 70 ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-700 border-green-200' : 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       data.score >= 40 ? 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 border-blue-200' : 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       'bg-orange-100 text-orange-700 border-orange-200'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     {data.rating}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {data.score}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="mt-2 text-xs text-neutral-500 leading-relaxed">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 A score from 0-100 that indicates the playlist's effectiveness at breaking new artists.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {/* Score Bar */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="mt-3 h-1.5 w-full bg-neutral-200 dark:bg-neutral-800 rounded-full overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <div 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   className={`h-full rounded-full transition-all duration-1000 ${
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     data.score >= 70 ? 'bg-green-500' : 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     data.score >= 40 ? 'bg-blue-500' : 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     'bg-orange-500'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   }`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   style={{ width: `${data.score}%` }}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ PlaylistUrlInput.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (PlaylistUrlInput.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useState } from 'react'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // This import will now work because we added the function above
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { fetchPlaylistMetadata } from '../actions'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { PlaylistDiscovery } from './PlaylistDiscovery'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export default function PlaylistUrlInput() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    const [url, setUrl] = useState('')
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    const [data, setData] = useState<any>(null)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    const handleLoad = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (!url) return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setLoading(true)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setError(null)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setData(null)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const result = await fetchPlaylistMetadata(url);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (result.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |          setError(result.error)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |          setData(result)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setLoading(false)
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |    return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="w-full max-w-2xl mx-auto my-12">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {/* Header */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="text-center mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                Playlist Analyzer
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <p className="text-neutral-500 mt-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                Paste a Spotify link to calculate its discovery score.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {/* Input Field */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-3">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              <input 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="flex-1 p-3 rounded-xl border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black dark:focus:ring-white outline-none transition-all"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 placeholder="https://open.spotify.com/playlist/..."
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 value={url}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onChange={(e) => setUrl(e.target.value)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onKeyDown={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleLoad()}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onClick={handleLoad}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 disabled={loading || !url}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="px-6 py-3 bg-black dark:bg-white text-white dark:text-black font-bold rounded-xl hover:opacity-80 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-all"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {loading ? 'Loading...' : 'Load Playlist'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {/* Error Message */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {error && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              <div className="mt-4 p-4 bg-red-50 text-red-600 rounded-xl border border-red-100 text-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 ğŸš¨ {error}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {/* Success Result */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {data && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              <div className="mt-8 animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <div className="p-4 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 rounded-t-2xl border-x border-t border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 flex justify-between items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    <div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       <span className="text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-neutral-500 font-semibold">Analyzed Playlist</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       <div className="font-bold text-lg text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">{data.name}</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       onClick={() => setData(null)} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       className="text-xs text-neutral-400 hover:text-red-500"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       Clear
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {/* Vibe Stats Bar */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <div className="grid grid-cols-3 divide-x divide-neutral-200 dark:divide-neutral-800 bg-white dark:bg-black border-x border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <div className="p-4 text-center">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         <div className="text-xs text-neutral-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold mb-1">Avg Tempo</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         <div className="text-xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">{data.tempo} BPM</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <div className="p-4 text-center">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         <div className="text-xs text-neutral-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold mb-1">Mood</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         <div className="text-xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 whitespace-nowrap">{data.mood}</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <div className="p-4 text-center">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         <div className="text-xs text-neutral-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold mb-1">Energy</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         <div className="text-xl font-bold text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">{data.energy}%</div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {/* Embed the Existing Analyzer */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <div className="bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-b-2xl p-6 shadow-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    <PlaylistDiscovery 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       id={data.id} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       name={data.name} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       artists={data.artists} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |              </div>

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ KeyGame.tsx.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (KeyGame.tsx.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { getMusicalJazzTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { FaRotateRight, FaPlay, FaStop, FaYoutube, FaMusic, FaTrophy, FaFire, FaCircleInfo } from 'react-icons/fa6';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | const KEYS = ['C Major', 'G Major', 'F Major', 'D Minor', 'A Minor', 'Bb Major'];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | const KEY_MAP: Record<string, string> = {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   'ycXxiJdXSbw': 'C Major',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   '09BB1pP9Vvg': 'Bb Major',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   '8S5S5A7K_y8': 'G Major',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function KeyGame() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [video, setVideo] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [guess, setGuess] = useState<string | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [isCorrect, setIsCorrect] = useState<boolean | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [actualKey, setActualKey] = useState<string>('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [score, setScore] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [streak, setStreak] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Core function to load and start music
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const fetchAndPlay = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGuess(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsCorrect(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // 1. Reset playing state to force a fresh iframe load
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsPlaying(false); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await getMusicalJazzTrack();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (data && !data.error) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setVideo(data);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const key = KEY_MAP[data.videoId] || KEYS[Math.floor(Math.random() * KEYS.length)];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setActualKey(key);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       // 2. Automatically start playback
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setIsPlaying(true); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // Optional: Load first track on component mount
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // Note: Most browsers require one initial click on the page 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     // before autoplay works, so the very first load might need a "Start" click.
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleGuess = (selectedKey: string) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (guess) return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const correct = selectedKey === actualKey;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGuess(selectedKey);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsCorrect(correct);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (correct) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setScore(s => s + 100);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setStreak(s => s + 1);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setStreak(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="p-8 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-3xl shadow-xl max-w-2xl mx-auto my-12">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* Scoreboard */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-black p-4 rounded-2xl border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 shadow-sm">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-amber-500 font-bold">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <FaTrophy /> <span>Score: {score}</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-orange-500 font-bold">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <FaFire className={streak > 0 ? "animate-bounce" : ""} /> 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <span>Streak: {streak}</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-8">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold font-serif text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50 flex items-center gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <FaYoutube className="text-red-600" /> Key Detective
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           onClick={fetchAndPlay} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           disabled={loading}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           className="p-2 hover:bg-neutral-200 dark:hover:bg-neutral-800 rounded-full transition-colors"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <FaRotateRight className={loading ? "animate-spin" : ""} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {!video ? (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <button onClick={fetchAndPlay} className="w-full py-20 border-2 border-dashed border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-2xl flex flex-col items-center gap-4 hover:border-blue-500 transition-colors">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="p-4 bg-blue-500 text-white rounded-full shadow-lg"><FaPlay className="ml-1" /></div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <span className="font-bold text-neutral-500">Start the Music Arcade</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="space-y-6">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="relative aspect-video bg-black rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl border border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {isPlaying ? (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <iframe
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 width="100%" height="100%"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 src={`https://www.youtube.com/embed/${video.videoId}?autoplay=1&controls=0&start=45&enablejsapi=1`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 allow="autoplay" className="opacity-40 pointer-events-none"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-600">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <FaMusic className="text-4xl" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <button onClick={() => setIsPlaying(!isPlaying)} className="px-6 py-2 bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 text-white rounded-full font-bold flex items-center gap-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-all">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {isPlaying ? <><FaStop /> Stop</> : <><FaPlay /> Listen</>}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-3 gap-3">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {/* ... Key buttons remain the same ... */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {KEYS.map((key) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const isUserChoice = guess === key;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const isTheCorrectAnswer = actualKey === key && guess !== null;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <button
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   key={key}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   disabled={guess !== null}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   onClick={() => handleGuess(key)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   className={`py-4 rounded-xl font-bold border-2 transition-all ${
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     isTheCorrectAnswer 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       ? 'bg-green-500 border-green-600 text-white scale-105 z-10' 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       : isUserChoice && !isCorrect
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         ? 'bg-red-500 border-red-600 text-white opacity-90' 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                         : 'bg-white dark:bg-black border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 text-neutral-400 hover:border-blue-500 disabled:opacity-40'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   }`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   {key}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             })}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {guess && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className={`p-6 rounded-2xl text-center animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-top-4 border ${isCorrect ? 'bg-green-50 border-green-200 text-green-800' : 'bg-red-50 border-red-200 text-red-800'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <h4 className="text-2xl font-black mb-1">{isCorrect ? "BRILLIANT! ğŸ¯" : "NOT QUITE ğŸ“‰"}</h4>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {!isCorrect && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <p className="font-bold mb-3 flex items-center justify-center gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                    <FaCircleInfo /> The correct answer was {actualKey}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onClick={fetchAndPlay} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="px-8 py-2 bg-neutral-900 text-white dark:bg-white dark:text-neutral-900 rounded-full font-bold text-sm hover:scale-105 transition-transform"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 Next Track â†’
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ YoutubeBpmGame.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (YoutubeBpmGame.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { useState } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { getYoutubeGameTrack } from '../actions';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import { FaCheck, FaRotateRight, FaXmark } from 'react-icons/fa6'; // Using FaXmark for the cancel icon
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function YoutubeBpmGame() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [video, setVideo] = useState<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [guess, setGuess] = useState(120);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [gameState, setGameState] = useState<'idle' | 'playing' | 'result'>('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [targetBpm, setTargetBpm] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const startNext = async () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const data = await getYoutubeGameTrack();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (data) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setVideo(data);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       // Pseudo-random BPM for demo; in production, this should come from your database
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setTargetBpm(Math.floor(Math.random() * (160 - 70 + 1)) + 70); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setGameState('playing');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setLoading(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // --- NEW: Stop Music / Cancel Function ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const stopGame = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setVideo(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGameState('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGuess(120);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleSubmit = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setGameState('result');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const diff = Math.abs(guess - targetBpm);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const isClose = diff <= 5;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="relative p-8 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-3xl bg-white dark:bg-black text-black dark:text-white text-center shadow-xl overflow-hidden">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* --- CANCEL ICON (Only shows when music/video is active) --- */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {video && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           onClick={stopGame}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           className="absolute top-4 right-4 p-2 rounded-full bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-900 hover:bg-red-100 dark:hover:bg-red-900/30 text-neutral-500 hover:text-red-600 transition-colors z-10"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           title="Stop Music"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <FaXmark size={20} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {gameState === 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="py-10">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             onClick={startNext} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             disabled={loading}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             className="bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white px-10 py-4 rounded-2xl font-bold transition-all active:scale-95 disabled:opacity-50"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {loading ? "Initializing..." : "Start YouTube BPM Challenge ğŸ“º"}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {video && gameState !== 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="space-y-6 animate-in fade-in zoom-in duration-300">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="aspect-video w-full rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl border border-neutral-800 bg-neutral-900">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {/* The iframe automatically stops when the "video" state is set to null */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <iframe
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               width="100%"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               height="100%"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               src={`https://www.youtube.com/embed/${video.videoId}?autoplay=1&controls=0&modestbranding=1`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               allow="autoplay"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               className="pointer-events-none"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <h3 className="text-lg font-medium text-neutral-500 pr-8">{video.title}</h3>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {gameState === 'playing' ? (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 p-6 rounded-2xl border border-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="flex justify-between text-xs font-bold text-neutral-400 mb-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <span>60 BPM</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <span>180 BPM</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <input 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 type="range" min="60" max="180" value={guess} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onChange={(e) => setGuess(parseInt(e.target.value))}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="w-full h-3 bg-neutral-200 dark:bg-neutral-800 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer accent-red-600 mb-4" 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <p className="text-6xl font-black font-mono text-red-600 mb-6">{guess}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onClick={handleSubmit}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="w-full bg-black dark:bg-white text-white dark:text-black py-4 rounded-xl font-bold flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <FaCheck /> Submit Guess
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           ) : (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="py-6 space-y-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className={`text-5xl font-black ${isClose ? 'text-green-500' : 'text-red-500'}`}>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 {isClose ? 'PERFECT!' : 'NOT QUITE'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <p className="text-xl">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 Actual: <span className="font-bold">{targetBpm} BPM</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 onClick={startNext} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 className="flex items-center gap-2 mx-auto text-blue-500 font-bold hover:underline pt-4"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <FaRotateRight /> Play Another Track
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ contact-form.tsx
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT START (contact-form.tsx) ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 'use client';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | import React, { useState } from 'react';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | // Define the shape of the form data
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | interface FormData {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   name: string;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   email: string;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   message: string;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function ContactForm() {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [formData, setFormData] = useState<FormData>({
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     name: '',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     email: '',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     message: '',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   });
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [status, setStatus] = useState<'idle' | 'loading' | 'success' | 'error'>('idle');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [message, setMessage] = useState<string>('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement>) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setFormData({
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ...formData,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       [e.target.name]: e.target.value,
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     });
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent<HTMLFormElement>) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     e.preventDefault();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setStatus('loading');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setMessage('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const response = await fetch('/api/contact', {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         method: 'POST',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         headers: {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           'Content-Type': 'application/json',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         },
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         body: JSON.stringify(formData),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       });
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const result = await response.json();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (response.ok) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setStatus('success');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setMessage(result.message || 'Message sent successfully! I will be in touch soon.');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setFormData({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); // Clear form
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setStatus('error');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setMessage(result.message || 'Failed to send message. Please check your inputs.');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } catch (error) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       console.error('Submission error:', error);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setStatus('error');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setMessage('A network error occurred. Please try again.');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const getStatusMessage = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (status === 'loading') return 'Sending...';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (status === 'success') return message;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (status === 'error') return message;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return '';
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <div className="max-w-xl mx-auto py-10">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {/* Form Status Message */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {status !== 'idle' && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           className={`p-4 mb-6 rounded-lg font-medium transition-opacity ${
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             status === 'success' ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800 dark:bg-green-900 dark:text-green-200' :
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             status === 'error' ? 'bg-red-100 text-red-800 dark:bg-red-900 dark:text-red-200' :
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             'bg-neutral-100 text-neutral-800 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-neutral-200'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           }`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {getStatusMessage()}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="space-y-6">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* Name Input */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div>

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             Name
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </label>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <input
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             type="text"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             id="name"

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             value={formData.name}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             required
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow disabled:opacity-70"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* Email Input */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div>

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             value={formData.email}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             required
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow disabled:opacity-70"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {/* Message Textarea */}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <label htmlFor="message" className="block text-sm font-medium text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 mb-1">

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             value={formData.message}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             onChange={handleChange}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             required
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             disabled={status === 'loading'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 transition-shadow resize-none disabled:opacity-70"

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {status === 'loading' ? (

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | export function MusicPuzzle() {

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [trackInfo, setTrackInfo] = useState({ name: '', artist: '', image: '', url: '' });
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [pieces, setPieces] = useState<PuzzlePiece[]>([]);

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [isBuffering, setIsBuffering] = useState(false); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [seconds, setSeconds] = useState(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [selectedIdx, setSelectedIdx] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   // --- NEW: Landing Highlight State ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [highlightedIdx, setHighlightedIdx] = useState<number | null>(null); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [isPlayerReady, setIsPlayerReady] = useState(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [bestTime, setBestTime] = useState<number | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [listenedPieces, setListenedPieces] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const [warning, setWarning] = useState<string | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const ytPlayerRef = useRef<any>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const localAudioRef = useRef<HTMLAudioElement | null>(null); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const timerRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const ytTimeoutRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const searchCache = useRef<Record<string, any[]>>({});
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const lastSearchTime = useRef<number>(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const savedBest = localStorage.getItem('puzzle_best_time');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (savedBest) setBestTime(parseInt(savedBest));
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const timer = setTimeout(() => { loadOfflinePuzzle(); }, 300);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     return () => clearTimeout(timer);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   useEffect(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const onPlayerStateChange = (event: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (event.data === 3) setIsBuffering(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       else setIsBuffering(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const initYT = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (window.YT && window.YT.Player) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         ytPlayerRef.current = new window.YT.Player('yt-hidden-player', {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           height: '0', width: '0', videoId: '',
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           playerVars: { 'controls': 0, 'disablekb': 1, 'enablejsapi': 1 },
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           events: { 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             'onReady': () => setIsPlayerReady(true),
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             'onStateChange': onPlayerStateChange 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         });
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!window.YT) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const tag = document.createElement('script');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       tag.src = "https://www.youtube.com/iframe_api";
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       firstScriptTag.parentNode?.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       window.onYouTubeIframeAPIReady = initYT;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else { initYT(); }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   }, []);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handleSearch = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     e.preventDefault();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const query = searchQuery.trim().toLowerCase();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!query) return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const now = Date.now();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (now - lastSearchTime.current < 1500) return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     lastSearchTime.current = now;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (searchCache.current[query]) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setSearchResults(searchCache.current[query]);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsSearching(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setHasSearched(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     try {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const res = await fetch(`/api/youtube/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const data = await res.json();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const results = Array.isArray(data) ? data : [];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       searchCache.current[query] = results;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setSearchResults(results);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } catch (err) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setSearchResults([]);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setHasSearched(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } finally { setIsSearching(false); }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const selectYouTubeTrack = (video: any) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (!isPlayerReady && sourceMode !== 'offline') return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setHasSearched(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSearchResults([]);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSearchQuery('');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSourceMode('youtube');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setTrackInfo({ name: video.name, artist: video.artist, image: video.image, url: `https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=${video.id}` });
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.loadVideoById === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ytPlayerRef.current.loadVideoById(video.id);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const initial = CORRECT_ORDER.map(id => ({ id }));
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     shuffleAndStart(initial);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const loadOfflinePuzzle = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSourceMode('offline');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setTrackInfo({
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       name: "Girl from Italy", artist: "Arman Ayva",
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       image: "https://res.cloudinary.com/dpmkshcky/image/upload/v1763230260/Cowboy_a3mnzs.png",
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       url: "https://armanayva.bandcamp.com"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     });
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const initial = CORRECT_ORDER.map(id => ({ id, localAudioUrl: `/audio/segment-${id + 1}.mp3` }));
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     shuffleAndStart(initial);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const shuffleAndStart = (basePieces: PuzzlePiece[]) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsSolved(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSeconds(0);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setHighlightedIdx(null); // Reset highlight
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setListenedPieces(new Set()); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setWarning(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const shuffled = [...basePieces].sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setPieces(shuffled);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (timerRef.current) clearInterval(timerRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     timerRef.current = setInterval(() => setSeconds(s => s + 1), 1000);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const stopAudio = () => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       try { ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo(); } catch (e) {}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (localAudioRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       localAudioRef.current.pause();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       localAudioRef.current.currentTime = 0;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       localAudioRef.current = null;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (ytTimeoutRef.current) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       clearTimeout(ytTimeoutRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ytTimeoutRef.current = null;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setPlayingId(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setIsBuffering(false);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const playSegment = (piece: PuzzlePiece) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setListenedPieces(prev => new Set(prev).add(piece.id));
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     setWarning(null); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (playingId === piece.id) { stopAudio(); return; }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     stopAudio();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (sourceMode === 'youtube' && ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.seekTo === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const startTime = piece.id * SEGMENT_DURATION;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ytPlayerRef.current.seekTo(startTime, true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ytPlayerRef.current.playVideo();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setPlayingId(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       ytTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         if (ytPlayerRef.current && typeof ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo === 'function') {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           ytPlayerRef.current.pauseVideo();
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setPlayingId(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }, SEGMENT_DURATION * 1000);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else if (sourceMode === 'offline' && piece.localAudioUrl) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const audio = new Audio(piece.localAudioUrl);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       localAudioRef.current = audio;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setPlayingId(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       audio.play().catch(() => {});
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       audio.onended = () => { setPlayingId(null); localAudioRef.current = null; };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   const handlePieceClick = (index: number) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (isSolved) return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     const pieceId = pieces[index].id;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     if (selectedIdx === null) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (!listenedPieces.has(pieceId)) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setWarning("Dont cheat, play first! ğŸ·");
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setTimeout(() => setWarning(null), 2000);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         return;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setSelectedIdx(index);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else if (selectedIdx === index) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     } else {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       // PERFORM SWAP
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const updated = [...pieces];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       const temp = updated[selectedIdx];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       updated[selectedIdx] = updated[index];
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       updated[index] = temp;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setPieces(updated);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setSelectedIdx(null);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       // --- NEW: Trigger Landing Highlight ---
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setHighlightedIdx(index); 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       setTimeout(() => setHighlightedIdx(null), 800); // Clear after 800ms
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       if (JSON.stringify(updated.map(p => p.id)) === JSON.stringify(CORRECT_ORDER)) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         setIsSolved(true);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         if (timerRef.current) clearInterval(timerRef.current);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         const savedBest = localStorage.getItem('puzzle_best_time');
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         if (!savedBest || seconds < parseInt(savedBest)) {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           localStorage.setItem('puzzle_best_time', seconds.toString());
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           setBestTime(seconds);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         sendGTMEvent({ event: 'puzzle_complete', action: 'music_puzzle_success', value: seconds });
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   };
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     <section className="my-8 p-4 sm:p-8 bg-neutral-50 dark:bg-neutral-900 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-2xl shadow-xl relative">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div id="yt-hidden-player" className="hidden"></div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {warning && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="absolute top-4 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-[100] bg-red-600 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded-full font-bold shadow-2xl animate-bounce flex items-center gap-2">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <FaExclamationTriangle /> {warning}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <h2 className="text-xl sm:text-2xl font-serif font-bold flex items-center gap-3 text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {sourceMode === 'youtube' ? <FaYoutube className="text-red-600" /> : <FaMusic className="text-blue-500" />}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           Music Puzzle
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </h2>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <button onClick={() => shuffleAndStart(pieces)} className="text-[10px] font-bold uppercase text-neutral-500 bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 px-2 py-1 rounded hover:text-blue-500 transition-colors">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           Reshuffle Game
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       <div className="mb-8 space-y-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <form onSubmit={handleSearch} className="relative z-50">

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <input 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               type="text" value={searchQuery} onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               placeholder="Search YouTube Song..."
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 text-sm rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-red-500"
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <button type="submit" className="px-4 bg-red-600 text-white rounded-xl hover:bg-red-700 transition-all shadow-md">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {isSearching ? <FaSpinner className="animate-spin" /> : <FaSearch />}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           {hasSearched && searchQuery !== '' && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="absolute left-0 right-0 top-full mt-2 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-800 border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-700 rounded-xl shadow-2xl z-50 max-h-60 overflow-y-auto">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               {searchResults.length > 0 ? searchResults.map((video: any) => (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <button key={video.id} onClick={() => selectYouTubeTrack(video)} className="w-full flex items-center gap-3 p-3 hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 text-left border-b last:border-none dark:border-neutral-700">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   <img src={video.image} className="w-12 h-8 object-cover rounded shadow-sm" alt="" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   <div className="truncate text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-100">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <p className="font-bold text-xs truncate">{video.name}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <p className="text-[10px] text-neutral-500">{video.artist}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               )) : <div className="p-4 text-center text-xs text-neutral-500">No videos found.</div>}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </form>

â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         {!isSolved && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <button onClick={loadOfflinePuzzle} className="py-3 px-4 flex items-center justify-center gap-3 bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-xl hover:border-blue-500 transition-all text-sm font-bold text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <FaMusic className="text-blue-500" /> Play Offline Demo
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <button onClick={() => selectYouTubeTrack(DEMO_VIDEO)} disabled={!isPlayerReady} className={`py-3 px-4 flex items-center justify-center gap-3 bg-white dark:bg-black border border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800 rounded-xl transition-all text-sm font-bold text-neutral-700 dark:text-neutral-300 ${!isPlayerReady ? â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {pieces.length > 0 && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="animate-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 duration-500">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-6 bg-white dark:bg-black p-3 rounded-xl border border-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="flex items-center gap-3 truncate">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <img src={trackInfo.image} className="w-10 h-10 rounded-lg object-cover" alt="" />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               <div className="truncate">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <p className="text-[9px] font-bold text-red-600 uppercase tracking-widest leading-none mb-1">Now Playing</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <p className="text-sm font-bold truncate max-w-[120px] sm:max-w-none text-neutral-900 dark:text-neutral-50">{trackInfo.name}</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             <div className="flex items-center gap-3 shrink-0">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                <div className="text-right">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   <p className="text-[8px] uppercase font-black text-neutral-400 leading-none mb-1">Time</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   <span className="font-mono text-xs text-blue-500 font-bold">{seconds}s</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                {bestTime && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  <div className="text-right border-l pl-3 border-neutral-200 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <p className="text-[8px] uppercase font-black text-green-500 flex items-center gap-1 justify-end leading-none mb-1">Best <FaTrophy size={8}/></p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <span className="font-mono text-xs text-green-500 font-bold">{bestTime}s</span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                  </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                <button onClick={() => shuffleAndStart(pieces)} className="p-2 text-neutral-400 hover:text-blue-500"><FaUndo size={14} /></button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-3 sm:gap-4">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             {pieces.map((piece, index) => {
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const isCorrect = piece.id === index;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const isSelected = selectedIdx === index;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const isHighlighted = highlightedIdx === index; // NEW Check
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const hasListened = listenedPieces.has(piece.id);
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               const isCurrentlyBuffering = playingId === piece.id && isBuffering;
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               return (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 <div 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   key={piece.id} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   onClick={() => handlePieceClick(index)} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   className={`relative p-3 sm:p-5 border-2 rounded-xl transition-all duration-300 flex flex-col items-center gap-3 cursor-pointer ${
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     isSelected ? 'border-blue-500 bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/30 scale-95 shadow-inner' : 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     isHighlighted ? 'border-yellow-400 bg-yellow-50 dark:bg-yellow-900/40 scale-105 z-20 ring-4 ring-yellow-400/20' : // HIGHLIGHT STYLE
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     isCorrect ? 'border-green-500 bg-green-50/50 dark:bg-green-900/20' : 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     'bg-white dark:bg-black border-dashed border-neutral-300 dark:border-neutral-700'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   } ${!hasListened && !isSolved ? 'opacity-70 grayscale-[0.5]' : ''}`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   {isCurrentlyBuffering && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <div className="absolute inset-0 z-10 flex items-center justify-center bg-white/60 dark:bg-black/60 rounded-xl">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       <FaSpinner className="animate-spin text-blue-500" size={24} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   <div className="w-full flex flex-col items-center">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     {isSelected ? <FaExchangeAlt className="text-blue-500 mb-2 animate-pulse" /> : 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                      isHighlighted ? <span className="text-2xl mb-1 animate-bounce">ğŸ¯</span> : // Change icon for highlight
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                      <span className="text-2xl mb-1">{isCorrect ? 'âœ…' : hasListened ? 'ğŸ§©' : 'â“'}</span>}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     <span className="text-[9px] font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-400">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       {isHighlighted ? 'Landed!' : isCorrect ? `Part ${piece.id + 1}` : hasListened ? `Piece ${index + 1}` : 'Play to Unlock'}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     </span>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   <button 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     onClick={(e) => { e.stopPropagation(); playSegment(piece); }} 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     className={`w-10 h-10 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center shadow-md transition-all ${
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       playingId === piece.id ? 'bg-red-600 text-white animate-pulse' : 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                       hasListened ? 'bg-neutral-100 dark:bg-neutral-800 text-neutral-600' : 'bg-neutral-800 text-white'
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     }`}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   >
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                     {playingId === piece.id ? <FaPause size={14} /> : <FaPlay size={14} className="ml-0.5" />}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                   </button>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |                 </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |               );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |             })}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | 
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       {isSolved && (
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         <div className="text-center mt-8 animate-in fade-in zoom-in duration-700 pt-6 border-t border-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-800">
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <p className="p-3 text-green-700 dark:text-green-400 font-bold text-sm mb-4 uppercase tracking-tighter font-serif">âœ¨ Solved in {seconds}s! âœ¨</p>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |           <MusicCTA label={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "Watch Full on YouTube" : "Listen on Bandcamp"} albumUrl={trackInfo.url} baseColor={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "#FF0000" : "#00bfff"} hoverColor={sourceMode === 'youtube' ? "#CC0000" : "#0080ff"} />
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |         </div>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |       )}
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |     </section>
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   |   );
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | }
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   | --- FILE CONTENT END ---
